tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large pan over high heat. Add the steak, season with salt and pepper, and cook until browned, 5-6 minutes. Remove from the pan.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Heat the remaining tablespoon of oil in the same pan, then add the red onion and cook for about 5 minutes, until softened and browned. Add the tomato, garlic, and aji amarillo paste, and cook for another 5-7 minutes, until the tomatoes have released some of their juices, but are still intact.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add the soy sauce and vinegar and stir to combine, let cook for 1 minute.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add the steak, fries, and cilantro. Toss gently to coat the fries in the sauce.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Serve with rice, if desired.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

ingredients.name: Great Value Mild Thick & Chunky Salsa, 24 oz
Limes, Each
Great Value Original Taco Seasoning Mix, 1 oz
Fresh Cilantro, Bunch
Freshness Guaranteed Thin-Sliced Chicken Breasts, 1.7 - 3.0 lb
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In your slow cooker, mix the salsa, lime juice, taco seasoning, and cilantro.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Salt and pepper the chicken to taste, then mix into the sauce. Cover and cook on high for four hours or low for seven to eight hours.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Remove the chicken, shred with two forks, and return to the slow cooker and stir.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Freeze leftovers in an airtight bag for up to six months!

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

ingredients.name: Russet Potatoes, 5 lb Bag
Yellow Onions, Each
Great Value Reduced Sodium Chicken Broth, 32oz Carton
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Great Value Sweet Cream Salted Butter, 16 oz
King Arthur Flour Unbleached All-Purpose Flour 5 lb. Bag
Great Value Heavy Whipping Cream, 16 Oz
Great Value All Natural Sour Cream, 8 oz Tub
Great Value Finely Shredded Mild Cheddar Cheese, 8 oz
Great Value Real Bacon Pieces, 2.5 oz
Fresh Green Onions Bunch, Each

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Add the potatoes, onions, chicken broth, salt and pepper to the slow cooker.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Set it to low for 6 hours or high for 4 hours.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In a saucepan, combine the butter, flour, heavy cream and sour cream. Whisk until thickened.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: When the slow cooker is done, pour in the thickened mix. Stir, cover and set the slow cooker to low for another 30 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Serve with shredded cheese, bacon and chopped scallions.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

ingredients.name: King Arthur Flour Unbleached All-Purpose Flour 5 lb. Bag
Great Value Chili Powder, 3 oz
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Great Value Paprika, 2.5 oz
Great Value Garlic Powder, 3.4 oz
Foster Farms Fresh & Natural Cage Free Family Pack Chicken Wings 72 -91.2 oz (4.5 -5.7 lb) Tray
Sweet Baby Ray's Original Barbecue Sauce, 18 oz.
Great Value Organic Strained Raw Honey, 12 oz Inverted Plastic Bottle

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a bowl, combine flour, chili powder, salt, pepper, paprika, and garlic powder. Coat the wings in the flour evenly, shaking off any excess.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Place the floured wings on a parchment paper–lined baking sheet and spread them out in a single layer.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Bake for 45 minutes, flipping halfway through, until skin is crispy and golden brown.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Preheat oven to 500°F (250°C).

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: In a separate bowl, combine the BBQ sauce and the honey. Stir the cooked wings in the sauce and coat them evenly.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Place the coated wings back onto the baking sheet and spread them in a single layer.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Bake for 8 to 10 minutes, until sauce is bubbly and caramelized. Cool, then serve.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

18f2c728b71aeb054967ab8e0d99639e.title: Beefy naked burrito skillet
18f2c728b71aeb054967ab8e0d99639e.description: We took all the ingredients you love in a burrito and cooked them all in one pan. This beefy burrito skillet will satisfy your tex-mex cravings in a new and inventive way. This delicious easy weeknight meal is on the table in 30 minutes.

ingredients.name: All Natural* 73% Lean/27% Fat Ground Beef, 1 lb, Roll
Great Value Original Taco Seasoning Mix, 1 oz
Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon
Great Value Mild Thick & Chunky Salsa, 24 oz
Great Value Black Beans, 15 oz Can
ingredients.description: 1 (15 oz) can Black Beans, rinsed and drained

ingredients.name: Great Value Burrito Flour Tortillas, 20 oz, 8 Count
ingredients.description: 2 (6 inch) Flour Tortillas, sliced into 1-inch strips

ingredients.name: Kraft Mexican Style Four Cheese Blend Shredded Cheese, 16 oz Bag
Great Value All Natural Sour Cream, 8 oz Tub
Fresh Green Onions Bunch, Each
Fresh Cilantro, Bunch
Limes, Each

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a large skillet over medium high heat, add the beef and brown until no longer pink. This should take about 5 minutes. Drain the oil well so the mixture is not greasy.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add taco seasoning, water, salad and beans. Simmer over medium heat for 3-5 minutes until most of the moisture has evaporated.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Fold in the tortilla strips and top with cheese. Let the cheese melt for 1-2 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Take the skillet off the heat. Drizzle sour cream on the top with sliced green onions and chopped cilantro before serving.

4d549d066ebf409b372ebd4715eea1c6.title: Greek turkey meatballs with tzatziki and couscous
4d549d066ebf409b372ebd4715eea1c6.description: Packed with flavorful feta cheese and vitamin K-rich spinach, these Greek meatballs, or keftedes, get a healthy makeover with ground turkey instead of the usual lamb and beef. They’re crazy delicious over couscous or stuffed in pita bread and topped with addictive tzatziki sauce.

ingredients.name: Jennie-O, Fresh Ground Turkey Roll, 85% Lean, 1 lb
White Onions, Each
ingredients.description: 1/2 small white onion, diced for meatballs

ingredients.name: Cavender's All Purpose Greek Seasoning, 8 oz
Great Value Buttery Smooth Club Crackers, 13.7 oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 sleeve butter flavored crackers, crushed for meatballs

ingredients.name: Great Value Pitted Kalamata Greek Olives, 6.35oz Jar
Garlic Bulb, Each
ingredients.description: 1 tsp. minced garlic (jar) for meatballs,1 small garlic clove, minced for Tzatziki

ingredients.name: Athenos Traditional Crumbled Feta Cheese 6 oz
ingredients.description: 6 oz. feta cheese, crumbled and divided in half for meatballs

ingredients.name: Birds Eye C&W Chopped Baby Spinach, Frozen Spinach, 16 Oz
ingredients.description: 4 oz. (1/2 box) frozen spinach, thawed, drained and chopped for meatballs

ingredients.name: Morton Sea Salt, Fine, 4.4 Ounce
ingredients.description: 1 tsp. sea salt  for meatballs,1 tsp sea salt, plus more if needed to taste for Tzatziki,1 tsp. sea salt for Couscous

ingredients.name: Fresh Curly Parsley Bunch, Each
ingredients.description: 1/2 handful Italian leaf parsley, chopped for meatballs

ingredients.name: Great Value Greek Plain Nonfat Yogurt, 5.3 oz
ingredients.description: 1 cup plain Greek yogurt for Tzatziki

ingredients.name: Fresh Cucumber, Each
Concord Foods Lemon Juice, 4.5 oz
Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Great Value Dill Weed, 0.75 oz
ingredients.description: 1 tsp. dill (either dried or fresh will work) for Tzatziki

ingredients.name: Near East Pearled Couscous Mix Roasted Garlic and Olive Oil, 4.7 oz
ingredients.description: 1 cup Israeli couscous (or pearl couscous) for Couscous

ingredients.name: Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon
ingredients.description: 2 cups broth or water for Couscous
3 mini tricolored bell peppers for meatballs

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: For meatballs - Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: For meatballs - Combine ground turkey through sea salt until thoroughly combined.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: For meatballs - Using a cookie scoop, form evenly sized meatballs, placing on the parchment lined sheet pan.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: For meatballs - Place pan in refrigerator and set a timer for 30 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: For meatballs - Preheat oven to 400 degrees.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: For meatballs - When the timer goes off, remove the meatballs from the refrigerator and place in oven.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: For meatballs - Bake meatballs for 15-20 minutes, until internal temperature reads 165 degrees.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: For meatballs - Garnish meatballs with parsley and serve with tzatziki.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: For Tzatziki - Combine all ingredients, cover and refrigerate until ready to serve.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: For Couscous - Bring water to a boil in a medium sized sauce pan.

tasks.title: Step 11
tasks.instruction: For Couscous - Add salt and couscous, stir.

tasks.title: Step 12
tasks.instruction: For Couscous - Cover and reduce heat to medium low and simmer for 8-10 minutes, until water has absorbed.

cb8a46bb4e54f5c6d3d42c258be40d7c.title: Beef stroganoff
cb8a46bb4e54f5c6d3d42c258be40d7c.description: Frankie cooks his way back in time with his favorite vintage recipes. These oldie-but-goodie dishes are not only nostalgic and comforting, but they’ll also fill you up without costing you a pretty penny.

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Salted Butter, 16 oz
All Natural* 73% Lean/27% Fat Ground Beef, 1 lb, Roll
Yellow Onions, Each
Garlic Bulb, Each
Great Value Black Pepper & Iodized Salt, 5.25 oz
White Mushrooms, Bulk
GV All Purpose Flour 2LB Bag
Great Value Tomato Paste, 6 oz
Lawry's Casero Smoked Paprika, 2 oz
Great Value Beef Broth, 14.5 oz
Great Value Dijon Mustard, 12 oz Squeeze Bottle
Great Value Wide Egg Noodles Enriched Product, 16 oz
Great Value All Natural Sour Cream, 8 oz Tub
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup sour cream, plus 1/4 cup for garnish, divided

ingredients.name: Fresh Curly Parsley Bunch, Each

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Bring a pot of salted water to a boil.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium high heat. Sauté the ground beef, breaking it up while allowing it to slightly caramelize to get brown bits of color. And onion and garlic and sauté until beef is browned and cooked through. Season with salt and pepper.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add the mushrooms to the beef mixture and sauté until they begin to brown, about 4 minutes or until any excess water is cooked out. Sprinkle the mixture with flour, add the tomato paste and smoked paprika, and stir for 1-2 more minutes until flour has been fully incorporate. Drop the stock to add the beef broth. Add dijon mustard to the mixture and stir to combine. Scrape any bits from the bottom of the pan. Reduce to simmer for 10 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add egg noodles to salted boiling water and cook as indicated on packaging. Drain in a colander.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Remove skillet with beef mixture from the heat and fold in the sour cream. Fold in the noodles and stir to coat. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Garnish with parsley and a dollop of sour cream.

5d1b663c58dade5980ecaf065e7a5964.title: Curried ginger carrot soup
5d1b663c58dade5980ecaf065e7a5964.description: Don’t sleep on these 5-ingredient recipes – simple weeknight meals that are anything but boring, and with a few pantry staples, you’ll have dinner on the table in no time.

ingredients.name: Crisco Pure Vegetable Oil, 16 fl oz
Yellow Onions, Each
Fresh Ginger Root, Each
Lawry's Casero Curry Powder, 1.75 oz
Fresh Baby-Cut Carrots, 2lb Bag
ingredients.description: 2 pounds carrots, peeled and chopped 1/2 inch pieces

ingredients.name: Great Value Vegetable Broth, 32 oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Heat a large soup pot over medium heat. Add the oil, onion, carrot and curry powder and sauté for 5-7 minutes. Add the ginger, salt, pepper and continue to cook until highly fragrant and deeply colored.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Drop the stock and bring to a boil. Turn the heat to simmer and cook for 20-25 minutes until the carrots are very soft. Allow to cool slightly and puree with an immersion blender. Add salt to season and serve.

23c1d424f2f8ca5e358aeb092d0d9ab0.title: Fall harvest salad
23c1d424f2f8ca5e358aeb092d0d9ab0.description: This salad is full of all of your favorite fall flavors and colors, brought together with a delicious maple cider Dijon dressing. Wait to dress the salad until you are ready to serve so everything stays crisp!

ingredients.name: Fresh Acorn Squash, Each
Great Value Apple Cider Vinegar, 32 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup apple cider vinegar, for maple cider dressing

ingredients.name: Marketside Organic Baby Spinach, 16 oz Clam Shell, Fresh
ingredients.description: 4 cups fresh baby spinach, for salad

ingredients.name: McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
ingredients.description: 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper, for salad,1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper, for maple cider dressing

ingredients.name: Marketside Blue Cheese Crumbles Cup, 5 oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup crumbled blue cheese, for salad

ingredients.name: Bosc Pears, Each
Great Value Dijon Mustard, 12 oz Squeeze Bottle
ingredients.description: 1 1/2 teaspoons dijon mustard, for maple cider dressing

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweetened Dried Cranberries, 6 OZ
Great Value: 100% Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 25.5 fl oz
ingredients.description: 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, for salad,1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil, for maple cider dressing

ingredients.name: Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
ingredients.description: 1 teaspoon kosher salt, for maple cider dressing,1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, for salad

ingredients.name: Maple Grove Farms Organic Pure Maple Syrup, 8.5 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup pure maple syrup, for maple cider dressing

ingredients.name: Great Value Ground Nutmeg, 1.5 oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg, for salad

ingredients.name: Great Value Chopped Pecans, 4 oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup pecan, toasted and roughly chopped, for salad

ingredients.name: Fresh Red Radish, Bunch
Mariposa Farms Fresh Cut Thyme, .75 oz
ingredients.description: 2 teaspoons fresh thyme leaf, for salad

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Trim the ends off the squash, then cut in half. Scoop out the seeds, then slice into 1/2-inch (1 1/4 cm) cubes.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Spread the squash on a baking sheet, then add the olive oil, salt, pepper, nutmeg, and thyme and toss to coat.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Roast for 20 minutes, until tender and lightly browned. Remove from the oven and let cool completely.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Meanwhile, prepare the rest of the salad: Cut the head of radicchio in half, remove the core, then thinly slice.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Cut the pear in half, scoop out the core, then thinly slice.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Make the dressing: In a small bowl, whisk together the maple syrup, apple cider vinegar, and mustard. While whisking, slowly drizzle in the olive oil and continue whisking until emulsified. Whisk in the salt and pepper, then set aside.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, combine the radicchio, spinach, pear, dried cranberries, and cooled roasted squash. Drizzle some of the dressing over the salad and toss well to coat.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Divide the salad between serving plates, then top with the chopped toasted pecans and crumbled blue cheese. Serve immediately with the remaining dressing alongside.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

150bc01cf12ee9f8be5481c8be8572fd.title: Tater tot nachos
150bc01cf12ee9f8be5481c8be8572fd.description: Brackets are complete and all that’s missing is food to fuel your team’s run. Huddle around the kitchen as Frankie preps the ultimate watch party spread. These savory, spicy and sweet dishes are championship-worthy even if your bracket goes bust.

ingredients.name: Ore-Ida Golden Tater Tots Seasoned Shredded Frozen Potatoes, 32 oz Bag
Crisco Pure Vegetable Oil, 16 fl oz
El Guapo Whole Cumin (Comino Entero), 0.75 oz
Great Value Chili Powder, 3 oz
Great Value Garlic Powder, 3.4 oz
Great Value Onion Powder, 3.25 oz
Great Value Crushed Red Pepper, 1.75 oz
All Natural* 73% Lean/27% Fat Ground Beef, 1 lb, Roll
Great Value Black Pepper & Iodized Salt, 5.25 oz
Great Value Finely Shredded Mild Cheddar Cheese, 8 oz
Great Value Medium Pitted Black Olives, 6 oz
Great Value All Natural Sour Cream, 8 oz Tub
Freshness Guaranteed Mild Pico De Gallo, 10 oz
Fresh Cilantro, Bunch
Fresh Red Radish, Bunch
Louisiana Pepper Exchange, Jalapeno Pepper Puree, 4 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F. Spread the tater tots on a baking sheet tray and cook according to package directions.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Heat a skillet over medium heat and add the vegetable oil and the chili powder, cumin, garlic powder, onion powder and red pepper flakes. Cook for 1 minute until fragrant.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Stir in the ground beef. Season with salt and pepper. Use a spoon to break up the beef into small pieces and cook until browned.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Spread half of the baked tater tots in a layer on the bottom of a large cast iron skillet. Top with half of the ground beef and sprinkle with half of the cheese.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Spread the rest of the tater tots on top, and layer the remaining beef and cheese. Bake for 12-15 minutes until the cheese is melted and bubbly.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Top with olives, sour cream, pico de gallo, cilantro, jalapenos and radishes.

ingredients.name: McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Marketside Fresh Butternut Squash, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 2 lb medium butternut squash, peeled, seeded, roughly chopped

ingredients.name: Lawry's Casero Cayenne Pepper, 1.62 oz
Savia Coconut Milk, 13.5 fl oz
GOYA Sazon Coriander & Annatto Seasoning 1.41 Oz
El Guapo Whole Cumin (Comino Entero), 0.75 oz
Sprout House Fresh Cut Chives - 0.75oz
ingredients.description: fresh chive, chopped, for optional garnishes

ingredients.name: Mariposa Farms Fresh Cut Thyme, .75 oz
Garlic Bulb, Each
Great Value Organic Ground Ginger, 1.6 oz
Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Great Value Paprika, 2.5 oz
BIGS Simply Salted Pumpkin Seeds, Keto Friendly Snack, Low Carb Lifestyle, 5oz. Bag
Morton Sea Salt, Fine, 4.4 Ounce
Great Value Vegetable Broth, 32 oz
Yellow Onions, Each

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Add the butternut squash, onion, and garlic to a slow cooker. Drizzle with olive oil and add vegetable broth, ginger, cumin, coriander, paprika, cayenne, salt, and pepper.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Cover and cook on high heat for 4 hours.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Using a hand blender, blend the ingredients until smooth, or transfer to a standard blender or food processor and carefully puree.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add the thyme and coconut milk and blend to incorporate.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Garnish with pumpkin seeds and chives, if desired.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

43c3e13dda963572f7ad6b856787fbbc.title: Fig and couscous salad
43c3e13dda963572f7ad6b856787fbbc.description: This hearty fig and couscous salad is a perfect side for holiday dinner or an easy-to-pack lunch. The warm couscous pairs nicely with the fresh fig and white wine vinaigrette. Your friends will rave about this salad.

ingredients.name: Freshness Guaranteed Sliced Fresh Green Onions, 4 oz
Mina Moroccan Pitted Green Olives, 12.5 oz
ingredients.description: 3/4 cup green olives, such as Calvestrano, pitted and halved for salad

ingredients.name: Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon
Garlic Bulb, Each
Near East Couscous Mix, Original Plain, 10 oz Box
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
ingredients.description: 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, plus more to taste for dressing

ingredients.name: Sun-Maid Mediterranean Apricots, Dried Whole Fruit, 6 oz Bag
ingredients.description: 3/4 cup dried yellow apricot, halved for salad

ingredients.name: Great Value Nonpareille Capers, 3 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon caper, drained and minced for dressing

ingredients.name: Great Value White Wine Vinegar, 12.7 fl oz
ingredients.description: 4 tablespoons white wine vinegar for dressing

ingredients.name: Great Value Sliced Almonds, 4 oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup slivered almonds, toasted for salad

ingredients.name: Fresh Italian Parsley Bunch, Each
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup fresh parsley, loosely packed, minced for salad

ingredients.name: Black Mission Figs
ingredients.description: 8 black mission figs, cut into eighths for salad

ingredients.name: Great Value Oregano Leaves, 0.87 oz
Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a small bowl, combine the shallot and cold water. Set aside while you prepare the dressing .

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Place the garlic cloves on a cutting board and smash with the side of a knife. Sprinkle with the salt. With the blade edge of the knife facing away from you and nearly parallel to the cutting board, begin pressing against the garlic to create a paste with the salt.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add the garlic paste, capers, oregano, and white wine vinegar to a medium bowl and whisk to combine. Starting with a few drops and steadily increasing the stream, slowly drizzle in the oil, whisking continuously, until the dressing is thickened and emulsified.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Drain the shallots, then mix into the dressing.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Make the salad: Add the couscous to a large bowl. Add 3 tablespoons of the dressing and toss to coat. Gently fold in the figs, apricots, olives, and parsley. Dress with 1-2 more tablespoons of dressing and toss to coat.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Just before serving, fold in the almonds. Serve with the remaining dressing alongside.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

a071d5731c662f5874489a905e53f18f.title: Greek chickpea salad
a071d5731c662f5874489a905e53f18f.description: If you're looking for a delicious, healthy, and easy-to-make salad recipe, this Greek Chickpea Salad is for you! It's packed with all your favorite Midetteranean ingredients like cucumbers, tomatoes, herbs, and olives. It is tossed in a light and flavorful dressing made with olive oil and red wine vinegar. This salad is sure to please everyone, perfect for BBQs, potlucks, and easy weeknight dinners!

ingredients.name: Great Value Garbanzos Chick Peas, 15.5 oz
ingredients.description: 2 (15.5 oz) cans Chickpeas, drained and rinsed

ingredients.name: Cherry Tomato, 10 oz Package
Fresh Cucumber, Each
Fresh Red Onions, Each
Great Value Pitted Kalamata Greek Olives, 6.35oz Jar
Athenos Traditional Crumbled Feta Cheese 6 oz
Garlic Bulb, Each
Great Value Oregano Leaves, 0.87 oz
Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Star Italian Kitchen Red Wine Vinegar, 12 fl oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
Mint Fresh Cut, 0.75 oz
Fresh Italian Parsley Bunch, Each

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a large salad bowl, add tomatoes, chickpeas, cucumber, onion, olives, feta cheese, garlic, oregano, olive oil, red wine vinegar and salt. Mix well.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Garnish with mint leaves and parsley. Enjoy immediately!

98e8cdbe7da93d77af177ad0fb6274f5.title: Canned sweet potato casserole
98e8cdbe7da93d77af177ad0fb6274f5.description: Make this quick and easy canned potato casserole and skip the hours of prep and cooking time this Thanksgiving. This dish is a crowd pleaser and only requires a handful of inexpensive and easy-to-find ingredients. It turns out creamy, and fluffy and is a guaranteed holiday favorite.

ingredients.name: Princella Canned Cut Sweet Potatoes, 29 oz Can
ingredients.description: 3 1/2 cups Canned Sweet Potatoes (drained of all liquid)

ingredients.name: Great Value Light Brown Sugar, 32 oz
Great Value Sweet Cream Salted Butter, 16 oz
Great Value Pure Vanilla Extract, 1 fl oz
Great Value Heavy Whipping Cream, 16 Oz
Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
Great Value Organic Ground Allspice, 1.6 oz
Great Value Mini Marshmallows, 10 oz
Great Value Canola Oil Non-Stick Cooking Spray, 8 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease a baking dish with Nonstick Cooking Spray (as needed) .

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a food processor, place the Sweet Potato Purée (3 1/2 cups) , Butter (1/2 stick) , Brown Sugar (1/2 cup) , Heavy Cream (3/4 cup) , Large Eggs (4) , Vanilla Extract (1/2 Tbsp) , Ground Allspice (1 tsp) , and Kosher Salt (1/2 tsp) . Purée until smooth. Pour into the prepared baking dish.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Sprinkle Mini Marshmallows (2 1/2 cups) evenly on top. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until cooked through and the marshmallows are golden and toasted.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Serve it as a side dish.

ingredients.name: Freshness Guaranteed Thin-Sliced Chicken Breasts, 1.7 - 3.0 lb
ingredients.description: 3 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, for chicken marinade

ingredients.name: Great Value Greek Plain Nonfat Yogurt, 5.3 oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup plain yogurt, for chicken marinade

ingredients.name: Concord Foods Lemon Juice, 4.5 oz
ingredients.description: 2 tablespoons lemon juice, for chicken marinade

ingredients.name: Garlic Bulb, Each
ingredients.description: 6 cloves garlic, minced, for chicken marinade,8 cloves garlic, minced, for sauce

ingredients.name: Fresh Ginger Root, Each
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon minced ginger, for chicken marinade,2 tablespoons minced ginger, for sauce

ingredients.name: Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
El Guapo Whole Cumin (Comino Entero), 0.75 oz
ingredients.description: 2 teaspoons ground cumin, for chicken marinade,2 teaspoons ground cumin, for sauce

ingredients.name: Morton and Bassett Garam Masala, 1.9 oz
ingredients.description: 2 teaspoons garam masala, for chicken marinade,2 teaspoons garam masala, for sauce

ingredients.name: Great Value Paprika, 2.5 oz
ingredients.description: 2 teaspoons paprika, for chicken marinade,2 teaspoons paprika, for sauce

ingredients.name: Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Yellow Onions, Each
ingredients.description: 1 large onion, finely chopped, for sauce

ingredients.name: Great Value Ground Turmeric, 2 oz
GOYA Sazon Coriander & Annatto Seasoning 1.41 Oz
Great Value Chili Powder, 3 oz
Hunt's Tomato Puree, 29 oz Can
Great Value Tomato Sauce, 8 oz Can
Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon
Great Value Heavy Whipping Cream, 16 Oz
Fresh Cilantro, Bunch
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup fresh cilantro, for garnish, for sauce

ingredients.name: BEN'S ORIGINAL Ready Rice Roasted Chicken Flavored Rice, Easy Dinner Side, 8.8 OZ Pouch
Stonefire Original Naan Dippers, 7.05 oz, 20 Count
Handy Housewares 8" Natural Wooden Bamboo BBQ Skewers for Grilling, Shish Kebab, Appetizers, Fruit and More - 100 Pack
ingredients.description: Bamboo or wooden skewer, special equipment

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Slice the chicken into bite-sized chunks. Combine the cubed chicken with the yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, ginger, salt, cumin, garam masala, and paprika and stir until well-coated.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour, or overnight.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 500°F (260°C). Line a high-sided baking pan or roasting tray with parchment paper.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Place the marinated chicken pieces on bamboo or wooden skewers, then set them over the prepared baking pan, making sure there is space underneath the chicken to help distribute the heat more evenly. Bake for about 15 minutes, until slightly dark brown on the edges.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Make the sauce: Heat the oil in a large pot over medium heat, then sauté the onions, ginger, and garlic until tender but not browned. Add the cumin, turmeric, coriander, paprika, chili powder, and garam masala and stir constantly for about 30 seconds, until the spices are fragrant. Stir in the tomato puree, tomato sauce, and 1 ¼ cups of water, then bring to a boil and cook for about 5 minutes. Pour in the cream.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Remove the chicken from the skewers and add to the sauce, cooking for another 1-2 minutes. Garnish with cilantro and serve over rice or alongside naan bread.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

8d01c77cc924af8ea56e47603efa0a8d.title: Mummy pizza wraps
8d01c77cc924af8ea56e47603efa0a8d.description: Don’t let the line of trick-or-treaters or the candy corn overload scare you out of the kitchen this Halloween. Frankie’s got tricks up his sleeve to make simple yet wicked good treats for everyone at the party to enjoy. All while saving some dough.

ingredients.name: Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Garlic Bulb, Each
Great Value Crushed Red Pepper, 1.75 oz
Great Value Whole Peeled Tomatoes, 28 oz
Tyson Bonici Pizza Dough Balls 26.25lbs (PACK OF 1)
Great Value Finely Shredded Low-Moisture Part-Skim Mozzarella Cheese, 8 oz
Armour Pepperoni Slices, 5 oz
Great Value Medium Pitted Black Olives, 6 oz
Great Value Finely Shredded Parmesan Cheese, 6 oz
Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Heat a small saucepan and add the olive oil, red pepper flakes and garlic. Sauté for 1-2 minutes. Squish the tomatoes with your hand over a medium bowl then add them to the saucepan. Simmer the sauce over medium heat for 5 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Divide the dough into four equal sized pieces. With a rolling pin or wine bottle, roll each piece flat into a rough triangle shape with rounded edges and place on a sheet of parchment paper.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: In the center of each triangle, spread 1/4 cup of the tomato sauce and top with pepperoni, mozzarella, parmesan and olives, reserving 8 olive slices for the eyes.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Cut 1-inch strips down the length of the dough on either side of the filling. Fold the top and bottom in and then fold the strips over the filling in a criss cross pattern. Brush the dough with egg wash and add two olive slices for eyes.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Bake for 25 minutes. Heat remaining marinara sauce for dipping.

7d79771a9ba15381a9764a755949b354.title: White chicken chili
7d79771a9ba15381a9764a755949b354.description: This white chicken chili is perfect for a bowl of weeknight comfort. Half of the beans are mashed for extra creaminess (without cream!), but otherwise the stew is full of texture from cubed chicken, green chiles, corn, and Great Northern beans. Don’t forget the toppings!

ingredients.name: Fresh Cilantro, Bunch
ingredients.description: fresh cilantro leaf, for serving, roughly chopped

ingredients.name: Great Value Oregano Leaves, 0.87 oz
Yellow Onions, Each
Lawry's Casero Cayenne Pepper, 1.62 oz
Great Value All Natural Sour Cream, 8 oz Tub
Great Value Finely Shredded Mild Cheddar Cheese, 8 oz
El Guapo Whole Cumin (Comino Entero), 0.75 oz
Swanson 100% Natural, Gluten-Free Chicken Stock, 32 oz Carton
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
Birds Eye Steamfresh Super Sweet Corn, Frozen Corn, 10 Oz
Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Garlic Bulb, Each
Great Value Canned Medium Diced Green Chiles, 4 Oz
Great Value Chili Powder, 3 oz
Foster Farms Fresh & Natural Boneless & Skinless Chicken Breast Fillets, 1.6 - 2.39 lb
ingredients.description: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breast, cubed

ingredients.name: Great Value Great Northern Beans, 15.5 oz Can
ingredients.description: 2 cans great northern beans, drained and rinsed, divided

ingredients.name: McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Add 1 can of Great Northern beans to a medium bowl. Mash with a potato masher or fork until chunky.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add the olive oil to a large pot or Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the chicken and season with 1 teaspoon of salt. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the chicken is cooked through and browned on all sides, about 10 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add the onion and cook, stirring often, until softened and golden brown, 3–4 minutes. Add the garlic, green chiles, cumin, oregano, cayenne, chili powder, and black pepper and stir until the chicken is coated and the spices are aromatic, about 1 minute.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add the mashed beans and chicken stock and stir to combine. Bring the soup to a low boil, then reduce the heat to low, cover, and simmer for 15 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Add the remaining can of whole beans, corn, and remaining 2 teaspoons of salt. Cover and continue to simmer for 10 minutes, until warmed through.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Ladle the chili into bowls and top with shredded cheddar cheese, cilantro, and sour cream.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

61043b8af29edf78daf7755bce6ab147.title: Sheet pan chicken thighs with apple-honey glaze
61043b8af29edf78daf7755bce6ab147.description: Sheet Pan Chicken Thighs with Apple-Honey Glaze

ingredients.name: Marketside Antibiotic-Free Boneless Skinless Chicken Thighs, 1.3 - 1.9 lb
ingredients.description: 1 1/2 lbs Chicken Thighs, boneless, skin-on (about 6 chicken thighs) for chicken

ingredients.name: Birds Eye Steamfresh Roasted Red Potato Blend, Frozen, 10 oz
ingredients.description: 1 bag Frozen Mixed Root Vegetables for chicken

ingredients.name: Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Great Value Ground Thyme, 1.4 oz
Great Value Onion Powder, 3.25 oz
Great Value Garlic Powder, 3.4 oz
ingredients.description: 1 Tbsp Garlic Powder for chicken,1/2 tbsp Garlic Powder for Glaze

ingredients.name: Lawry's Casero Smoked Paprika, 2 oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Fresh Curly Parsley Bunch, Each
Great Value Honey, 12 oz
Smucker's Apple Jelly, 18 Ounces
Great Value Light Brown Sugar, 32 oz
ingredients.description: 1 Tbsp Light Brown Sugar for Glaze

ingredients.name: Great Value Original Barbecue Sauce, 18 oz
Great Value Apple Cider Vinegar, 32 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup Apple Cider Vinegar for Glaze

ingredients.name: Great Value Kosher Ground Cinnamon, 2.5 Oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven at 350 degrees F.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, mix together dried thyme, onion powder, garlic powder, smoked paprika, salt and pepper. Add chicken thighs, mix until well coated in the marinate. Cover with plastic wrap, refrigerate for 15 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, mix together dried thyme, onion powder, garlic powder, smoked paprika, salt and pepper. Add chicken thighs, mix until well coated in the marinate. Cover with plastic wrap, refrigerate for 15 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Grease the sheet pan with olive oil.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: In the prepared sheet pan, place chicken thighs and vegetables. Bake for 15 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Remove the sheet pan from the oven. Brush chicken and vegetables generously with the glaze, leave some glaze to serve.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Bring the sheet pan back in the oven and cook for another 15 minutes or until the chicken, and vegetables are completely cooked.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Remove from the oven. Let the chicken rest for 10 minutes before serving.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Optional garnish with parsley. Pour the remaining glaze on top and enjoy.

42f73783930e3c30c2db009c6a741dba.title: 30 Minute thanksgiving leftover casserole
42f73783930e3c30c2db009c6a741dba.description: Our Thanksgiving Leftover Casserole Recipe is the perfect way to enjoy your Thanksgiving leftovers! This easy-to-make casserole is packed with your favorite holiday flavors, including turkey, stuffing, cranberry sauce, and creamy mashed potatoes. Simply layer all of the ingredients in a baking dish and bake until heated through. You'll have a delicious and satisfying meal that the whole family will love in no time.

ingredients.name: Great Value Turkey Flavored Stuffing Mix, 6 oz
Sunnyvalley Smoked Turkey Necks, Fresh, Fully Cooked, 1-2 Pound. Tray pack. Gluten free.
ingredients.description: 1 lb Leftover Cooked Turkey, coarsely chopped

ingredients.name: Great Value Mayonnaise, 15 fl oz
Ocean Spray Jellied Cranberry Sauce, 14 oz Can
Bob Evans Original Mashed Potatoes, Refrigerated Dinner Sides, 24 oz, Pack of 1
Great Value Colby & Monterey Jack Cheese, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 1 1/2 cups Finely Shredded Colby Monterey Jack Cheese

ingredients.name: Fresh Curly Parsley Bunch, Each

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Coat an 8-inch baking dish with non-stick cooking spray.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In a small bowl, combine 1/4 cup mayonnaise and cranberry sauce.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: In another bowl, combine remaining 1/2 cup of mayo, mash potatoes and cheese

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Place half of the Stuffing Mix (4 cups) in the dish then top with Turkey (2 cups) .

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Spread mayonnaise mixture over the top then mash potato mixture. Lastly, top with remaining stuffing.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Bake for 25 minutes or until heated through.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Cut out a piece and optional garnish with chopped parsley. Serve.

632e2e259ffb2b9e164b57ac38cbdf90.title: Buffalo chicken sliders
632e2e259ffb2b9e164b57ac38cbdf90.description: Brackets are complete and all that’s missing is food to fuel your team’s run. Huddle around the kitchen as Frankie preps the ultimate watch party spread. These savory, spicy and sweet dishes are championship-worthy even if your bracket goes bust.

ingredients.name: Great Value All Natural Boneless Skinless Chicken Thighs, 3 lb (Frozen)
ingredients.description: 8 boneless chicken thighs for buffalo chicken slider

ingredients.name: Frank's RedHot Buffalo Wings Hot Sauce, 12 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1 bottle wings hot sauce for buffalo chicken slider

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Salted Butter, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 3 tablespoons butter for buffalo chicken slider

ingredients.name: Sam's Choice Sweet Hawaiian Slider Buns, 12 oz, 12 Count
ingredients.description: 16 slider buns for buffalo chicken slider

ingredients.name: Fresh Whole Carrots, 1 lb Bag
Fresh Celery Sticks, 20 oz Bag
ingredients.description: 3 celery stalks for buffalo chicken slider

ingredients.name: Great Value All Natural Sour Cream, 8 oz Tub
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup sour cream for ranch dressing

ingredients.name: Great Value Mayonnaise, 15 fl oz
Fresh Curly Parsley Bunch, Each
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup chopped parsley leaves for ranch dressing

ingredients.name: Sprout House Fresh Cut Chives - 0.75oz
ingredients.description: 2 tablespoons minced chives for ranch dressing

ingredients.name: Great Value Dijon Mustard, 12 oz Squeeze Bottle
ingredients.description: 1 dijon mustard packet for ranch dressing

ingredients.name: Great Value Garlic Powder, 3.4 oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder for ranch dressing

ingredients.name: Great Value Onion Powder, 3.25 oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 teaspoon onion powder for ranch dressing

ingredients.name: Great Value Black Pepper & Iodized Salt, 5.25 oz
ingredients.description: Salt and pepper for ranch dressing

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Buffalo Chicken Slider - Season the chicken thighs with salt and pepper and place into a slow cooker with the hot sauce. Set the slow cooker on low and cook for 6-7 hours.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Buffalo Chicken Slider - Shred the chicken with two forks. Add the butter and stir into the sauce as it melts.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Buffalo Chicken Slider - To assemble, use a vegetable peeler to cut the carrot and celery into long ribbons. Spread ranch dressing on both sides of the slider bun, and top with shredded chicken, celery and carrot ribbons.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Ranch Dressing - Add the mayonnaise, sour cream, parsley, chives, dijon mustard, garlic powder, onion powder, salt and pepper to a bowl and mix to combine.

fe1af462a5cbb454c1578b253d5a3071.title: Goat cheese + chive flatbread
fe1af462a5cbb454c1578b253d5a3071.description: Don’t sleep on these 5-ingredient recipes – simple weeknight meals that are anything but boring, and with a few pantry staples, you’ll have dinner on the table in no time.

ingredients.name: GV All Purpose Flour 2LB Bag
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon
Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Cherry Tomato, 10 oz Package
Montchevre Original Crumbled Goat Cheese 4 oz
Sprout House Fresh Cut Chives - 0.75oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 500 degrees F. Add the flour and salt to a medium sized bowl and stir to combine. Stir in the warm water and 1/4 cup oil, mix well. Turn the dough out onto a floured surface, put your arms into it and knead for 5 minutes. Form a ball, cover with plastic and allow dough to rest in the fridge for half an hour.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Grease a 9x13 inch baking sheet with 1 tablespoon olive oil. Sprinkle your surface with flour to roll out the dough, using more flour as needed to prevent it from sticking. Lay the dough on the baking sheet. Arrange the cherry tomato halves throughout the dough, followed by the goat cheese in evenly spaced dollops. Drizzle the top with olive oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Bake until the edges are golden, 17-20 minutes. Garnish with fresh chives.

83e025307c0994370a87cc7593a9e93b.title: Holiday-perfect baked glazed ham
83e025307c0994370a87cc7593a9e93b.description: This holiday season, delight your guests with a delicious baked ham that will surely please everyone at the table. Our Holiday-Perfect Baked Glazed Ham Recipe is easy to follow and yields a delightful main dish perfect for a big family gathering. The key to this recipe's success is its flavorful, juicy glaze. Made with honey, brown sugar, and cider vinegar, this tantalizing glaze is the perfect complement to root vegetables.

ingredients.name: Great Value Hickory Smoked Ham Steak, Fully Cooked, Pork Bone-In, 1.0 - 2.0 lb
Great Value Whole Cloves, 1.3 oz
(6 Pack) Dole Light Pineapple Juice, 6 fl oz, 6 Count Cans
Great Value Honey, 12 oz
Great Value Dijon Mustard, 12 oz Squeeze Bottle
C&H Premium Pure Cane Dark Brown Sugar, 2 lb
Great Value Organic Ground Allspice, 1.6 oz
Navel Oranges, 4 lb Bag
Fresh Curly Parsley Bunch, Each
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup Chopped Fresh Parsley for Optional Garnish

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C).

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Score the surface of the Cooked Ham (1) with your knife to make shallow, diagonal cuts across the ham. Each score should be about 1/3-inch in depth and then in the opposite direction, making diamond shapes. The scores should extend all the way from top to bottom on each side of the ham. Leave about 1-inch between cuts. Insert one Whole Cloves (1 Tbsp) in each diamond.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In a large saucepan, whisk to combine Fresh Pineapple Juice (1/2 cup) , Honey (1/2 cup) , Dijon Mustard (1/4 cup) , Dark Brown Sugar (1 cup) , and Ground Allspice (1 tsp) . Bring over to medium-low heat and simmer for 10-15 minutes stir occasionally until slightly thickened. Remove from heat and set aside.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: On a rack in a roasting pan, add water, about 2-inch in depth. Place the ham and brush half of the glaze over it. Cover the ham with foil.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Bake in the oven for 1 1/2 hours. Reserve the remaining glaze for later use.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Uncover the ham. Brush half of the glaze over the ham. Bake uncovered in the preheated oven until the internal temperature is 140 degrees F (60 degrees C) or until the glaze is caramelized and browned, about 10 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Transfer to a serving dish. Optionally, garnish with Orange Slices (2) , Fresh Parsley (1/2 cup) on the side of the dish. Slice the ham and serve it with your favorite side dishes!

2bc7c6055e8f8e18475ff045ee0ccbd4.title: Thanksgiving green bean salad
2bc7c6055e8f8e18475ff045ee0ccbd4.description: This salad is chock-full of holiday goodness, with crunchy pecans, tart cranberries, and blanched green beans, bringing flavor and texture to the table. And since you can serve it at room temperature, there is no need to worry about the precious refrigerator space. This Thanksgiving, ditch the tired green bean casserole and mix things up with this delicious green bean salad.

ingredients.name: Marketside Fresh Green Beans, 12 oz
ingredients.description: 1 lb. Fresh Green Beans, trimmed and washed

ingredients.name: Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
Great Value Chopped Pecans, 4 oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup Pecans, toasted and coarsely chopped

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweetened Dried Cranberries, 6 OZ
Great Value Grated Italian Style Blend Cheese, 8 oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup Grated Italian Style Blend Cheese

ingredients.name: Great Value Traditional Italian Dressing & Marinade, 8 oz Bottle
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
ingredients.description: Fresh Ground Pepper, to taste (for seasoning finished salad)

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Fill a medium-sized pot with water then add the salt, and bring water to a boil.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add beans to the water when it comes to a boil and cook for 4-5 minutes, or just until the beans are almost done but still slightly crisp.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Drain immediately into a colander placed in the sink and rinse with very cold water. Let beans drain in the colander for a few minutes.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Lay out a paper towel, spread out the beans, put another paper towel over the top, and blot dry, until the beans are as dry as you can get them.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: When the beans are dry, put them into a large mixing bowl and toss with dressing.  (At this point the beans can marinate on the counter for several hours until you’re ready to serve the salad.)

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Toss all ingredients together and season to taste with more fresh-ground black pepper.

a6b25b55d0c20f3f9dbc606e544f52df.title: Homemade stuffing with sausage and ham
a6b25b55d0c20f3f9dbc606e544f52df.description: This Homemade Stuffing With Sausage and Ham recipe is perfect for Thanksgiving or any other special occasion. It's made from scratch with simple, affordable ingredients and tastes even better than any store-bought mix you have ever tried.

ingredients.name: Freshness Guaranteed French Bread, 14 oz
ingredients.description: 1 medium French Bread, cubed and toasted

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
Farmland Original Pork Breakfast Sausage Roll, 16 oz
Oscar Mayer Original Bacon Naturally Hardwood Smoked, 16 Oz Pack
Great Value Hickory Smoked Ham Steak, Fully Cooked, Pork Bone-In, 1.0 - 2.0 lb
Yellow Onions, Each
Fresh Celery Stalk, Each
Swanson 100% Natural, Gluten-Free Chicken Stock, 32 oz Carton
Great Value Poultry Seasoning, 1.5 oz
Crisco Pure Vegetable Oil, 16 fl oz
Fresh Curly Parsley Bunch, Each
Great Value Black Pepper & Iodized Salt, 5.25 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a deep frying pan, cook bacon over medium-low heat for 5 minutes or until the fat is released.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add sausage and ham, use a spatula to break up the pieces, season with poultry mix and cook for about 6-7 minutes or until cooked. Remove from the heat, transfer into a large bowl and set aside.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: In the same pan, add vegetable oil over medium-low heat. Add onion and celery, stir until the vegetables are soft.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Pour stock and bring to boil. Stir in butter until melted and add French bread. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Stir in cooked sausage mixture and mix until well combined.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Transfer the stuffing mixture to a 9x13 inch baking dish (or 11 inch diameter round baking dish)

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Bake in the preheated oven uncovered for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown and crisp on top.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Let stand for 10 minutes. Sprinkle the top with parsley. Serve as a side dish.

7e446e865fa9f01033898f82557ebe04.title: Oven-roasted turkey breast with mustard maple glaze
7e446e865fa9f01033898f82557ebe04.description: This Oven-Roasted Turkey Breast with Mustard Maple Glaze Recipe is the perfect solution if you're looking for a smaller, more convenient holiday turkey alternative. This recipe is easy to follow and makes a juicy, tender, and flavorful main dish. The key to success is in the seasoning - a mixture of herbs gives this turkey breast a beautiful flavor that is perfect for the holidays. And the maple mustard glaze not only makes this dish look stunning on the table and adds a delicious festive touch.

ingredients.name: Jennie-O Frozen Oven-Ready Boneless Turkey Breast, 2- 3 lb
Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Garlic Bulb, Each
Great Value Italian Seasoning, 2 oz
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Maple Grove Farms Organic Pure Maple Syrup, 8.5 fl oz
Great Value Yellow Mustard, 8 oz
Great Value Worcestershire Sauce, 10 fl Ounce
Great Value Less Sodium Soy Sauce, 15 fl oz
POM Wonderful Fresh Pomegranate Arils, 4 oz
Fresh Curly Parsley Bunch, Each
Rocket Farms Fresh Cut Rosemary, .75 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a small bowl, add the oil, garlic, Italian Seasoning, salt and pepper. Mix until well combined.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Using your clean hands rub the herb mixture all over the turkey breast.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Transfer to a rimmed baking sheet with a wire rack underneath the turkey breast and roast for about 35 minutes in total.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Meanwhile, in a small glass bowl, mix all the glaze ingredients.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: When the turkey breast reaches the 15 min time mark, pour half of the glaze over and turn the sheet pan around to get even coloring.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Return to the oven and roast for another 15 min.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Remove from the oven, brush with the remaining glaze. Place back in the oven to roast for the final 5 min, or until a thermometer inserted into the thickest part of the turkey registers 165 degrees F.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Once the turkey breast is done, remove from the oven and cover with foil. Allow it to rest for 10 minutes before carving.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Slice the breast and place on a nice serving platter. Decorate as you will, then serve and enjoy with the optional garnishes.

89d833cf3c180ca07353d5df8d7e5546.title: Shake 'n frank
89d833cf3c180ca07353d5df8d7e5546.description: Frankie cooks his way back in time with his favorite vintage recipes. These oldie-but-goodie dishes are not only nostalgic and comforting, but they’ll also fill you up without costing you a pretty penny.

ingredients.name: Foster Farms Fresh & Natural Cage Free Family Pack Chicken Drumsticks 64 -91.2 oz (4-5.7 lb) Tray
Great Value Black Pepper & Iodized Salt, 5.25 oz
ingredients.description: Salt and pepper, to taste, for chicken drumsticks,Salt and pepper, for mashed potatoes

ingredients.name: Crystal Creamery Old World Style Bulgarian Cultured Buttermilk, 1 Quart
Crystal Louisiana's Pure Hot Sauce, 12 Fl Oz
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon hot sauce, for chicken drumsticks

ingredients.name: Great Value Plain Panko Bread Crumbs, 8 oz
ingredients.description: 3 cups panko breadcrumbs, for chicken drumsticks

ingredients.name: Great Value Organic Thyme Leaves, 0.6 oz
ingredients.description: 2 teaspoons chopped fresh thyme leaves, for chicken drumsticks

ingredients.name: Great Value Garlic Powder, 3.4 oz
ingredients.description: 2 teaspoons garlic powder, for chicken drumsticks

ingredients.name: Great Value Onion Powder, 3.25 oz
ingredients.description: 2 teaspoons onion powder, for chicken drumsticks

ingredients.name: Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon olive oil, for chicken drumsticks

ingredients.name: Russet Baking Potatoes, Each
ingredients.description: 3 russet potatoes, peeled and cut into large chunks, for mashed potatoes

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Salted Butter, 16 oz
Great Value 2% Reduced Fat Milk, Half Gallon, 64 fl oz
Sprout House Fresh Cut Chives - 0.75oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Chicken Drumsticks - Heat oven to 400 degrees F. Line a sheet tray with a wire rack and set aside.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Chicken Drumsticks - Add breadcrumbs, thyme, garlic powder, onion powder, and olive oil to a quarter sheet tray and season with salt and pepper. Place in the oven to toast for 4 minutes, stirring halfway through, until just golden. Remove from the oven and cool. Turn oven temperature up to 425 degrees F.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Chicken Drumsticks - Season the chicken drumsticks with salt and pepper. Whisk together the buttermilk and hot sauce in a large bowl. Add the drumsticks to the bowl and toss with tongs until well coated. Allow to marinate for 15 minutes or up to several hours in the fridge.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Chicken Drumsticks - Transfer breadcrumb mix to a lunch-size paper bag. Working with 1-2 drumsticks at a time, remove from the buttermilk mixture, letting the excess moisture drip off, and add to the bag. Fold the bag shut and shake to coat the drumsticks. Maybe dance while shaking. Lay drumsticks on the wire rack, and repeat with remaining drumsticks.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Chicken Drumsticks - Bake the chicken on the wire rack for 50 minutes, until golden and a thermometer inserted in the thickest part of the meat reaches 165 degrees F.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Mashed Potatoes - While the chicken cooks, add the peeled and cut potatoes to a large pot of water and bring to a boil. Add flavor by salting the boiled water. Cook until very tender, 15-20 minutes. Remove potatoes from the water with a slotted spoon and add the butter and milk. Mash until fluffy and creamy. Season with salt and pepper and garnish with chives.

849c7cbf926561a9b235c932df171a11.title: Easy black bean corn salad
849c7cbf926561a9b235c932df171a11.description: This light and refreshing summer salad is surprisingly filling at the same time. It is packed with protein from the black beans and bursts with flavor from sweet corn, charred red onion, avocados, and zesty lime juice dressing.

ingredients.name: Fresh Sweet Corn on the Cob (1 each)
ingredients.description: 6 ears Fresh Sweet Corn, husks and silks removed, cut off the cob

ingredients.name: Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Fresh Red Onions, Each
ingredients.description: 1 large Red Onion, cut into chunky bite-sized pieces

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup Unsalted Butter, diced into medium cubes

ingredients.name: Garlic Bulb, Each
Great Value Black Beans, 15 oz Can
ingredients.description: 1 (15-oz) can Black Beans, drained and rinsed

ingredients.name: Great Value Canned Medium Diced Green Chiles, 4 Oz
ingredients.description: 1 (4-ounce) can Fire-roasted Green Chiles, with liquid

ingredients.name: Concord Foods Reconstituted Lime Juice, 4.5 oz
Fresh Cilantro, Bunch
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
FUD Cotija Mexican Style Grating Cheese 8 oz. Bag
Avocados, Each
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Great Value Crushed Red Pepper, 1.75 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a large skillet, heat 2 Tbsp olive oil on medium high heat and drop in half the corn. Once the corn starts to char and blister, take it out. About 4-5 minutes. Repeat with the rest of the corn. Put in a large bowl.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In the same pan, add  2 tbsp of olive oil, drop in red onion and garlic and sauté for 2-3 minutes until charred as well. Place in the mixing bowl with the corn.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Immediately add the butter cubes to the bowl and stir to combine to melt the butter cubes.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add the avocados, black beans, green chiles, lime juice, cilantro, salt, pepper, chili flakes, and stir to combine. Top with Cotija cheese.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Serve with lime wedges and tortilla chips.

bf5dd718f8f4356bcedbb85924585631.title: Baked chicken thighs in cranberry balsamic marinade
bf5dd718f8f4356bcedbb85924585631.description: Roasted balsamic chicken with cranberries is a quick, easy weeknight dinner perfect for cozy fall and winter nights. This sheet pan meal is made with flavourful, succulent, and tender boneless chicken thighs marinated in a delicious sweet and tangy balsamic marinade and roasted with red onions and cranberry sauce for the most amazing flavor. You will not believe how much flavor is packed into one dish with so little prep!

ingredients.name: Great Value All Natural Boneless Skinless Chicken Thighs, 3 lb (Frozen)
Great Value Balsamic Vinegar of Modena, 8.45 fl oz
Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Star Italian Kitchen Red Wine Vinegar, 12 fl oz
Great Value Honey, 12 oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Fresh Red Onions, Each
Ocean Spray Whole Berry Cranberry Sauce, 14 oz
ingredients.description: 1 can (14 oz) Whole Berry Cranberry Sauce

ingredients.name: Great Value Organic Herbs de Provence, 0.6 oz
Rocket Farms Fresh Cut Rosemary, .75 oz
Bob Evans Original Mashed Potatoes, Refrigerated Dinner Sides, 24 oz, Pack of 1

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a medium mixing bowl, combine Balsamic Vinegar (1/4 cup) , Olive Oil (2 Tbsp) , Red Wine Vinegar (1 Tbsp) , Honey (1 tsp) , Herbes de Provence (3 Tbsp) , Salt (1 tsp) , and Ground Black Pepper (1/4 tsp) , and stir to combine.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add Chicken Thighs (4) to the marinade, then toss to combine.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Coat a rimmed baking sheet with the remaining Olive Oil (2 Tbsp) . Then, add Red Onion (1) in an even layer, and scatter chicken thighs between them, pouring the extra marinade on top of the onions. Add the Whole Berry Cranberry Sauce (1 can) scattered over the top.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Roast for 20 to 25 minutes, or until the juice from the chicken runs clear (when the thickest part of the thigh reads at least 165 degrees F (75 degrees C) on a meat thermometer).

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Optionally, garnish with Fresh Rosemary (2 sprigs) and serve with Mashed Potatoes (to taste) , if desired.

ingredients.name: Argo Cornstarch 100% Cornstarch Gluten free
Foster Farms Fresh & Natural Cage Free Family Pack Chicken Wings 72 -91.2 oz (4.5 -5.7 lb) Tray
ingredients.description: 2 lb chicken wings, rinsed and patted dry

ingredients.name: King Arthur Flour Unbleached All-Purpose Flour 5 lb. Bag
Great Value Garlic Powder, 3.4 oz
Lawry's Casero Cayenne Pepper, 1.62 oz
Great Value Double Acting Baking Powder, 8.1 oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon
1-2-3 Vegetable Oil, 33.8 fl oz Bottle
ingredients.description: peanut or vegetable oil, for frying

ingredients.name: Sweet Baby Ray's Garlic Buffalo Wing Sauce, 16 fl oz
Great Value Classic Ranch Salad Dressing & Dip, 16 fl oz
ingredients.description: ranch or blue cheese dip, for serving

ingredients.name: Marketside Fresh Celery Sticks, 1.6 oz, 4 Pack
ingredients.description: 1 stalk celery sticks, for serving, cut into sticks

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a bowl, toss 1/4 cup (30 grams) of cornstarch and the chicken wings together until fully coated. Transfer the wings to a wire rack and let rest and dry out for 20 minutes, ideally in the fridge if you have space.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a medium bowl, whisk together the remaining 1/2 cup of cornstarch, the flour, paprika, garlic powder, cayenne, baking powder, salt, and pepper. Gradually whisk in the water, breaking up any lumps and mixing until smooth. The batter should be slightly runny.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Heat the oil in a large pot until it reaches 350°F (180°C).

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Coat chicken wings in the batter, shaking off any excess. Add the wings to the oil in batches, cooking for 8-10 minutes until golden brown. Transfer the chicken wings wot a wire rack set over a paper towel-lined baking sheet.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Transfer the chicken to a clean bowl and drizzle with with the buffalo sauce, tossing to coat. Transfer to a serving plate. Serve with either ranch or blue cheese dressing and celery sticks.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

ingredients.name: Crisco Pure Vegetable Oil, 16 fl oz
Yellow Onions, Each
Garlic Bulb, Each
Fresh Ginger Root, Each
ingredients.description: ginger, peeled and grated, 1 inch (2 1/2 cm) piece

ingredients.name: Great Value Canned Hot Diced Jalapeno Peppers, 4 oz
ingredients.description: 1 jalapeño, or green chile, seeded and sliced

ingredients.name: Morton and Bassett Garam Masala, 1.9 oz

Lemons, Each
Fresh Cilantro, Bunch

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Heat olive oil in a large stock pot or dutch oven over medium-high heat.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add onion and cook until onion becomes translucent and begins to brown, about 3-5 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add garlic, ginger, and jalapeño. Continue to cook over medium heat until garlic is fragrant and jalapeño is tender, about 3-4 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add garam masala, turmeric, salt, and pepper then continue to cook for 1-2 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Add tomatoes, chickpeas, and water. Stir to incorporate, making sure to use the spoon the scrape off any brown bits that have appeared on the bottom or sides of the pot.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: As the tomatoes break down, the mixture should take on the texture of a thick stew. Add more water if needed before bringing everything to a simmer and then cover with a lid.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Once covered, cook for 15 minutes while stirring occasionally.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Remove lid, reduce heat to low and mix in the lemon juice and chopped cilantro. Cook over low heat 1-2 minutes until the cilantro has wilted and turned bright green.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Serve over basmati rice or with a side of naan.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

ingredients.name: Beef Choice Angus T-Bone Steak Bone-In, 0.53 - 2.23 lb, Tray
ingredients.description: 1 1/2 lb ribeye steak, or any other well-marbled, tender cut

ingredients.name: Yellow Onions, Each
ingredients.description: 1 onion, 1/2 roughly chopped and 1/2 thinly sliced

ingredients.name: Garlic Bulb, Each
Anjou Pears, Each
Fresh Green Onions Bunch, Each
ingredients.description: 3 spring onions, 1 cut into pieces and 2 sliced into 1/4-inch rounds

ingredients.name: Great Value Light Brown Sugar, 32 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Great Value Less Sodium Soy Sauce, 15 fl oz
Imperial Dragon 100% Pure Sesame Seed Oil, 5 fl oz
Great Value Canola Oil, 48 fl oz
El Guapo Whole Sesame Seed (Ajonjol Entero), 2 oz
Great Value Long Grain Enriched Rice, 32 oz
Annie Chun's Korean Sweet Chili Noodle Bowl,7.9-Oz Units

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Slice the beef as thinly as you can, then set aside in a large bowl. Using frozen or cold beef will make the slicing easier.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a blender or food processor, blend the onion chunks, garlic, pear, green onion pieces, brown sugar, pepper, soy sauce, and sesame oil until smooth.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Pour the marinade over the beef, add the thinly sliced onion, then mix to coat evenly. Cover with plastic wrap and marinate in the fridge for at least 30 minutes, or overnight.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Heat the canola oil in a large skillet over high heat. Pat the meat dry.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Serve with rice and side dishes.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

ingredients.name: Great Value Whole Vitamin D Milk, Half Gallon, 64 fl oz
Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon
Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
Great Value Sugar Cannister 20oz
Great Value Active Dry Yeast, 0.25 oz, 3 Count
King Arthur Flour Unbleached All-Purpose Flour 5 lb. Bag
ingredients.description: 4 cups all-purpose flour, plus more for dusting

ingredients.name: Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count
Great Value Peanut Oil, 1 Gal
Morton Sea Salt, Fine, 4.4 Ounce

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a liquid measuring cup or small bowl, combine the warm milk, warm water, melted butter, and sugar.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Sprinkle the yeast evenly over the wet ingredients, stir to combine, and let stand for 5 minutes, until foamy

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, combine the flour and salt, and stir to combine. Beat 1 egg, then add to the bloomed yeast mixture. Pour the wet ingredients into the flour and use a knife to stir until the mixture just comes together and forms a dough. Turn the dough out onto a lightly floured surface and knead for 5-10 minutes, or until the dough becomes smooth. Add more flour as needed to keep the dough from sticking. To test if it’s done, tear off a small piece of dough and stretch into a thin layer. If the dough doesn’t rip, it’s ready. Or, press a finger into the dough to see if it bounces back.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Lightly grease a large glass bowl with oil. Add the dough, cover with plastic wrap, and let rest for 1 hour, or until doubled in size.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Punch down the dough, then turn out onto a floured surface. Knead for a few more minutes, just until the dough is smooth, about 2 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Divide the dough into 16 equal balls, roughly the size of tangerines.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Knead the balls, gathering the edges of the dough toward the center to make a taut, round ball with a smooth top.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Place the rolls on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet. Cover with plastic wrap and let rise for 30 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Beat the remaining egg in a small bowl. Uncover the rolls and brush with the egg wash. Lightly sprinkle the rolls with sea salt.

tasks.title: Step 11
tasks.instruction: Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the rolls have lightly browned and doubled in size.

tasks.title: Step 12
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

ingredients.name: Freshness Guaranteed Thin-Sliced Chicken Breasts, 1.7 - 3.0 lb
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Season the chicken with salt and pepper.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Cut the chicken into thin strips then coat in the egg wash and flour.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Shallow fry for a few minutes on each side, until golden brown.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add the peppers and fry for another couple of minutes. Remove the chicken and peppers and set aside.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: In the same pan, add the garlic, red chilli, soy sauce, tomato purée, and water. Stir and simmer the mixture reduces and is thick and syrupy.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Add back in the chicken and peppers and stir well in the sauce.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Serve with rice.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

ba527b1ac0e75ca5c455a5a72b74e223.title: Baked beet falafel salad
ba527b1ac0e75ca5c455a5a72b74e223.description: This twist on falafel includes beets with chickpeas and spices. Not only do the beets provide a boost of nutrition, but they also add a touch of natural sweetness. Baked rather than fried and served on a bed of greens and drizzled with lemony tahini dressing for fun Middle Eastern-inspired dinner.

ingredients.name: Great Value Garbanzos Chick Peas, 15.5 oz
ingredients.description: 1 Can (approximately 15 oz.) chickpeas, rinsed and drained

ingredients.name: Fresh Beets, Bunch

ingredients.description: 2 Tablespoons lemon juice for Lemon Tahini Dressing

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Pre-heat the oven to 400 degrees.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add the chickpeas, beets, sesame paste, flour, cumin, garlic powder, baking powder, salt, pepper and parsley to a food processor. Puree until smooth, occasionally scraping down the sides of the bowl with a spatula.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Using a 1 oz. scoop, form balls and place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Bake for 30 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Make the lemony tahini sauce by stirring together the sesame paste, water, garlic powder, lemon juice, salt and pepper until smooth.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Spread out mixed greens on a platter, add the falafel balls and drizzle with the lemony tahini sauce.

1c475f757fe13f1ba83d610a0330361a.title: Chicken piccata
1c475f757fe13f1ba83d610a0330361a.description: Don’t sleep on these 5-ingredient recipes – simple weeknight meals that are anything but boring, and with a few pantry staples, you’ll have dinner on the table in no time.

ingredients.name: Foster Farms Fresh & Natural Boneless & Skinless Chicken Breast Fillets, 1.6 - 2.39 lb
ingredients.description: 2 chicken breast, butterflied and cut in half

ingredients.name: GV All Purpose Flour 2LB Bag
Great Value Sweet Cream Salted Butter, 16 oz
Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Concord Foods Lemon Juice, 4.5 oz
Great Value Nonpareille Capers, 3 fl oz
Great Value Black Pepper & Iodized Salt, 5.25 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Season the chicken with salt and pepper and dredge in flour to ensure it's nice and dry. Heat a large skillet over medium high heat. Add 2 butter pats and the olive oil. Add the chicken to the pan and cook until golden brown, 3-5 minutes. Flip and cook an additional 3-5 minutes. Transfer to a plate.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add the remaining butter pat to the pan with the lemon juice, and capers. Swirl the pan around to create a loose salad-dressing like emulsion. Simmer for 4-5 minutes, then return the chicken to the pan, along with any resting juices and simmer for another 2-3 minutes, basting the chicken with the sauce. Serve the chicken with the sauce on top.

8b0e2e6f489ce70b701925705c8d6265.title: Roasted potato & kale caesar salad
8b0e2e6f489ce70b701925705c8d6265.description: A comforting spin on Caesar Salad. Roasted baby potatoes, bacon bits, kale, parmesan and boiled egg served with your favorite Caesar dressing. This is a showstopper salad to serve at a BBQ or gathering.

ingredients.name: Baby Yellow Potatoes, 1.5 lb Bag
Great Value Lemon & Pepper Seasoning, 4.25 oz
Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count
Great Value Real Bacon Pieces, 2.5 oz
Fresh Green Kale Bunch, Each
Lemons, Each
Great Value Grated Parmesan Cheese, 8 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 400°F. Gather all your ingredients.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Bring a large and small pot of water to the boil. Boil the eggs for 8-10 minutes (depending on your preference).

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: At the same time, boil the potatoes for 20 minutes, rinse with cold water and slice the potatoes in half. Spread them out onto a baking tray and season well with lemon pepper seasoning and ¾ of the olive oil.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Roast the potatoes for 15 to 20 minutes or until golden and crispy. Meanwhile, cool the eggs in a bowl of ice-cold water. Wash the kale, remove the stalks and tear into bite size pieces. Dice the bacon.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Fry the bacon until crispy.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, massage remaining olive and the lemon juice into the kale. This is when you can add the Caesar dressing too or serve on the side.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Peel and slice the eggs into halves or wedges.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Toss most of the parmesan as well as lemon zest with the kale.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Layer up the kale onto a platter with roasted potatoes, crispy bacon, eggs and remaining parmesan.
