tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Slice the pork into extremely thin slices, then transfer to a large bowl. This works best when the pork is super cold or partially frozen.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add in all of the ingredients besides the canola oil, then mix until the pork and the vegetables are evenly coated with the marinade

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Cover and marinate in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Heat the oil in a pan over high heat, add pork, being sure not to crowd the pan, stir-fry the pork in batches until slightly crispy on the edges, about 3-4 minutes. If you’re using pork belly, cook for a bit longer, around 6-7 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Sprinkle a bit of sesame seeds on top, then serve with rice!

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

15d572bc60a55c87fb085bca415dbfb6.title: No bake pumpkin pie dip
15d572bc60a55c87fb085bca415dbfb6.description: This creamy pumpkin pie dip comes together in minutes, requires no baking time, and will become your favorite fall dessert. With holidays just around the corner, this pumpkin pie dip is perfect for family get together, potlucks, or a simple snack your kids will love. Serve it with your favorite cookies and watch it disappear.

ingredients.name: Great Value Heavy Whipping Cream, 16 Oz
Jell-O Vanilla Instant Pudding Mix & Pie Filling, 3.4 oz. Box
Libby's 100% Pure Canned Pumpkin all natural no preservatives, 15 oz
Great Value Pumpkin Pie Spice, 2 oz
Great Value Kosher Ground Cinnamon, 2.5 Oz
Ginger Snaps Cookies, Ginger Cookies, 16 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a stand mixer, beat heavy cream and vanilla pudding mix until stiff peaks form, about 1 minute.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add pumpkin, pumpkin pie spice and ground cinnamon, stir to combine.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Serve with ginger snaps cookies.

66393f6908b882bd66614a62f78709b9.title: Brown butter brussels sprouts with bacon bits
66393f6908b882bd66614a62f78709b9.description: These Brown Butter Brussels Sprouts with Bacon Bits are keto and low carb – but packed with flavor. Don’t be surprised when these brussels sprouts are the first thing off the table at your dinner – they are loaded with rich buttery deliciousness and tons of crunchy bacon bits!

ingredients.name: Fresh Brussels Sprouts, 1 lb Bag
Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Garlic Bulb, Each
Lawry's Casero Paprika, 1.87 oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 tsp Salt, plus more to taste

ingredients.name: Oscar Mayer Original Bacon Naturally Hardwood Smoked, 16 Oz Pack
Great Value Salted Butter Sticks, 8 oz, 2 Sticks
Great Value Canola Oil Non-Stick Cooking Spray, 8 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Lemons, Each

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Grease a large baking dish with Nonstick Cooking Spray (as needed) . Set aside.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add Brussels Sprouts (7 1/2 cups) to a large bowl and toss with Olive Oil (2 Tbsp) , Garlic (1 Tbsp) , and Paprika (1 tsp) .

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Transfer the brussels sprouts to the prepared baking dish and spread out evenly. The brussels sprouts should be snug together but in a single layer.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Sprinkle Salt (1/4 tsp) over the brussels sprouts and bake in the oven for 25 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Meanwhile, cook the Wright® Brand Smoked Bacon (4 slices) in a medium skillet until browned and crispy. Transfer the cooked bacon to a paper towel-lined plate to rest for 3-4 minutes before chopping.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Add Salted Butter (1/4 cup) to a small skillet and brown over medium-high heat, stirring frequently until brown flecks form on the bottom of the pan about 4-5 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Reduce heat to low and add the chopped bacon to the butter and cook for 1 minute more.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Pour the butter and bacon mixture over the top of the roasted brussels sprouts and season with additional salt and Ground Black Pepper (to taste) , if desired. Toss to coat

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Serve with Lemon Zest (to taste) and Lemon Wedges.

dfb8b21a877d4dcd0105711c0b185ce6.title: Oven roasted chicken thighs with root vegetables
dfb8b21a877d4dcd0105711c0b185ce6.description: Roasted Chicken Thighs with Root Vegetables is a delicious, convenient, and simple weeknight meal to add to your rotation. Tender chicken thighs are roasted alongside seasoned vegetables - this one-pan meal is packed with flavor and makes clean-up super easy.

ingredients.name: Foster Farms Fresh & Natural Cage Free Family Pack Chicken Thighs 64 -88 oz (4-5.5 lb) Tray
Fresh Brussels Sprouts, 1 lb Bag
ingredients.description: 10 oz Brussels Sprouts, trimmed and halved

ingredients.name: Baby Yellow Potatoes, 1.5 lb Bag

ingredients.name: Garlic Bulb, Each

Great Value Black Pepper & Iodized Salt, 5.25 oz
Fresh Italian Parsley Bunch, Each

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 475 degrees F.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a large mixing bowl toss brussels sprouts, potatoes, shallots, carrots, garlic, oil, 3/4 tsp dried thyme, 1/2 tsp dried rosemary, sugar, 3/4 tsp salt, 1/4 tsp pepper together.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Pat chicken dry with paper towels and season with salt and pepper.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Place vegetables in a single layer on an 18 x 13-inch rimmed baking sheet. Place chicken, skin side up, on top of vegetables.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Roast for 35 - 40 minutes or until internal temperature reaches 175 degrees F, rotating the baking sheet halfway through roasting.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Serve on the sheet pan with chopped parsley.

d73f197293632f87a79e6f600bb15229.description: Asparagus quinoa salad is a perfect spring dish that is fresh, simple, and healthy. This delicious salad is topped with crumbled feta cheese and served with a simple homemade lemon vinaigrette dressing - a foolproof salad recipe to enjoy on any day of the week.

Great Value Organic White Quinoa, 16 oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz

Frigo Crumbleed Feta Cheese, 5 Oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
ingredients.description: Black Pepper, to taste,Black Pepper, to taste, for Lemon Vinaigrette

ingredients.name: Fresh Green Onions Bunch, Each
ingredients.description: 1 small Shallot, diced, for Lemon Vinaigrette

ingredients.name: Mint Fresh Cut, 0.75 oz
ingredients.description: 1 Tbsp Mint, finely chopped, for Lemon Vinaigrette

ingredients.name: Great Value Dijon Mustard, 12 oz Squeeze Bottle
ingredients.description: 2 tsp Dijon Mustard, for Lemon Vinaigrette

ingredients.name: Garlic Bulb, Each
ingredients.description: 1 clove Garlic, minced, for Lemon Vinaigrette

ingredients.name: Great Value Honey, 12 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: To make the dressing, in a small bowl, add olive oil, shallot, mint, lemon juice, mustard, honey and garlic. Whisk until emulsified. Season with salt and pepper and set aside.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a medium saucepan, add water, quinoa and salt to a boil. Once starting to boil, reduce the heat to low and cook covered until water is absorbed, about 10 minutes. Remove from heat and fluff with a fork.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Meanwhile, heat a large skillet with olive oil over medium heat and add asparagus and fresh lemon juice. Cook until asparagus turns bright green and become fork tender, about 5 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: To a large bowl, add quinoa, asparagus, chickpeas, tomato, avocado, cranberries, almonds, and feta cheese.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve right away.

f08c8920e554d0484d644b44d8bf9cae.title: Ghanaian jollof rice by tei hammond
f08c8920e554d0484d644b44d8bf9cae.description: Ghanaian Jollof Rice By Tei Hammond

ingredients.name: Yellow Onions, Each
Crisco Pure Vegetable Oil, 16 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1/3 cup vegetable oil, plus 2 tablespoons, divided

ingredients.name: Great Value Petite Diced Tomatoes in Tomato Juice, 14.5 Oz
Great Value Tomato Paste, 6 oz
O'Brothers Organic Habanero Pepper Sauce, 5 oz
Lawry's Casero Curry Powder, 1.75 oz
Great Value Garlic Powder, 3.4 oz
Great Value Organic Ground Ginger, 1.6 oz
McCormick Italian Herb Seasoning Grinder, 0.77 oz Mixed Spices & Seasonings
Wyler's Instant Bouillon Chicken Flavored Cubes, 3.25 oz Jar
Great Value Long Grain Enriched Rice, 32 oz
Great Value Steamable Mixed Vegetables, 12 oz
Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Add onions and 2 tablespoons of oil to a blender and pulse until smooth. Transfer to a medium bowl.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add the diced tomatoes, tomato paste, and habanero pepper to the blender, and pulse until smooth. Transfer to a separate medium bowl.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Heat the remaining 1/3 cup (80 ml) of oil in a large, heavy-bottomed pot over medium heat.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Once the oil is shimmering, add the onion puree and cook until the water has cooked out and the puree is starting to brown, about 10 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Stir in the tomato puree and add the curry powder, garlic powder, ginger, dried herbs, and crushed bouillon cubes. Cook for 20-30 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the stew has reduced by half and is deep red in color.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Add the rice, mixed vegetables, and water. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and cover the pot with foil and a lid. Simmer for another 30 minutes, until the rice is cooked through and the liquid is absorbed.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

09a834dc84205af7165063552af9b2c0.title: Cheesy cornbread with honey and green onions
09a834dc84205af7165063552af9b2c0.description: You need to try this fantastic Cheesy Cornbread with Honey and Green Onions Recipe this holiday season! This cornbread is moist and bursting with the perfect combination of sweet and savory flavors from honey and cheddar cheese.

ingredients.name: Jiffy Corn Muffin Mix, 8.5 Oz Box
Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count
Crystal Creamery Old World Style Bulgarian Cultured Buttermilk, 1 Quart
Great Value All Natural Sour Cream, 8 oz Tub
Great Value Sweet Cream Salted Butter, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup Butter, melted, plus extra for garnishing

ingredients.name: Crisco Pure Vegetable Oil, 16 fl oz
Great Value Honey, 12 oz
ingredients.description: 2 Tbsp Honey, plus extra for garnishing

ingredients.name: Fresh Green Onions Bunch, Each
Great Value Finely Shredded Sharp Cheddar Cheese, 8 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Grease a 9-inch baking pan or cast-iron skillet with butter.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add Eggs (2) , Sour Cream (1/3 cup) , Buttermilk (1/3 cup) , Butter (1/2 cup) , Vegetable Oil (2 Tbsp) , and Honey (2 Tbsp) to a mixing bowl. Whisk until combined.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add Corn Muffins (2 boxes) , Scallions (1 Tbsp) , and Shredded Sharp Cheddar Cheese (1 cup) and stir until well mixed.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Pour the batter into the skillet. Bake for 40-45 minutes or until the top is browned and a knife comes out clean.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Cut into your preferred size squares and garnish with honey and butter. Serve.

aed853ff120f7241392d0618a0aa1597.title: Roasted corn salad with shrimp
aed853ff120f7241392d0618a0aa1597.description: Roasted corn gets tossed with tomatoes and a creamy lime dressing then topped with juicy roasted shrimp. This is such an easy meal to have on the table in thirty minutes.

ingredients.name: Fresh Sweet Corn on the Cob (1 each)
Premium Grape Tomato, 1 lb Package
Great Value Mayonnaise, 15 fl oz
Lawry's Casero Smoked Paprika, 2 oz
Concord Foods Reconstituted Lime Juice, 4.5 oz
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Great Value Frozen Raw Super Colossal Shell-on Tail-on Easy Peel Shrimp, 16 oz (13-15 Count per lb)
ingredients.description: 1 lb frozen jumbo shrimp (21-25 count), thawed

ingredients.name: Fresh Cilantro, Bunch

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat your conventional oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Place the ears of Corn (4 ears) on a sheet pan and brush the corn cobs with Olive Oil (2 Tbsp) . Place into the oven to roast for 20 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: While the corn is roasting get the shells off of the Jumbo Shrimp (1 lb) , leaving the tails intact if desired.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Pat the shrimp dry, then place them on a sheet pan and drizzle with the remaining Olive Oil (1 Tbsp) . Season with Kosher Salt (1/4 tsp) and Ground Black Pepper (1/4 tsp) .

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Once the corn has 10 minutes left to cook, place the sheet pan with the shrimp in the oven. The shrimp will cook with the corn for ten minutes until they are pink and no longer opaque.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Meanwhile, in a small bowl whisk together the Mayonnaise (1/4 cup) , 2 Tbsp of Lime Juice (1) , remaining Kosher Salt (1/2 tsp) , and Smoked Paprika (1/2 tsp) .

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Once the corn and shrimp have cooked, remove them from the oven.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Remove the kernels from the corn cobs by running a knife down the sides of the cobs. Place the kernels in a medium bowl.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Pour the mayonnaise mixture over the corn kernels and mix until combined.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Toss in the Grape Tomatoes (2 cups) and mix again until just combined.

tasks.title: Step 11
tasks.instruction: Pour the corn and tomato mixture into a serving platter. Top the corn salad with the roasted shrimp and garnish with Fresh Cilantro Leaves (to taste) .

6bed35a3e3a2e21aafb966f55a3d321f.title: Buffalo chicken dip
6bed35a3e3a2e21aafb966f55a3d321f.description: All the best of wings and blue cheese, but in a delicious, dippable format. This Classic Buffalo Chicken Dip is a perfect game day snack or a party appetizer. If you pair it with some celery and carrot sticks, it almost counts as healthy right?

ingredients.name: Foster Farms Fresh & Natural Boneless & Skinless Chicken Breast Fillets, 1.6 - 2.39 lb
Great Value Cream Cheese, 8 oz
Frank's RedHot Hot Sauce - Original, 12 oz Hot Sauces
Great Value Classic Ranch Salad Dressing & Dip, 16 fl oz
Marketside Blue Cheese Crumbles Cup, 5 oz
Fresh Green Onions Bunch, Each

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl mix chicken, cream cheese, hot sauce, ranch, and blue cheese. Incorporate well.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Place into a 1-quart baking dish and bake for 20 minutes and the inside is hot.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Top with sliced green onions and serve with a side of chips/ crackers.

037b05d9f9e8b1a054c02a14c5eb13fc.title: Chicken lettuce wraps
037b05d9f9e8b1a054c02a14c5eb13fc.description: These Chicken Lettuce Wraps full of fresh veggies and ground chicken, drizzled with a savory sweet sauce, and wrapped in fresh, crunchy lettuce.

ingredients.name: Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
White Onions, Each
ingredients.description: 1 small white or yellow onion, diced

ingredients.name: Garlic Bulb, Each
ingredients.description: 2 large cloves garlic, minced or grated

ingredients.name: All Natural Ground Chicken, 1 lb
Fresh Zucchini Squash, Each
Fresh Whole Carrots, 1 lb Bag
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
Imperial Dragon 100% Pure Sesame Seed Oil, 5 fl oz
Kikkoman Kikko Rice Vinegar, 10 Fl Oz
Great Value Less Sodium Soy Sauce, 15 fl oz
Great Value Honey, 12 oz
MW Polar Bean Sprouts, Ready-to-Eat, 14.4 oz Can
Fresh Green Onions Bunch, Each
Planters Cashews Halves & Pieces, 8 oz Canister
Fresh Cilantro, Bunch
Marketside Butter Lettuce Salad Blend, 6 oz Bag, Fresh

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add in olive oil, onions and garlic. Cook until softened, about 3 minutes. Add in ground chicken, zucchini, carrot, salt and pepper. As the meat cooks, break it apart into crumbles.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: While the meat is cooking, stir all ingredients for the sauce together in a small bowl.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Once chicken is thoroughly cooked, pour in sauce and cover to simmer 5-7 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Right before serving, stir in bean sprouts, scallions, cashews and cilantro. Scoop into butter lettuce cups and serve.

8922b0ca85efe4df1560bcb4b1456c69.title: Rotisserie Chicken Stuffed Shells
8922b0ca85efe4df1560bcb4b1456c69.description: This recipe is a cozy meal to pull out during the winter because each bite is more comforting than the last. The combination of chicken and broccoli — along with the savory, creamy sauce — is absolutely irresistible.

ingredients.name: Great Value Jumbo Shells Pasta, 12 oz
Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Garlic Bulb, Each
Great Value Heavy Whipping Cream, 16 Oz
Great Value Grated Parmesan Cheese, 8 oz
Zatarain's Creole Seasoning, 17 oz
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon Creole or Cajun seasoning, divided

ingredients.name: Great Value Italian Seasoning, 0.95 Oz
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
Great Value Original Ricotta Cheese, 15 oz
Oscar Mayer Deli Fresh Rotisserie Seasoned Chicken Breast, for a Low Carb Lifestyle, 9 oz Tray
Fresh Broccoli Crowns, Each
ingredients.description: 1 cup broccoli, cooked until tender and diced

ingredients.name: Yellow Onions, Each
Great Value Finely Shredded Low-Moisture Part-Skim Mozzarella Cheese, 8 oz
Fresh Italian Parsley Bunch, Each
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
ingredients.description: freshly ground black pepper, to taste

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 F.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a large saucepan set over high heat, bring water to a boil. Cook the jumbo pasta shells according to the package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In a separate saucepan set over medium-high heat, add butter and oil. Once melted, add garlic and cook for 30 to 60 seconds until lightly browned.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add heavy cream, ½ cup of Parmesan cheese, ½ tablespoon of creole seasoning, and Italian seasoning and whisk to combine. Bring cream sauce to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer for 5 to 7 minutes to thicken. Taste and adjust seasoning, if needed. Remove from heat and pour into an 11-by-7-inch baking pan. Set aside.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: In a separate medium-sized bowl, combine ricotta cheese, shredded chicken, broccoli, onion, remaining Parmesan and remaining creole seasoning.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Stuff room-temperature cooked shells with chicken and cheese mixture using a spoon or a piping bag. Place in the bottom of sauced baking pan.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Cover with shredded mozzarella and bake for 20 minutes, or until the cheese has completely melted and is bubbling. Remove from the oven. Cool for 10 to 15 minutes before serving. Garnish with parsley.

879a007676b0c20a42838687c4897f6a.title: Vegan 3-bean chili
879a007676b0c20a42838687c4897f6a.description: This smoky three-bean chili recipe celebrates all there is to love about the classic dish, but happens to be completely vegan and super-affordable at that — two things that come in handy when buying food to feed a crowd of eaters, some of whom may not eat meat.  This chili gets the bulk of its flavor from simple pantry ingredients: namely, canned chipotle chiles in adobo and fire-roasted tomatoes.

ingredients.name: Crisco Pure Vegetable Oil, 16 fl oz
ingredients.description: 5 tablespoons neutral oil, such as vegetable or grapeseed, divided

ingredients.name: Fresh Green Bell Pepper, Each
ingredients.description: 2 medium poblano peppers or 1 large green bell pepper, stemmed and finely chopped

ingredients.name: Fresh Red Onions, Each
ingredients.description: 1 large yellow or red onion, peeled and finely chopped

ingredients.name: Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
Garlic Bulb, Each
ingredients.description: 4 cloves garlic, peeled and finely chopped

ingredients.name: Lawry's Casero Smoked Paprika, 2 oz
Great Value Ground Cumin, 2.5 oz
Embasa Gluten-Free Chipotle Peppers in Adobo Sauce, 7 oz
ingredients.description: 1 (7-ounce can) chipotle chiles in adobo sauce

ingredients.name: Great Value Pinto Beans, 15.5 oz Can
ingredients.description: 1 (15.5-ounce can) pinto beans, drained and rinsed

ingredients.name: S & W Canned Black Beans, 15.5 oz Can
ingredients.description: 1 (15.5-ounce can) black beans, drained and rinsed

ingredients.name: Great Value Dark Red Kidney Beans, 15.5 oz
ingredients.description: 1 (15.5-ounce can) kidney beans, drained and rinsed

ingredients.name: Great Value Diced Tomatoes in Tomato Juice, 28 Oz
Corona Extra Beer Mexican Lager, Beer 6 Pack, 12 fl oz Bottles, 4.6% ABV
ingredients.description: 6 ounces Mexican-style lager, such as Modelo or Corona

ingredients.name: Limes, Each
Fresh Cilantro, Bunch
Fresh Green Onions Bunch, Each
ingredients.description: thinly sliced scallions or finely diced white onion, for serving

ingredients.name: La Costena Green Pickled Jalapeno Peppers, 26 Oz
ingredients.description: pickled onions and/or jalapen~os, for serving

ingredients.name: Avocados, Each
ingredients.description: sliced or cubed avocado, for serving

ingredients.name: Great Value Restaurant Style White Corn Tortilla Chips, 13 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a large heavy-bottom pot, such as a Dutch oven, heat 4 tablespoons oil over medium heat. Add onion and peppers, season with a big pinch of salt and sauté, stirring often, until softened, 5 to 8 minutes. Stir in garlic and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Make a well in the center of the vegetables and add remaining 1 tablespoon oil. Add paprika and cumin to the oil and let the spices bloom for 30 seconds. Add 1 chipotle chile in adobo and 2 tablespoons of the sauce. Add all of the beans and another big pinch of salt, and use a wooden spoon to break up some into smaller chunks. Stir in tomatoes and beer. Bring mixture to a boil. Taste and add another 1 to 3 tablespoons chile sauce (reserve remaining chiles and sauce for another use — they can be transferred to an airtight container and frozen for up to 6 months). Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, stirring occasionally, until the mixture has reduced to your preferred chili texture, 20 to 40 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Season the chili with more salt to taste. Place a dish of lime wedges on the table for squeezing. Serve chili in bowls with fresh cilantro, pickled onions and/or jalapeños, sliced avocado and crushed tortilla chips.

97e39913dd6e9e2f9363b1d8f5fb10d6.title: Mini pizza cups
97e39913dd6e9e2f9363b1d8f5fb10d6.description: Looking for an easy snack the kids will love? Try our mini pizza cup recipe! These little bites are super simple, and you can easily customize them with your favorite toppings. They are a great way to use leftover pizza dough or sauce. So whether you are looking for a quick snack or a fun lunch option, these mini pizza cups are the perfect solution!

ingredients.name: Mama Mary's Original Pizza Crusts, 12 oz, 3 Count
ingredients.description: 1 (8-oz) can Refrigerated Pizza Crusts, cut into 3x3 inche squares

ingredients.name: Ragu Homemade Style Pizza Sauce, Perfect for Quick and Easy Italian Pizza at Home, 14 OZ
Litehouse Freeze Dried Oregano, 0.28 Oz
ingredients.description: 1 tsp Dried Oregano,1 tsp Dried Oregano

ingredients.name: Armour Pepperoni Slices, 5 oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
Basil Fresh Cut 0.75 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Basil, sliced

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Greased a 2.5-inch muffin tin with cooking spray. Set aside.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In a medium mixing bowl, add pizza sauce, mix in oregano and salt to taste. Stir to combine. Set aside.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: In the prepared muffin tin, press dough into each cup. Sprinkle about 1 tablespoon cheese in each dough. Add 1 tablespoon of pizza sauce, top with a tablespoon of cheese again and finish with pepperoni slices (about 5-6 pieces on each dough).

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Bake in the oven for 15-20 minutes or until fully baked.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Remove from the oven, let sit for 5 minutes, take the pizza cups out of the tin and transfer to a serving dish

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Garnish with sliced basil and serve immediately!

52ceda69f1ec5ecf0ea6351ffc4b8405.title: Tomato cheese bread
52ceda69f1ec5ecf0ea6351ffc4b8405.description: Upgrade from your usual garlic bread with this Italian Tomato & Cheese Bread recipe! Thanks to the juicy fresh tomatoes, garlic butter, and cheese, this dish is packed with flavor. Plus, it comes together in under 30 minutes, making it the perfect option for a quick, easy weeknight meal. So go ahead and give this classic a tasty makeover.

ingredients.name: Freshness Guaranteed French Bread, 14 oz
ingredients.description: 1 loaf (1 lb.) French Bread, cut in half lengthwise

ingredients.name: Great Value Grated Parmesan Cheese, 8 oz
Great Value Finely Shredded Low-Moisture Part-Skim Mozzarella Cheese, 8 oz
Kerrygold Grass-Fed Pure Irish Garlic & Herb Butter Stick, 3.5 oz.
ingredients.description: 1/4 stick Garlic Herb Butter, room temperature

ingredients.name: Basil Fresh Cut 0.75 oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Line sheet pan with parchment paper.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: On the prepared sheet pan, evenly spread butter over both halves of the bread loaf. Cover the loaf with mozzarella and parmesan. Top with the tomatoes.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Sprinkle with fresh basil and season with salt and pepper. Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes or until tomatoes soften. Remove from the oven.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Cut into 2.5-3 inch slices and serve immediately!

d3b0ebb20860cb59de5588bcf9f2df6b.title: Pizza stuffed zucchini boats
d3b0ebb20860cb59de5588bcf9f2df6b.description: Quick, easy and minimal ingredient pizza stuffed zucchini boats! This zucchini recipe is healthy but also very satisfying. A great way for kids to eat their veggies!

ingredients.name: Fresh Zucchini Squash, Each
Great Value Marinara Pasta Sauce, 23 oz
Great Value Finely Shredded Low-Moisture Part-Skim Mozzarella Cheese, 8 oz
Great Value Garlic Powder, 3.4 oz
Armour Pepperoni Slices, 5 oz
La Costena Pickled Jalapeno Slices, 15.5 Oz Jar
Lindsay Sliced Black Ripe Olives 2.25 oz
Fresh Whole White Mushrooms, 8 oz
Fresh Roma Tomato, Each
Great Value Crushed Red Pepper, 1.75 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. (180 degrees C)

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Cut tips off ends of zucchinis, and then cut the zucchinis in half, lengthwise. Using a small spoon scoop out the seeds and a little bit of the flesh leaving about 1/4 – 1/2 inch flesh on the zucchini. Place the prepared zucchini scooped out side up in a baking dish with about an inch of water covering the bottom of the pan. Cover with foil and bake for about 18 minutes. Remove the water from the pan with zucchini boats when they’re done baking.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Adjust oven temperature to 375 degrees F. (190 degrees C)

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add 1/2 cup shredded mozzarella to the zucchini boats, then top with marinara, and then the other 1/2 cup mozzarella.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Sprinkle with garlic powder, then add mini pepperoni and any other desired toppings. Cover with foil and bake for 10 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Remove foil, then cook uncovered for additional 7-8 minutes or until zucchini is tender. Top with parsley or basil and enjoy!

907b5ae70cd20e18ba06205c86289cb7.title: Mediterranean pita chip nachos
907b5ae70cd20e18ba06205c86289cb7.description: A Mediterranean version of everyone’s favorite nacho appetizer. Homemade pita chips get topped with roasted chickpeas, cucumbers, tomatoes, red onion, hummus, tahini sauce and crumbled feta cheese.

ingredients.name: BFree Foods Stone Baked Pita Breads 7.76oz 4ct
ingredients.description: 4 Pita bread rounds, for Pita chip nachos

ingredients.name: Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
ingredients.description: 3 Tablespoons olive oil, divided, for Pita chip nachos

ingredients.name: Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
ingredients.description: Coarse salt, for Pita chip nachos

ingredients.name: Bush's Garbanzo Beans, Canned Chickpeas, 16 oz Can
ingredients.description: 1 Can (15 oz.) chickpeas, rinsed and drained, for Pita chip nachos

ingredients.name: Fresh Cucumber, Each
ingredients.description: 1 Large or 2 small seedless cucumbers, diced, for Pita chip nachos

ingredients.name: Cherry Tomato, 10 oz Package
ingredients.description: 1 Pint cherry tomatoes, halved, for Pita chip nachos

ingredients.name: Fresh Red Onions, Each
ingredients.description: 1/2 Red onion, peeled and diced, for Pita chip nachos

ingredients.name: Marketside Classic Hummus, 10 oz
ingredients.description: 1 Cup store bought hummus, for Pita chip nachos

ingredients.name: Frigo Crumbleed Feta Cheese, 5 Oz
ingredients.description: 4 oz. Feta cheese, crumbled, for Pita chip nachos

ingredients.name: KRINOS TAHINI MIX, 16 OZ
ingredients.description: Tahini sauce (recipe follows), for Tahini sauce

ingredients.name: NineChef Set - Northern Food Beijing Liu Biju Chinese Sesame Paste Plus NineChef Brand Golden Heart Ice Tea Coffee Long Handel Spoon
ingredients.description: 1/4 Cup sesame paste, for Tahini sauce

ingredients.name: Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon
Concord Foods Lemon Juice, 4.5 oz
ingredients.description: 2 Tablespoons lemon juice, for Tahini sauce

ingredients.name: Great Value Garlic Powder, 3.4 oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 Teaspoon garlic powder, for Tahini sauce

ingredients.name: Great Value Black Pepper & Iodized Salt, 5.25 oz
ingredients.description: Salt and ground black pepper to taste, for Tahini sauce

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Pre-heat the oven to 400 degrees.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Slice the pita rounds into 8 wedges (cut in half, then in quarters, then in eighths). Brush with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil and sprinkle with coarse salt. Bake for 15 - 20 minutes or until the chips are a light golden brown. Do not overbake or the chips will be hard.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Rinse and drain the chickpeas, toss with the remaining tablespoon of olive oil and place on a baking sheet. Roast in the 400 degree oven for 15 to 20 minutes, stirring once, until lightly crispy

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Make the tahini sauce by whisking together the sesame paste, water, lemon juice, garlic powder, salt and ground black pepper. Note that it may take a few minutes of stirring to come together but it will.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: To assemble, place the baked pita chips on a platter and top with the roasted chickpeas, diced cucumbers, sliced tomatoes, diced red onions, crumbled feta cheese and dollops of the hummus. Drizzle with the tahini sauce and serve extra on the side.

a5ac0f244f0a57d7a9d118be98758bf7.title: Lemon garlic butter shrimp & asparagus
a5ac0f244f0a57d7a9d118be98758bf7.description: This citrusy garlic shrimp requires minimal cooking time and will be on your table in 15 minutes. If you are pressed for time, this is a fantastic healthy option for a weeknight meal. Seafood lovers will love the zest of lemon and the sharp garlic flavor!

ingredients.name: Great Value Frozen Raw Jumbo Shell-on, Tail-on, Easy Peel Shrimp, 32 oz (21-25 Count per lb)
ingredients.description: 2 lb Medium Tail-on Raw Shrimp, peeled and deveined

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 3 Tbsp Unsalted Butter, divided (2 Tbsp for shrimp and 1 Tbsp for asparagus)

ingredients.name: Garlic Bulb, Each
Great Value Italian Seasoning, 0.95 Oz
Fresh Red Bell Pepper, 1 Each
Lawry's Casero Cayenne Pepper, 1.62 oz
Concord Foods Lemon Juice, 4.5 oz
Lawry's Casero Smoked Paprika, 2 oz
Asparagus, Bunch
Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Fresh Italian Parsley Bunch, Each
Lemons, Each

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Heat a large skillet over medium high heat and melt 2 Tbsp of butter. Season the shrimp with salt and pepper. Once butter is melted, cook the shrimp for about 1-2 minutes a side. The shrimp will look opaque.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Sauté the garlic, red bell pepper, italian seasoning, cayenne pepper, and smoked paprika until fragrant. Stir to combine and cook for 1-2 minutes or until the shrimp has cooked through. Take out the shrimp and set aside.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Drain the potatoes and set aside to cool. Once the potatoes are cool enough to handle, peel them and cut them into chunks.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: To the same pan over medium heat, add remaining butter and olive oil. Once the butter has melted, add the asparagus.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Cook the asparagus until fork-tender and season with salt. Approximately 5-6 minutes. Time will be dependent on how thick the asparagus is.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Add the shrimp back to the pan. Squeeze half of a lemon over the top of the shrimp and asparagus. Allow to cook for 1-2 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Remove from heat. Garnish with parsley and lemon slices before serving.

ingredients.name: Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon
Great Value Less Sodium Soy Sauce, 15 fl oz
Imperial Dragon 100% Pure Sesame Seed Oil, 5 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup sesame oil, for sauce,1 tablespoon sesame oil, for wraps

ingredients.name: Garlic Bulb, Each
ingredients.description: 6 cloves garlic, minced, for sauce,1 tablespoon garlic, minced, for wraps

ingredients.name: Fresh Ginger Root, Each
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon fresh ginger, minced, for sauce

ingredients.name: Great Value Light Brown Sugar, 32 oz
Huy Fong Sriracha Hot Chili Sauce Ketchup 20oz
Kikkoman Kikko Rice Vinegar, 10 Fl Oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup rice wine vinegar, for sauce

ingredients.name: Fresh Green Onions Bunch, Each
ingredients.description: 1/3 cup scallions, sliced, for sauce,1/3 cup scallions, sliced, for wraps

ingredients.name: House Foods Refrigerated Firm Soy Tofu, 16 oz
Yellow Onions, Each
ingredients.description: 1 medium yellow onion, diced, for wraps

ingredients.name: Fresh Whole White Mushrooms, 8 oz
ingredients.description: 2 1/2 cups mushroom, chopped, such as shiitake, for wraps

ingredients.name: Dynasty Water Chestnuts Sliced, 8 Oz
ingredients.description: 8 oz water chestnuts, 1 can, sliced, drained and finely chopped, for wraps

ingredients.name: Great Value Canola Oil Non-Stick Cooking Spray, 8 oz
Thai Kitchen Gluten Free Stir Fry Rice Noodles, 14 oz
Fresh Iceberg Lettuce, Each

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Remove the tofu from its packaging and drain. Wrap tofu in a kitchen towel and find a heavy object to place on top of tofu, leave it there for 10-20 minutes, until tofu feels more tender.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Make the sauce: In a medium bowl, combine the water, soy sauce, sesame oil, garlic, ginger, sriracha, brown sugar, rice wine vinegar, and scallions, and stir. Set ½ cup (120 ml) of the sauce aside.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Crumble the tofu into the marinade, cover, and refrigerate for 1 hour.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: In a medium wok or skillet over medium heat, add the sesame oil and onion, and cook 3 minutes, until onions are translucent. Add the mushrooms and garlic and cook for about 5 minutes, or until the mushrooms are tender.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Add the marinated tofu to the pan and cook until the majority of marinade cooks off. Add the water chestnuts and scallions. Pour in the reserved sauce. Toss to coat and cook until just heated through. Transfer the tofu mixture to a medium bowl.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Heat the canola oil in the same pan over high heat until a drop of water sizzles when flicked onto the oil. Fry the rice noodles for about 30 seconds, until puffed up. Transfer the fried noodles to paper towels to drain.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Slice the core off the head of lettuce and separate into individual leaves.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Serve with leaves of lettuce, rice noodles, and drizzle remaining sauce over top.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

e722489bccf0d8e645133719443fa0f3.title: Chicken paillard saltimbocca
e722489bccf0d8e645133719443fa0f3.description: This recipe is a fun play on two classic dishes — chicken paillard and chicken saltimbocca. The dish feels fresh and healthy but has the flair of crispy prosciutto, sage and aged balsamic that makes it feel special. I love this recipe because it is great for a casual weeknight yet feels elegant enough to prepare for a dinner party!

ingredients.name: Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Great Value Thin Sliced Black Forest Ham, 8 oz
Sage Fresh Cut .75oz
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Great Value All Natural Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts, 3 lb (Frozen)
Marketside Organic Baby Arugula Salad, 5 oz Clam Shell, Fresh
Concord Foods Lemon Juice, 4.5 oz
Great Value Balsamic Vinegar of Modena, 8.45 fl oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Heat 1 teaspoon olive oil in a large skillet over medium-low heat. Add prosciutto in a single layer in the pan and cook until crispy, 2 to 3 minutes per side. Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate to drain. Repeat with remaining prosciutto until all pieces are crisp.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In the same skillet, add 1 tablespoon olive oil and heat over medium-high heat until shimmering. Add sage leaves and cook for 1 to 2 minutes, flipping occasionally, or until fragrant and crisp. Transfer to a separate paper towel-lined plate to drain and sprinkle with kosher salt. Finely chop the crispy sage and prosciutto and set aside.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Pat chicken breasts dry with paper towels. Working with 1 piece at a time, place chicken between 2 sheets of plastic wrap. Using a meat mallet, rolling pin or heavy skillet, pound to ¼ thick. Season all over with kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Pour 3 tablespoons olive oil into the same large skillet and heat over medium-high. Working in batches, cook chicken until golden brown and crisp, 3 to 4 minutes per side. Transfer to a plate or wire rack to rest and lightly tent with aluminum foil to keep warm.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, whisk together lemon juice, 1/4 cup olive oil, salt and pepper until emulsified. Add arugula and half of sage-prosciutto mixture to the bowl and toss to combine. Adjust seasoning to taste. To serve, add one cutlet to a plate, top with arugula, garnish with reserved crispy prosciutto and sage and, if using, drizzle with aged balsamic.

ingredients.name: Fresh Green Cabbage, Each
ingredients.description: 3 cups green cabbage, shredded,for cabbage slaw

ingredients.name: Fresh Red Onions, Each
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup red onion, diced,for cabbage slaw

ingredients.name: Great Value All Natural Sour Cream, 8 oz Tub
Limes, Each
ingredients.description: 1 lime, juiced,for cabbage slaw,lime, to taste,for garnish

ingredients.name: Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 teaspoon salt,for cabbage slaw,1/2 teaspoon salt,for tacos

ingredients.name: Great Value Frozen Tilapia Skinless & Boneless Fillets, 1 lb
Lawry's Casero Cayenne Pepper, 1.62 oz
Great Value Garlic Powder, 3.4 oz
Great Value Ground Cumin, 2.5 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
La Banderita White Corn Tortillas, 30 count, 24.9 oz
Fresh Cilantro, Bunch

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, combine green cabbage, red onion, sour cream, lime juice, and salt. Chill until ready to serve.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a bowl, mix cayenne, garlic powder, cumin, salt, and pepper. Season each tilapia fillet on both sides with the seasoning mix.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Over medium-high heat, cook 2 fillets at a time for 8 minutes, flipping halfway. Repeat for the remaining fillets.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Using a fork, break apart the fillets into bite-size pieces.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Right before serving, heat the corn tortillas in the pan over high heat. Remove from the pan and assemble the tacos with the cabbage slaw and tilapia.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Garnish with cilantro and lime juice.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

ingredients.name: BetterBody Foods Refined Organic Coconut Oil, 28.0 fl oz Jar
Yellow Onions, Each
Garlic Bulb, Each
Fresh Ginger Root, Each
Great Value Paprika, 2.5 oz
Great Value Ground Cumin, 2.5 oz
GOYA Sazon Coriander & Annatto Seasoning 1.41 Oz
Lawry's Casero Cayenne Pepper, 1.62 oz
Great Value Garbanzos Chick Peas, 15.5 oz
ingredients.description: 15 oz chickpeas, 1 can, drained and rinsed

ingredients.name: Fresh Sweet Potatoes, 3 lb Bag
ingredients.description: 2 cups sweet potato, peeled and diced

ingredients.name: Hunt's Fire Roasted Diced Tomatoes, 14.5 oz Can
ingredients.description: 15 oz fire roasted crushed tomato, 1 can

ingredients.name: Great Value Vegetable Broth, 32 oz
Marketside Fresh Spinach, 10 oz Bag, Fresh

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In large pot or Dutch oven, heat the coconut oil over medium heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the onion and cook for 4-5 minutes, or until the onion is semi-translucent.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add the garlic and ginger, and cook for 2-3 more minutes, until fragrant. Then add the sweet paprika, cumin, coriander, and cayenne and cook for 2 more minutes, until fragrant.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add the chickpeas, sweet potatoes, crushed tomatoes, and vegetable broth, and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until the sweet potatoes are tender.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add the spinach and stir until wilted.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Serve immediately.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

39680900c39de23ab57feb080f616b75.title: Gluten-free chicken piccata
39680900c39de23ab57feb080f616b75.description: One of my favorite Italian meals of all time is chicken piccata. For those that have some food allergies or are looking for a low-carb option, this version is gluten-free and dairy-free while still being rich with flavor. While I use coconut cream for the creamy piccata sauce, the chicken is breaded with egg wash so this recipe is not vegan.

ingredients.name: Great Value Superfine Blanched Almond Flour 16oz
Lawry's Casero Smoked Paprika, 2 oz
Great Value Onion Powder, 3.25 oz
Morton Sea Salt, Fine, 4.4 Ounce
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Foster Farms Fresh & Natural Boneless & Skinless Chicken Breast Fillets, 1.6 - 2.39 lb
ingredients.description: 1 1/4 pound thinly sliced chicken breast (about 1/4” thick)

ingredients.name: Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count
Great Value 100% Pure Avocado Oil Cooking Spray, 4.7 oz, Metal Bottle, Shelf Stable/ Ambient
ingredients.description: 2 tablespoons avocado or olive oil, plus more as needed

ingredients.name: Swanson 100% Natural, Gluten-Free Chicken Stock, 32 oz Carton
Coco Lopez Real Cream of Coconut, 15 Fl Oz
Lemons, Each
Garlic Bulb, Each
Great Value Nonpareille Capers, 3 fl oz
Arrowroot Starch Powder 4oz
Fresh Italian Parsley Bunch, Each
ingredients.description: 1 large handful fresh parsley, chopped, plus more for garnish

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a wide, shallow bowl such as a pie plate, add the almond flour, paprika, onion, salt and pepper.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a separate wide, shallow bowl, crack the egg and whisk until the yolk and white are homogenous.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper, dip in the beaten egg and then coat in the seasoned almond flour.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: In a large nonstick skillet set over medium heat, add 2 tablespoons avocado or olive oil. Once heated, add the coated chicken breasts and cook, 2 to 3 minutes per side, or until golden brown and cooked through. Add more oil before flipping, if needed. Transfer the cooked chicken breasts to a plate and set aside.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Using a paper towel, wipe out any burnt pieces of almond flour from the bottom of the pan. Add the chicken stock, coconut cream, lemon juice, garlic and capers and cook for 3 to 4 minutes, or until slightly reduced and thickened.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: In a small bowl, whisk together the arrowroot powder with 1 tablespoon water. Add the slurry to the piccata sauce and whisk to combine. Place the chicken back in the skillet, along with chopped parsley. Simmer for about 2 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Serve the chicken over zucchini noodles or pasta with the creamy piccata sauce and garnish with more parsley.

0f9800ad2bfadc4d87f6ceb34f6f41d1.title: Balsamic roasted root vegetables
0f9800ad2bfadc4d87f6ceb34f6f41d1.description: These Balsamic Roasted Root Vegetables are the perfect recipe to enjoy all the best fall and winter flavors. Toss a medley of carrots, red potatoes, red onion, squash, and parsnips in a balsamic dressing, season with fresh thyme, and pop them in the oven until tender and caramelized. The natural sweetness of each vegetable will shine along with the earthiness. You'll love how simple this dish is to make and how much flavor it packs!

ingredients.name: Sweet Potatoes, Each
ingredients.description: 1 lb Sweet Potatoes , cut into 1 ¼-inch cubes

ingredients.name: Fresh Whole Carrots, 1 lb Bag
ingredients.description: 3/4 lb Carrots, cut into 1 ¼-inch pieces

ingredients.name: Fresh Parsnips, 1 lb Bag
ingredients.description: 3/4 lb Parsnips, cut into 1 ¼-inch pieces

ingredients.name: Fresh Yellow Squash, Each
ingredients.description: 1 Squash, seeded, cut into 1 ¼-inch pieces

ingredients.name: Fresh Red Onions, Each
ingredients.description: 1 large Red Onion, peeled, with root end left intact cut into ½-inch wedges

ingredients.name: Garlic Bulb, Each
Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Great Value Dijon Mustard, 12 oz Squeeze Bottle
Great Value Balsamic Vinegar of Modena, 8.45 fl oz
Maple Grove Farms Organic Pure Maple Syrup, 8.5 fl oz
Mariposa Farms Fresh Cut Thyme, .75 oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Spray a rimmed baking sheet with cooking spray.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Place all the vegetables in a large mixing bowl and add oil, vinegar, maple syrup mustard, and thyme.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Season with salt and pepper to taste and mix well.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Place the vegetables on a rimmed baking sheet and spread evenly, so they will cook evenly. Roast for 40-45 minutes until softened and golden brown.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Make sure you stir the vegetables so they can evenly brown, about every 10 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Serve warm.

82d8d4a59245411ae4c826bcb5312e96.title: One-pot sausage, white beans and kale
82d8d4a59245411ae4c826bcb5312e96.description: The pantry is your friend for this easy weeknight dinner that never fails to please. Serve with a green salad and crusty bread.

ingredients.name: Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Great Value Mild Italian Sausage, 5 Links, 1 lb 3 oz (Fresh)
ingredients.description: 1 pound link Italian sausage, sliced into 3-inch pieces

ingredients.name: Yellow Onions, Each
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Garlic Bulb, Each
Great Value Organic Fennel Seed, 1.6 oz
Great Value Diced Tomatoes in Tomato Juice, 14.5 oz Can
Great Value Cannellini Beans, 15.5 oz
ingredients.description: 1 (15-ounce) can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed

ingredients.name: Fresh Green Kale Bunch, Each
ingredients.description: 1 bunch kale, de-stemmed and roughly chopped

ingredients.name: Fresh Italian Parsley Bunch, Each
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup Italian parsley, chopped, for assembly

ingredients.name: Great Value Grated Parmesan Cheese, 8 oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese, for assembly

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Heat the olive oil in a Dutch oven over medium heat and add the sausage, cooking it until it’s lightly browned all over, about 4 to 5 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add the onion, salt and pepper and cook until the onions have softened and starting to brown a little bit, about 4 to 5 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add the garlic and stir to combine until it becomes aromatic, about 1 minute, being careful not to burn it.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add the tomatoes (and their juices) along with the white beans and turn the heat up to medium-high, simmering for 10 to 15 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Stir in the roughly chopped kale and cook until it wilts, about 1 to 2 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Remove from the heat and serve garnished with chopped fresh parsley and/or grated Parmesan. Taste and add more salt and pepper, if needed.

02754dfea72540edbe956ff044b9b867.title: Loaded baked potato salad
02754dfea72540edbe956ff044b9b867.description: Loaded Baked Potato Salad is perfect for any potluck or outdoor gathering - everyone will love the creamy sour cream dressing and delicious toppings. We've packed this salad with our favorite baked potato toppings, including bacon, cheddar cheese, and chives. But feel free to customize it and add your favorites! So good, you'll want to make it again and again!

ingredients.name: Russet Potatoes, 5 lb Bag
Oscar Mayer Fully Cooked Original Bacon, 2.52 Oz Box
Great Value All Natural Sour Cream, 16 oz Tub
Great Value Mayonnaise, 15 fl oz
Great Value Apple Cider Vinegar, 32 fl oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Great Value Finely Shredded Mild Cheddar Cheese, 8 oz
Fresh Green Onions Bunch, Each

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a large pot, add unpeeled potatoes and cover them with water. Bring the pot to a boil over high heat then reduce the heat and simmer until the potatoes are soft, about 15 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: While the potatoes are cooking, cook the bacon. To a large pan over medium heat, add the bacon. Once some of the bacon fat starts to render, reduce the heat to medium-low and continue to cook until the bacon is crispy, flipping over after 4-5 minutes . Remove it from the pan and let it cool for a few minutes before crumbling it into smaller pieces.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Drain the potatoes and set aside to cool. Once the potatoes are cool enough to handle, peel them and cut them into chunks.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: In a small bowl, mix the sour cream, mayonnaise, apple cider vinegar, salt, and pepper.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: To a large bowl, add the chopped potatoes, crispy bacon, and cheddar cheese. Pour the sour cream dressing over the top then gently mix the potato salad until well combined.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Serve garnished with green Onions.

e9508db7d650ffd713e6fe5978e5001d.title: Lemony chicken and rice casserole
e9508db7d650ffd713e6fe5978e5001d.description: The perfectly creamy rice with the hint of citrusy lemon along with the tender delicious chicken thighs makes this recipe such a wonderful dish for Sunday supper or during the week to celebrate something special. It is truly a crowd pleaser.

ingredients.name: Great Value All-Purpose Flour, 5LB Bag
Great Value Grated Parmesan Cheese, 8 oz
Great Value Garlic Powder, 3.4 oz
Great Value Onion Powder, 3.25 oz
Lemons, Each
ingredients.description: 1/2 Teaspoon lemon zest, divided,1 lemon, sliced into rounds

ingredients.name: Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
Foster Farms Fresh & Natural Cage Free Family Pack Chicken Thighs 64 -88 oz (4-5.5 lb) Tray
Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Great Value Cream Of Chicken Condensed Soup, 10.5 oz
ingredients.description: 1 (10.2 ounce) can cream of chicken soup

ingredients.name: Swanson 100% Natural, Gluten-Free Chicken Stock, 32 oz Carton
Great Value Instant White Rice, 28 oz
Garlic Bulb, Each
Basil Fresh Cut 0.75 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 375 F. Grease an 11-by-7-inch baking dish with cooking spray.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a large shallow bowl, whisk together flour, Parmesan, garlic powder, onion powder and half of the lemon zest. Season generously with salt and pepper and whisk. Dredge each piece of chicken on all sides with flour mixture. Set aside.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In a large skillet set over medium-high heat, heat olive oil until shimmering but not smoking. Add chicken skin side down, and sear until golden, 6 minutes. Flip and cook until the opposite side is golden, about 6 minutes more. Remove from the pan and set aside.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Combine soup, stock, rice, garlic and remaining lemon zest in the prepared baking dish. Place the chicken on the rice mixture and layer lemon slices over the top of each piece. Cover the baking dish with aluminum foil.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Bake for 40 to 60 minutes, or until the chicken is done and the rice is tender. To develop a deeper color, uncover the dish for the last 5 to 10 minutes of baking. Garnish with basil. Let stand for 10 minutes. Stir the rice and season to taste before serving.

413a8253bad195556ff5b07e87e36abc.title: Steakhouse Pork loin
413a8253bad195556ff5b07e87e36abc.description: Pan-seared pork loin served with creamy mashed sweet potatoes and roasted green beans. The melt-in-your-mouth-crusted tenderloin filet is finished with a buttery Dijon pan sauce that makes this fantastic dinner sing!

ingredients.name: Pork Center Cut Loin Chops Thin Boneless, 1.0 - 2.2 lb, Tray
McCormick Grill Mates Montreal Steak Seasoning, 3.4 oz Mixed Spices & Seasonings
Swanson 100% Natural, Gluten-Free Chicken Stock, 32 oz Carton
Great Value Sweet Cream Salted Butter, 16 oz
Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Great Value Dijon Mustard, 12 oz Squeeze Bottle
Great Value Worcestershire Sauce, 10 fl Ounce
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Great Value Garlic Powder, 3.4 oz
Great Value Onion Powder, 3.25 oz
Steamables Sweet Potatoes, 1.5 lb Bag
Marketside Fresh Green Beans, 12 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Peel and dice the sweet potatoes into 1/2 inch pieces. Place the potatoes into a medium-sized pot and cover the potatoes with water. Bring the pot to a boil over high heat, then reduce to a simmer and cook for about 20 minutes. The sweet potatoes should be fork tender.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: While the sweet potatoes are cooking, in a medium bowl, toss the green beans with olive oil (1 tbsp), garlic powder (1 tsp), onion powder (1 tsp) salt (2 tsp) and black pepper  (1 tsp).

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Lay the green beans onto a lined sheet pan and set aside.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: While the potatoes are cooking add olive oil to a skillet pan over medium high heat. Pat dry the pork loin with a paper towel and then season them all over with steak seasoning. Press the seasoning lightly onto the pork loin filet.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Sear the pork loin for 3-4 minutes on each side, until they are nicely browned all over.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Remove the pork loin from the pan and place them on top of the green beans. Put the sheet pan into the oven and roast for 20 minutes. Open the oven and turn the pork roast over. Then close the oven and cook for an additional 20 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: While the filet and green beans are roasting, add the chicken stock (½ cup) to the pan, letting the chicken stock come to a simmer. Use a spatula or wooden spoon to scrape up any brown bits from the bottom of the pan. Add the Dijon mustard (2 tbsp), Worcestershire sauce 2 (tbsp), butter (4 tbsp) and whisk them together. Let the sauce simmer for 2 minutes, Reduce the heat to low. Season the sauce with a pinch of salt and black pepper.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Drain the cooked sweet potatoes and add them back into the pot. Add in the butter (4 tbsp), salt (1 tsp) and pepper (1 tsp) and mash the potatoes with a masher or a fork until mostly smooth, but with a few small chunks remaining.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Carefully remove the sheet pan of green beans and tender loin from the oven. Let the pork roast rest for 10 minutes before carving. The internal temperature of the pork should read at least 145 degrees F. Slice the pork loin into medallions and then spoon the pan sauce over the top of the pork medallions when serving.

ingredients.name: Avocados, Each
ingredients.description: 2 large avocados, pitted, peeled, and diced

ingredients.name: Fresh Roma Tomato, Each
ingredients.description: 1 medium roma tomato, seeded and diced

ingredients.name: Fresh Red Onions, Each
Fresh Jalapeno Pepper, Approx. 3-5 per 0.25 Pound
Limes, Each
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Fresh Cilantro, Bunch
Great Value Restaurant Style White Corn Tortilla Chips, 13 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a medium bowl, combine the avocado, tomato, red onion, jalapeño, lime juice, salt, and pepper. Mix together until fully incorporated. Top with cilantro, if using.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Serve with tortilla chips.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

e2e807c7baf3955c3f57e89bfac1e45a.title: Chimichurri steak
e2e807c7baf3955c3f57e89bfac1e45a.description: This baked steak is perfect! It isn’t grilled but it delivers just as big on flavor.

ingredients.name: Beef Choice Angus Sirloin Tender Steak, 0.6 - 1.62 lb, Tray
ingredients.description: 2 packs skirt steak, about 1.6 lb each

ingredients.name: Skinny Latina Caliente Chimichurri Marinade & Sauce
ingredients.description: 12 oz Chimichurri Style Marinade (I used Great Value Chimichurri Style Marinade)

ingredients.name: Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Great Value Steamable Mixed Vegetables, 12 oz
ingredients.description: Great Value California Style Vegetable Mix (as a side)

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat oven to 375° degrees.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Cut as much fat as you can off the skirt steaks.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Cut the skirt steak into pieces that fit the baking dish without overlapping.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Spread the chimichurri marinade over the steaks with a spoon.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Sprinkle with salt and pepper.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Cover with aluminum foil. Cut a few slits with a knife.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Bake for 20 minutes and uncover.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Allow to cook another 25 minutes or until the steak reaches the internal temperature you prefer. Once it does, stop the bake function and switch to the broil function.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Broil for 3 minutes for some crisping.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Remove the steak from the oven and let sit for about 5 minutes before slicing. In the meantime, plate your sides.

tasks.title: Step 11
tasks.instruction: We served our steak with frozen steamed vegetables on the side. That was about 5 minutes total.

d48d596828c70eef7b797207f0d58309.title: Sweet potato and miso mac and cheese
d48d596828c70eef7b797207f0d58309.description: Miso is a fermented soybean paste that's rich in umami, making it the perfect unexpected addition to any pasta or salad dressing. In this recipe, miso paste is the star of the show, balancing the naturally sweet flavor of sweet potatoes, transforming the iconic dish that is mac and cheese into an elevated adult version with a touch more pizazz. I love this recipe because it comes together quickly, yet still feels special.

ingredients.name: Sweet Potatoes, Each
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
Great Value Shells Pasta, 16 oz
Great Value Finely Shredded Parmesan Cheese, 6 oz
ingredients.description: 6 ounces Parmesan cheese, cut into 1-inch chunks

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup (1 stick) unsalted butter, cut into 1-inch pieces, divided

ingredients.name: Hikari Organic White Miso Paste 17.6 OZ (2 Tubs)
Great Value Light Brown Sugar, 32 oz
Great Value Whole Vitamin D Milk, Half Gallon, 64 fl oz
Great Value Plain Panko Bread Crumbs, 8 oz
Sprout House Fresh Cut Chives - 0.75oz
JFC Nori Komi Furikake Rice Seasoning, 1.7 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Using a fork, poke holes in sweet potatoes on all sides. Wrap each potato in a damp paper towel and place in the microwave. Cook for 6 minutes, turning halfway through, or until the flesh is tender. Set aside to cool. Once cooled, peel the potatoes and roughly chop.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions. Before draining, reserve 1 cup of pasta water.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In a high-powered blender or food processor, grind the Parmesan cheese into a fine powder.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add half of the butter into a large saucepan over medium heat. Add the miso and sugar and stir until combined into a saucy paste. Slowly whisk in the milk until the miso and butter emulsify. Add in the sweet potatoes and blend until smooth using an immersion blender. Alternatively, you may transfer the mixture to a high-powered blender.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Add the cooked pasta to the saucepan with the sauce. Add a splash of reserved pasta water, followed by a handful of Parmesan cheese, alternating back and forth until the cheese has melted and the sauce reaches your desired consistency. Adjust seasoning to taste.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Melt the remaining butter in a medium skillet over medium heat. Add the panko breadcrumbs and toast, stirring occasionally, until golden brown, about 2 minutes. Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate and season with salt.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Divide pasta among bowls. Top with breadcrumbs, chives and furikake.

07827680ecaae769ddb917d06362e1e5.title: Sheet pan sweet potato tacos
07827680ecaae769ddb917d06362e1e5.description: These 6-ingredient sheet pan tacos are the perfect balance of savory and sweet, come together in just 35 minutes, and can feed a family of four! This recipe utilizes a combination of frozen pre-cut veggies and a fresh sweet potato for swiftness and ease.

ingredients.name: Steamables Sweet Potatoes, 1.5 lb Bag
ingredients.description: 20 ounces cubed sweet potatoes (2 large sweet potatoes or 2 bags frozen sweet potato cubes)

ingredients.name: Great Value Frozen Pepper & Onion Blend, 20 oz Bag
ingredients.description: 22 ounces frozen pepper and onion blend

ingredients.name: Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Great Value Original Taco Seasoning Mix, 1 oz
Great Value Black Beans, 15 oz Can
Great Value Burrito Flour Tortillas, 20 oz, 8 Count
Kraft Mexican Style Four Cheese Blend Shredded Cheese, 16 oz Bag
Avocados, Each
Fresh Iceberg Lettuce, Each
Slicing Tomato, Each
Fresh Red Onions, Each
Great Value All Natural Sour Cream, 8 oz Tub
Fresh Cilantro, Bunch

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat your oven to 425 degrees F.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Peel your sweet potatoes and chop them into cubes, about 2-inches wide. If you are using frozen sweet potato cubes, skip this step.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: To a large baking sheet, add the cubed sweet potato and frozen pepper & onion blend. Add the olive oil and taco seasoning on top of your vegetables, and use clean hands or a large spoon to toss, encouraging the oil and seasoning to evenly coat them.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Roast in the oven for 20 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Meanwhile, drain and rinse your black beans. After 20 minutes, remove your vegetables from the oven. Add the black beans and toss with a spoon (careful- it’s hot!). Put the baking sheet back in the oven for another 5 minutes to warm the beans.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Assemble your tacos by adding the vegetables, beans, and cheese to your tortillas. Add toppings of choice and enjoy hot!

8808e37cb02370e6941b42c1936aacb5.title: Brown sugar salmon
8808e37cb02370e6941b42c1936aacb5.description: The Salmon Fillet is the star of the show in this super simple cast iron pan recipe. A quick trip to a hot oven leaves a wonderfully sweet and spicy crust. Served with roasted asparagus and steak cut potatoes.

ingredients.name: Fishin' Co Frozen Skinless Atlantic Salmon Fillets, 20 oz
Great Value Light Brown Sugar, 32 oz
Great Value Dijon Mustard, 12 oz Squeeze Bottle
Imperial Dragon 100% Pure Sesame Seed Oil, 5 fl oz
Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Great Value Organic Thyme Leaves, 0.6 oz
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Lemons, Each
Great Value Asparagus Spears, 8 oz (Frozen)
Great Value Steak Cut French Fried Potatoes, 28 oz (Frozen)

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. (218 C)

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: While the oven is heating, in a medium bowl mix together the Dijon mustard (½  cup), brown sugar (1/2  cup) and sesame oil (1 tsp)

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Sprinkle the salmon fillets all over with Kosher salt (2 tsp) and black pepper (1 tsp)

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Line a rimmed sheet pan with parchment paper. Place the potato wedges (about 20 pieces) in a large mixing bowl and toss with olive oil (1 tbsp), kosher salt (1 tsp) and black pepper (1/2 tsp) Lay out the potatoes on one side of the sheet pan. Place the asparagus spears (8 ounces) in the same mixing bowl and toss with olive oil (1 tbsp), thyme leaves (1 tsp), Kosher salt (1/2  tsp) and pepper (1/2 tsp). Then place the asparagus spears on the other side of the sheet pan.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Lightly oil a cast iron pan and place the salmon fillets flat side down. Spoon the brown sugar sauce over the tops of the salmon fillets.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Place the pan of vegetables onto the middle rack of the oven, and roast for 20 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Then, after 5 minutes have passed, place the pan of salmon in the oven on the top rack, and roast for 15 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Remove both pans from the oven and serve immediately, with a squeeze of lemon juice over the asparagus.

581023cd27381842a5b00cdde22069d3.title: Wild rice and mushroom casserole
581023cd27381842a5b00cdde22069d3.description: Wild Rice and Mushroom Casserole is an easy, delicious dinner that your family will love! Just one bite of this creamy, flavorful dish will have everyone coming back for seconds. Made from scratch and packed with juicy sautéed onions, garlic, mushrooms, and thyme in a light cream sauce, this casserole is so tasty, topped with grated Swiss cheese for extra heartiness and flavor.

ingredients.name: Sliced Baby Bella Mushrooms, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 10 oz Baby Bella Mushrooms, roughly chopped

ingredients.name: Great Value Long Grain & Wild Rice, 8.8 oz
Yellow Onions, Each
Garlic Bulb, Each
Mariposa Farms Fresh Cut Thyme, .75 oz
ingredients.description: 1 Tbsp Fresh Thyme, chopped (plus more for garnish)

ingredients.name: Great Value Cream of Mushroom Condensed Soup, 10.5 oz
ingredients.description: 1 can (10.5 oz) Cream of Mushroom Soup

ingredients.name: Great Value Heavy Whipping Cream, 16 Oz
Great Value Gluten Free Deli Style Sliced Swiss Cheese, 16 oz, 24 Count
ingredients.description: 2 cups Swiss Cheese, grated and divided

ingredients.name: Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Spray the casserole dish with cooking spray. Set aside.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In a skillet, heat olive oil over medium high heat, add yellow onion and cook until the onion turns translucent, about 5 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add in the garlic, fresh thyme and mushrooms. Stir and cook for 4-5 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Mix in the cooked wild rice, cream of mushroom soup, heavy cream, salt and a cup of cheese. Stir to combine.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: In the prepared casserole dish, transfer the rice mixture and bake for 10 minutes or until bubbling.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Remove the casserole from the oven. Sprinkle it with the remaining cheese and bring it back to the oven for 5-10 more minutes or until the cheese is melted and slightly crusted.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Garnish with fresh thyme (optional). Serve it warm!

f6bcc9daf25d341143116ca55c233002.title: Pimento cheese dip
f6bcc9daf25d341143116ca55c233002.description: Looking for an easy snack the kids will love? Try our mini pizza cup recipe! These little bites are super simple, and you can easily customize them with your favorite toppings. They're a great way to use leftover pizza dough or sauce. So whether you're looking for a quick snack or a fun lunch option, these mini pizza cups are the perfect solution!

ingredients.name: Great Value Finely Shredded Sharp Cheddar Cheese, 8 oz
ingredients.description: 7 oz Sharp Cheddar Cheese, shredded q

ingredients.name: Great Value Cream Cheese, 8 oz
ingredients.description: 4 oz Cream Cheese, cut into pieces

ingredients.name: Great Value Mayonnaise, 15 fl oz
Great Value Roasted Red Bell Pepper Slices, 12 oz
ingredients.description: 7 oz Pimento or Roasted Red Peppers, drained

ingredients.name: Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Place all of the ingredients and half of the shredded cheese into a food processor and pulse until well combined. Scraping down the sides to fully incorporate everything.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Once incorporated, transfer to a mixing bowl and add in the other half of the shredded cheese. Stir to combine. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least an hour to let the flavors marinate.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Garnish with scallions, chopped pimentos and serve with veggie sticks or crackers if desired.

ingredients.name: Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon olive oil for salmon,1 tablespoon olive oil for avocado salsa

ingredients.name: Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
ingredients.description: 1 teaspoon salt for salmon,1 1/2 teaspoons salt for avocado salsa

ingredients.name: McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Lawry's Casero Paprika, 1.87 oz
Fishin' Co Frozen Skinless Atlantic Salmon Fillets, 20 oz
Avocados, Each
Fresh Red Onions, Each
Limes, Each
Fresh Cilantro, Bunch

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, mix oil, salt, pepper, and paprika. Coat the salmon fillets with the marinade and refrigerate for 30 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Grill the salmon on an 11 inch (28 cm) griddle pan on high heat for two minutes on each side.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In a separate bowl, lightly toss avocados, ¼ red onion, the juice from one lime, 1 tablespoon olive oil, and salt to taste.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Spoon avocado salsa on top of the cooked salmon. Top with finely cut cilantro.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

68bd8aa95c3f5c6a539a3b7d6179b6bc.title: Buffalo chickpea wraps
68bd8aa95c3f5c6a539a3b7d6179b6bc.description: A no-mess way to enjoy the tasty flavors of buffalo wings! This meal-prep-friendly wrap version turns the classic buffalo, blue cheese, and celery meal into a simple lunch.

ingredients.name: Great Value Garbanzos Chick Peas, 15.5 oz
ingredients.description: 28 oz can Chickpeas, drained and rinsed

ingredients.name: Great Value Burrito Flour Tortillas, 20 oz, 8 Count
Frank's RedHot Buffalo Wings Hot Sauce, 12 fl oz
Marketside Fresh Celery Sticks, 1.6 oz, 4 Pack
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 400F. Toss the chickpeas in a large bowl with a drizzle of olive oil, salt and pepper. Place on a parchment lined baking tray and roast for 20-25 minutes until crispy.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Transfer the roasted chickpeas to a large bowl. Pour in the buffalo sauce and stir well to combine.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Build the wraps. First spread a spoonful of blue cheese dressing onto each tortilla. Next, add the celery and top with the buffalo chickpeas. Roll into a burrito by gently folding in both sides. Lift up the bottom of the tortilla and cover the filling. From there, roll it rightly all the way up into a burrito shape. Cut and enjoy!

4e801b438a197fabcbe27ec49698903c.title: Mozzarella stick hotdish
4e801b438a197fabcbe27ec49698903c.description: Hotdish is a dinner time staple across the country, but mainly throughout the Midwest — and it’s a proven hit for a reason. A mixture of ground beef, veggies and a can of creamy soup are topped with a starch (usually crispy tater tots) to create an easy, hearty and delicious weeknight casserole. What’s better than tater tots, you ask? Mozzarella sticks, of course! Oozy mozzarella sticks add something crunchy to scoop into just like the tater tots, but they have the added benefit of being filled with cheese, which no one is going to turn down!

ingredients.name: Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil, plus more for drizzling

ingredients.name: All Natural* 73% Lean/27% Fat Ground Beef, 1 lb, Roll
Yellow Onions, Each
ingredients.description: 1 yellow onion, peeled and finely chopped

ingredients.name: Garlic Bulb, Each
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
Great Value Frozen Broccoli Florets, 12 oz Steamable Bag
Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
Great Value All-Purpose Flour, 5LB Bag
Litehouse Freeze Dried Oregano, 0.28 Oz
Great Value Organic Red Pepper Flakes, 1.2 oz
Great Value Chicken Broth, 14.5 oz Can
ingredients.description: 2 cups low-sodium chicken or vegetable broth

ingredients.name: Great Value Marinara Pasta Sauce, 23 oz
ingredients.description: 3/4 cup marinara sauce, store-bought or homemade

ingredients.name: Great Value All Natural Sour Cream, 8 oz Tub
Farm Rich Breaded Mozzarella Cheese Sticks, Frozen, 48 oz
Basil Fresh Cut 0.75 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 450 F with a rack in the upper third. Heat oil in a large straight-sided skillet or braiser over medium-high. Add beef, onion, garlic, ½ teaspoon salt and ¼ teaspoon pepper. Cook, breaking up meat with the back of a spoon, until cooked through and browned in places, 8 to 10 minutes. Stir in broccoli, cover and cook until bright green and tender, about 3 minutes. Drain mixture and transfer to a large bowl; wipe pot clean.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Melt butter in the same skillet over medium heat. Add flour, oregano, and red pepper flakes; cook, stirring often, about 2 minutes. Gradually whisk in broth and marinara sauce. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer, whisking occasionally, until thickened and darkened slightly in color, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in sour cream and ½ teaspoon salt. Add to bowl with beef mixture and toss to combine. Transfer mixture to a 2½ to 3-quart baking dish. Arrange mozzarella sticks in an even layer on top of the casserole and drizzle lightly with more olive oil.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Bake until the top is golden brown and warmed through and filling is bubbling around the edges, 15 to 20 minutes. Let cool for at least 15 minutes before serving; top with basil.

84c2b13fac00eb37739a47381a113718.title: No-sugar ginger beef and broccoli
84c2b13fac00eb37739a47381a113718.description: This is a 25-minute takeout-inspired meal that is easy to pull together, utilizes common ingredients and has that fresh, made-from-scratch flavor with a restaurant look — all on a budget. The sauce has the same luscious, sweet and salty quality as the irresistible Chinese-American takeout classic but with no added sugar and low-sodium. It’s made with a combination of chicken broth, low-sodium soy sauce, fresh ginger and arrowroot powder.

ingredients.name: Beef Choice Angus Sirloin Tender Steak, 0.6 - 1.62 lb, Tray
ingredients.description: 1 1/2 pounds lean beef, such as flank or sirloin, for beef and broccoli dish

ingredients.name: Great Value Corn Starch, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon arrowroot powder or cornstarch, for beef and broccoli dish

ingredients.name: Great Value 100% Pure Avocado Oil Cooking Spray, 4.7 oz, Metal Bottle, Shelf Stable/ Ambient
ingredients.description: 3 tablespoons avocado oil, for beef and broccoli dish

ingredients.name: Fresh Green Onions Bunch, Each
