ingredients.description: 3 green onions, diced, and sliced green onions, for garnish, for beef and broccoli dish

ingredients.name: Garlic Bulb, Each
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon minced garlic, for beef and broccoli dish

ingredients.name: Fresh Red Bell Pepper, 1 Each
ingredients.description: 1 large red bell pepper, seeded and diced, for beef and broccoli dish

ingredients.name: Fresh Broccoli Crowns, Each
ingredients.description: 2 cups chopped broccoli or broccolini, for beef and broccoli dish

ingredients.name: Sushi Chef Sesame Seeds, 3.75 Oz
ingredients.description: sesame seeds, for garnish, for beef and broccoli dish

ingredients.name: Great Value Chicken Broth, 14.5 oz Can
Great Value Less Sodium Soy Sauce, 15 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup low-sodium soy sauce, for sauce

ingredients.name: Fresh Ginger Root, Each
ingredients.description: 1 1/2 tablespoon minced fresh ginger, for sauce

ingredients.name: Arrowroot Powder 4 Ounces (1/4 Pound)

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Toss beef in arrowroot or cornstarch.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Set a wok or carbon steel pan on high heat. Once hot, add oil and the beef. Cook until sear marks appear, about 5 minutes. Then remove from the skillet and set aside.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Reduce the skillet to medium heat and add oil, green onion and garlic. Cook until fragrant, about 2 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add bell pepper and sear together for another 2 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Add chopped broccoli or broccolini, then cover the pan to let the veggies soften for 2 to 3 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Mix together the ingredients for the sauce. Add the beef to the pan and toss together. Pour in the sauce and once it starts to bubble, stir immediately and continuously so the sauce doesn’t get slimy.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Garnish with green onion and sesame seeds. Enjoy with your choice of brown rice, jasmine rice or cauliflower rice.

d8ee294f377f33061076e7c660fed3b0.title: Oven baked bbq baby back ribs
d8ee294f377f33061076e7c660fed3b0.description: Oven Baked BBQ Baby Back Ribs

ingredients.name: Pork Country Style Ribs Boneless, 1.1 - 2.5 lb, Tray
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Lawry's Casero Paprika, 1.87 oz
Lawry's Casero Cayenne Pepper, 1.62 oz
Litehouse Freeze Dried Oregano, 0.28 Oz
Great Value Light Brown Sugar, 32 oz
Sweet Baby Ray's Original Barbecue Sauce, 18 oz.
Marketside Fresh Green Beans, 12 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat oven to 275°F (140°C).

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Season the ribs with salt, black pepper, paprika, cayenne pepper, oregano, and brown sugar. Rub in the seasonings evenly on both sides.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Place the ribs on a baking sheet lined with foil. Cover the ribs with foil.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Bake for 2 hours.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Increase the oven temperature to 500°F (260°C).

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Carefully uncover the ribs. Spread BBQ sauce evenly on top of the ribs.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Place green beans on the sides of the pan. Season the green beans with salt.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Bake for 10 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Transfer the ribs to a cutting board.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Cut between the bones to separate into individual ribs. Serve with green beans.

tasks.title: Step 11
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

cc461c5cf614dc1864af4c5b4c1f42d3.title: Cheesy ham & hashbrown casserole
cc461c5cf614dc1864af4c5b4c1f42d3.description: This cheese-packed ham and hashbrown casserole is overflowing with flavors and is the perfect comfort food for a cold winter morning. The creamy potato base is topped with salty ham and ooey-gooey cheese, making it an irresistible temptation for even the most discerning palate. Plus, it's so easy to make that you'll be able to enjoy it any day of the week - not just weekends! And you can quickly reheat the leftovers to enjoy the next day.

ingredients.name: Great Value Shredded Hash Browns, 26 oz
ingredients.description: 1 (16 oz) Package frozen Hash Browns, shredded, defrosted

ingredients.name: Hillshire Farm Sliced Honey Ham Deli Lunch Meat, 9 oz
Great Value Cream of Potato Condensed Soup, 10.5 oz
ingredients.description: 1 can (10.5 oz) Can Condensed Cream of Potato Soup

ingredients.name: Great Value All Natural Sour Cream, 8 oz Tub
Great Value Finely Shredded Mild Cheddar Cheese, 8 oz
Fresh Green Onions Bunch, Each

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Spray a 2.5 quart casserole dish with nonstick cooking spray and set aside.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, mix together hash browns, diced ham, cream of potato soup, sour cream and 1 cup cheddar cheese. Incorporate well, so everything is evenly mixed

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Pour the mixture into the prepared casserole dish. Using a spatula spread the top evenly so that it cooks at the same time. Top casserole with the leftover cheese.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Bake the casserole, uncovered, for 35-45 minutes or until the inside of the mixture is hot and the cheese has browned and melted.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Serve immediately while hot with green onions on top(optional).

7fa8187529f323b066c7d607efaba1bf.title: Tuscan bean soup
7fa8187529f323b066c7d607efaba1bf.description: This rich and hearty soup is sure to please even the pickiest eaters. Using frozen carrots and hash brown potatoes cuts down on both prep time and cook time. This soup freezes well, so it’s great for meal prep!

ingredients.name: Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Fresh Red Onions, Each
Garlic Bulb, Each
Great Value Reduced Sodium Chicken Broth, 32oz Carton
Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon
Great Value Cannellini Beans, 15.5 oz
ingredients.description: 2 (15.5 ounce) cans cannellini beans, drained and rinsed

ingredients.name: Ore-Ida Shredded Hash Brown Frozen Potatoes, 30 oz Bag
ingredients.description: 1 package (15 ounces) frozen hash brown potatoes (unseasoned)

ingredients.name: Fresh Whole Carrots, 1 lb Bag
Great Value Italian Seasoning, 0.95 Oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Fresh Green Kale, 1 lb Bag
ingredients.description: 10 ounce package frozen kale or spinach

ingredients.name: Bella Rosa Shaved Parmesan Cheese, 5 Oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Heat the oil in a large soup pot over medium-high heat. When the oil is shimmering, add the onion and garlic and saute until translucent.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Stir in the broth, water, beans, potatoes, carrots, Italian seasoning, and black pepper. Simmer for 15 minutes, until the vegetables are soft and the soup is heated through.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Stir in the kale and parmesan cheese. Cook 3-4 minutes, or until warmed through.

590afc933fca33fd6a8304edaac62012.title: Quick hawaiian pizzas
590afc933fca33fd6a8304edaac62012.description: Using tortilla wraps is a time saver and it’s so convenient to have a few packets in the pantry. Especially for instant thin-base crispy pizzas, whether it’s for lunchtime snacking or a DIY pizza party. So easy and works a charm.

ingredients.name: Mission Super Soft Burrito Large Flour Tortillas, 8 Count
Ragu Homemade Style Pizza Sauce, Perfect for Quick and Easy Italian Pizza at Home, 14 OZ
Great Value Shredded Low-Moisture Part-Skim Mozzarella Cheese, 16 oz
Hillshire Farm Sliced Smoked Ham Deli Lunch Meat, 16 oz
Great Value Canned Pineapple Chunks packed in 100% Pineapple juice, 20 oz
ingredients.description: 1 can (14 oz) Pineapple Chunks or Tid Bits, drained

ingredients.name: Great Value Oregano Leaves, 0.87 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat oven to 390°F. Gather all your ingredients.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Dice the ham into 1/2 inch chunks.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Spread a heaped tablespoon of pizza sauce onto each wrap.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Sprinkle with a base of mozzarella. Reserve half for topping.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Top with diced ham.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Top with pineapple chunks.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Finish off with more mozzarella and a sprinkle of oregano.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Place onto baking paper lined baking trays and bake in two batches of 4 for 8 - 10 minutes. Cheese should be bubbling and melted and the sides golden and crispy.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Serve immediately!

30248b5c07561596d7c9699dac1fbdd0.title: Jambalaya shrimp taco bowl
30248b5c07561596d7c9699dac1fbdd0.description: Taco Tuesday just got a whole lot tastier! Our recipe combines jambalaya shrimp in a savory tomato broth with all the classic taco toppings. Add in some brown rice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, jalapenos, and more - it's an unbeatable flavor combo! These beautiful bowls are perfect for lunch or dinner - or better yet, why not make them ahead for meal prep?

ingredients.name: Zatarain's Jambalaya Rice - Family Size, 12 oz
Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon
Great Value Frozen Raw Small Peeled & Deveined, Tail-off Shrimp, 12 oz (60-80 Count per lb)
ingredients.description: 1 bag (12 oz) Medium Frozen Peeled Shrimp, thawed and patted dry

ingredients.name: Johnsonville Andouille Smoked Sausage, 13.5 oz
Yellow Onions, Each
Great Value Petite Diced Tomatoes in Tomato Juice, 14.5 Oz
Fresh Iceberg Lettuce, Each
Great Value Black Beans, 15 oz Can
Fresh Red Onions, Each
Avocados, Each
Fresh Cilantro, Bunch
La Costena Green Pickled Sliced Jalapeo Peppers, 12 Oz
Litehouse Freeze Dried Oregano, 0.28 Oz
Great Value Garlic Powder, 3.4 oz
Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a deep frying pan, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add yellow onion and sausage. Cook until onion is soft about 3-4 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add water, jambalaya mix, tomatoes, oregano, garlic powder, and salt to taste. Cover the pot with a lid and simmer over low heat for about 15 minutes until the water is mostly absorbed.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Stir in shrimp and cover. Cook for about 10 more minutes until the shrimp is cooked and the rice is tender. Remove from heat.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Let it sit for 5-7 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Transfer jambalaya rice to a serving bowl. Top with lettuce, beans, avocado, red onion, pickled jalapeno, and cilantro. Enjoy it warm.

6f5cf72297c1221efc1ca5b18a446c78.title: Air-fried chicken avocado egg rolls
6f5cf72297c1221efc1ca5b18a446c78.description: This meal reminds me of one of my favorite comfort foods growing up, and who doesn't love a great egg roll. This dish, in my opinion, is even better than the classic because it has the same irresistible crunchiness without the heaviness of being deep fried. The creamy avocado and tender chicken tucked inside a hot, crisp shell is great, but feel free to mix in other favorite ingredients inside.

ingredients.name: Swanson White Premium Chunk Canned Chicken Breast in Water, Fully Cooked Chicken, 12.5 OZ Can
ingredients.description: 1 1/2 cups cooked white, skinless chicken meat (from rotisserie chicken or leftover chicken breasts), chopped

ingredients.name: Avocados, Each
Great Value Ground Cumin, 2.5 oz
Fresh Red Onions, Each
Fresh Cilantro, Bunch
ingredients.description: 1/3 cup cilantro, finely chopped and packed

ingredients.name: Great Value Black Pepper & Iodized Salt, 5.25 oz
ingredients.description: Pinch of sea salt and pepper

ingredients.name: Concord Foods Reconstituted Lime Juice, 4.5 oz
Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count
Twin Dragon Refrigerated Plant-Based Egg Roll Wraps 18Oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Set air fryer (or convection oven) to 420 F.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add all the ingredients to a bowl and mix together until well combined.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In a small bowl, beat an egg.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add 2 to 2 1/2 tablespoons of the stuffing to the edge/corner of an egg roll wrapper. Use your finger or a paintbrush to draw a line around the inside edges of the wrapper. Then roll it over to seal the side with the stuffing, then fold in the sides and continue rolling up like an egg roll. Place it in the air fryer basket or a baking sheet lined with parchment. Repeat 9 more times, or until all the stuffing is used up.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Brush the outside of the egg rolls with the remaining egg mix, then gently spray the outside of them with avocado oil (or another high smoke point oil).

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Air fry for 10 to 12 minutes, flipping halfway through.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Enjoy fresh out of the air-fryer or oven. These are definitely best served hot!

ingredients.name: Mangoes, 1 Each
Fresh Green Bell Pepper, Each
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup green bell pepper, finely diced

ingredients.name: Fresh Red Onions, Each
Fresh Cilantro, Bunch
Concord Foods Lemon Juice, 4.5 oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns

ingredients.description: 1/2 cup red bell pepper, finely diced

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Mix all ingredients together in a large bowl.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Serve with chips or as a topping on your favorite meal.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

247876a8c4c26936ad27d7ecea4ce34e.title: Easy chicken chili
247876a8c4c26936ad27d7ecea4ce34e.description: This chicken chili recipe is full of flavor and loaded with protein from the chicken and beans. It makes for the perfect comforting meal for that cold winter night!

ingredients.name: Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Foster Farms Oven Roasted Shredded Chicken Breast Strips
White Onions, Each
Garlic Bulb, Each
Great Value Petite Diced Tomatoes in Tomato Juice, 14.5 Oz
ingredients.description: 1 (14 ounce) can fire-roasted diced tomatoes, with their juices

ingredients.name: Great Value Chicken Broth, 14.5 oz Can
Great Value Black Beans, 15 oz Can
ingredients.description: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained

ingredients.name: Great Value Canned Whole Kernel Sweet Corn, 29 oz Can
ingredients.description: 1 (15 ounce) can corn, rinsed and drained

ingredients.name: Great Value Canned Medium Diced Green Chiles, 4 Oz
Great Value Chili Powder, 3 oz
Great Value Ground Cumin, 2.5 oz
Litehouse Freeze Dried Oregano, 0.28 Oz
Great Value Crushed Red Pepper, 1.75 oz
Great Value Black Pepper & Iodized Salt, 5.25 oz
Great Value Finely Shredded Colby Jack Cheese, 8 oz
Avocados, Each
Great Value Tri-Color Tortilla Strips Salad Topper, 3.5 oz
Fresh Cilantro, Bunch
Great Value All Natural Sour Cream, 8 oz Tub
Mezzetta Deli-Sliced Hot Jalapeno Peppers, 32 oz
Concord Foods Reconstituted Lime Juice, 4.5 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. (180 degrees C)

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Cut tips off ends of zucchinis, and then cut the zucchinis in half, lengthwise. Using a small spoon scoop out the seeds and a little bit of the flesh leaving about 1/4 – 1/2 inch flesh on the zucchini. Place the prepared zucchini scooped out side up in a baking dish with about an inch of water covering the bottom of the pan. Cover with foil and bake for about 18 minutes. Remove the water from the pan with zucchini boats when they’re done baking.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Adjust oven temperature to 375 degrees F. (190 degrees C)

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add 1/2 cup shredded mozzarella to the zucchini boats, then top with marinara, and then the other 1/2 cup mozzarella.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Sprinkle with garlic powder, then add mini pepperoni and any other desired toppings. Cover with foil and bake for 10 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Remove foil, then cook uncovered for additional 7-8 minutes or until zucchini is tender. Top with parsley or basil and enjoy!

ee7c18b576bce0658948cede8b85e6b9.title: Greek orzo salad
ee7c18b576bce0658948cede8b85e6b9.description: Not all pasta salads are created equal. Some are dense and creamy, usually thanks to an abundance of mayonnaise, while others are light, bright and colorful. This recipe falls into the latter category. It’s inspired by Greek salad but the lettuce is replaced with tender orzo to ensure it’s hearty and satisfying. This is a crowd-pleasing pasta salad to cart to your next cookout or picnic.

ingredients.name: Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Concord Foods Lemon Juice, 4.5 oz
Star Italian Kitchen Red Wine Vinegar, 12 fl oz
Great Value Dijon Mustard, 12 oz Squeeze Bottle
Litehouse Freeze Dried Oregano, 0.28 Oz
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
ingredients.description: 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, plus more as needed

ingredients.name: McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
ingredients.description: 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, plus more as needed

ingredients.name: Fresh Red Onions, Each
ingredients.description: 1/2 medium red onion, peeled and finely diced

ingredients.name: Rao's Homemade Bronze Die Cut Fusilli Pasta, 16 oz
Cherry Tomato, 10 oz Package
ingredients.description: 1 pint cherry or grape tomatoes, halved

ingredients.name: Fresh Cucumber, Each
ingredients.description: 1/2 large English cucumber, unpeeled and diced

ingredients.name: Mezzetta Pitted Greek Kalamata Olives, 9.5 oz
ingredients.description: 1 cup pitted Kalamata olives, coarsely chopped

ingredients.name: Fresh Curly Parsley Bunch, Each
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup loosely packed, coarsely chopped fresh parsley leaves

ingredients.name: Frigo Crumbleed Feta Cheese, 5 Oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Meanwhile, whisk the oil, lemon juice, vinegar, mustard, oregano, salt and pepper together in a large bowl. Add the onion, toss to coat and set aside to quick pickle.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add the orzo to the boiling water and cook until al dente, 7 to 9 minutes or according to package instructions. Drain and run briefly under cool water to cool the orzo down.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add the orzo, tomatoes, cucumbers, olives and parsley to the bowl with the pickled onion and toss to combine. Add the feta and toss gently. Let sit at least 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, to allow the flavors to meld. Taste and season with more salt and pepper as needed before serving.

ingredients.name: Fishin' Co Frozen Skinless Atlantic Salmon Fillets, 20 oz
ingredients.description: 20 ounce raw, center-cut, skinless salmon filets, reserve 5oz of salmon filet to roughly chop

ingredients.name: Great Value Plain Panko Bread Crumbs, 8 oz
Lawry's Casero Smoked Paprika, 2 oz
Morton Sea Salt, Fine, 4.4 Ounce
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Fresh Green Onions Bunch, Each
Fresh Jalapeno Pepper, Approx. 3-5 per 0.25 Pound
Great Value Finely Shredded Mild Cheddar Cheese, 8 oz
Great Value Hamburger Buns, 8 Count, 11 oz
Fresh Iceberg Lettuce, Each
Fair Trade Organic Tomato on the Vine, 1 lb Package
ingredients.description: 1 tomato on the vine, ¼-inch slice

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Add 15 ounces of salmon to a high-powered blender or food processor. Using the Pulse setting, blend until the salmon is sticky but not totally homogeneous. Transfer to a mixing bowl.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add remaining ingredients — including 5 ounces of roughly chopped salmon — to the bowl and stir until just combined.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Evenly divide the mixture to create 5 patties. Place on a plate, cover and chill in the fridge for at least 20 minutes to become firm.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Set oven to 425 F.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: In a large nonstick skillet set over medium heat, spray with neutral oil and gently add the salmon burgers. Sear for 1 to 2 minutes and then flip, continuing to cook for 1 to 2 minutes, or until the edges of the salmon burger turn brown and crispy.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Transfer the patties to a parchment-lined sheet tray and bake for 6 to 10 minutes, depending on the thickness of the burgers and your preference of doneness.Once cooked, place each burger on a bun with lettuce, sliced tomato and avocado.

6e3a6050f0e032ab4ed9d74f104409b4.title: Grilled flank steak and corn salad
6e3a6050f0e032ab4ed9d74f104409b4.description: This grilled flank steak and corn salad is a hearty and satisfying meal with tender, smoky steak, sweet corn, juicy cherry tomatoes, and spicy fresno chiles.

ingredients.name: Fresh Sweet Corn on the Cob (1 each)
Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon salt, plus more to taste

ingredients.name: McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
ingredients.description: 1 teaspoon black pepper, plus more to taste

ingredients.name: Beef Choice Angus New York Strip Steak Thick, 0.5 - 1.38 lb, Tray
Lawry's Casero Smoked Paprika, 2 oz
Great Value Light Brown Sugar, 32 oz
Great Value Chili Powder, 3 oz
Great Value Onion Powder, 3.25 oz
Great Value Ground Cumin, 2.5 oz
Great Value Chipotle Taco Seasoning Mix, 1 oz
Great Value Garlic Powder, 3.4 oz
Great Value Canola Oil Non-Stick Cooking Spray, 8 oz
Las Palmas Medium Red Chile Sauce, 28 Oz
ingredients.description: 3 red Fresno chiles, seeded and sliced

ingredients.name: Avocados, Each
Fresh Red Onions, Each
Cherry Tomato, 10 oz Package
Fresh Jalapeno Pepper, Approx. 3-5 per 0.25 Pound
Great Value Organic Strained Raw Honey, 12 oz Inverted Plastic Bottle
Concord Foods Reconstituted Lime Juice, 4.5 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a medium bowl, drizzle the corn with 2 tablespoons of olive oil and season with salt and pepper to taste. Massage the corn until fully coated. Set aside.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a small bowl, combine the paprika, salt, brown sugar, chili powder, onion powder, cumin, garlic powder, chipotle powder, and black pepper and mix together.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Sprinkle the dry rub all over both sides of the flank steak. Rub in the spices.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: On a heated grill or grill pan greased with canola oil, add the seasoned flank steak and cook until it begins to char slightly, about 3 minutes each side. Remove from the grill and let rest for at least 15 minutes to cool and keep the juices inside.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Add the seasoned corn to the grill pan. Cook until charred slightly, 3-5 minutes per side. Remove the corn from the grill and set aside to cool.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Set a small bowl upside-down inside a large bowl. Stand the corn cobs on the small bowl and cut off the kernels. Remove the small bowl.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Add the chiles, avocado, red onion, cherry tomatoes, jalapeños, lime juice, honey, salt, pepper, and the remaining 2 tablespoons of olive oil. Mix to combine.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Cut the meat into ½ inch (1 cm) slices.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Top with the corn salad and serve.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

0aac2f4d9b73736d830a15f39bb788a9.title: Butternut squash soup
0aac2f4d9b73736d830a15f39bb788a9.description: If there’s one thing you should be eating more of this fall, it’s butternut squash soup (the homemade kind, of course). This seasonal recipe is easy to whip together in no time, and you can make a big batch at once to freeze for lazy nights or on-the-go work lunches.

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Salted Butter, 16 oz
Garlic Bulb, Each
Fresh Red Onions, Each
Baby Yellow Potatoes, 1.5 lb Bag
Fresh Celery Stalk, Each
Fresh Whole Carrots, 1 lb Bag
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Pacific Foods Organic Creamy Butternut Squash Soup, 32oz
ingredients.description: 2 lb butternut squash, peeled, seeded, and cubed

ingredients.name: Great Value Vegetable Broth, 32 oz
Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon
Sprout House Fresh Cut Bay Leaves - .25oz
Mariposa Farms Fresh Cut Thyme, .75 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Melt the butter in a large pot over medium heat, then add the garlic and onion and sauté for 1-2 minutes, until the onion is translucent.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add the potato, celery, carrot, salt, and pepper. Sauté for 3 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add the butternut squash, broth, water, bay leaf, and thyme and stir. Bring to a boil.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Cover and reduce the heat to low. Simmer for 25-30 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Remove the thyme stems and bay leaf.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Use an immersion or countertop blender to blend the soup until smooth.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Let cool for 2 minutes, then serve.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

ec13664938a2db9869d69861c84ac5e8.title: Beef kofta kebab with yogurt sauce
ec13664938a2db9869d69861c84ac5e8.description: If you love the taste of Middle Eastern cuisine and want to impress your family and friends with a delicious, easy-to-make dish, then you'll love our beef kofta kebab with yogurt sauce recipe. We use a homemade dry spice mix that quickly turns ground beef into flavorful meat ready to be shaped around a skewer.

ingredients.name: All Natural* 73% Lean/27% Fat Ground Beef, 1 lb, Roll
Fresh Cilantro, Bunch
Mint Fresh Cut, 0.75 oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 bunch Fresh Mint Leaves, finely chopped

ingredients.name: Great Value Onion Powder, 3.25 oz
Spice Islands Ground Coriander, 1.7 oz
Great Value Ground Cumin, 2.5 oz
Lawry's Casero Cayenne Pepper, 1.62 oz
Great Value Ground Turmeric, 2 oz
Great Value Garlic Powder, 3.4 oz
Great Value Kosher Ground Cinnamon, 2.5 Oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Marketside Tzatziki Style Dip, 16 oz
Great Value Canola Oil Non-Stick Cooking Spray, 8 oz
Fresh Red Onions, Each
ingredients.description: Sliced Red Onions to taste, for optional garnish

ingredients.name: Fresh Curly Parsley Bunch, Each
ingredients.description: Chopped Fresh Parsley to taste, for optional garnish

ingredients.name: Fresh Cucumber, Each
ingredients.description: Sliced Cucumbers to taste, for optional garnish

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a large mixing bowl, combine Onion Powder (1/2 Tbsp) , Ground Coriander (1/2 Tbsp) , Ground Cumin (1 Tbsp) , Cayenne Pepper (1 tsp) , Ground Turmeric (1 tsp) , Garlic Powder (1/2 tsp) , Ground Cinnamon (1/2 tsp) , Salt (1/2 Tbsp) and Ground Black Pepper (1 tsp) . Mix well.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Continue adding Ground Beef (1.5 lb) , Fresh Parsley (to taste) , Fresh Cilantro (1 bunch) , and Fresh Mint Leaves (1/2 bunch) .

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Wet your hands and knead everything together to combine all ingredients. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 30 minutes or overnight.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Take about 1/4 cup of the meat mixture and shape them into sausage shapes. Press the skewer into it and press the meat around it to seal. Repeat with the remaining meat mixture.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Spray a griddle skillet with Nonstick Cooking Spray (as needed) . Over medium heat, grill the skewers for 4-5 minutes on each side until cooked through. Transfer to a serving plate.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Sprinkle it with Red Onions (to taste) and Fresh Parsley (to taste) . Serve with Cucumbers (to taste) and Tzatziki (1 cup) dipping sauce on the side.

e369d095f2ef403ba2c03bf4a7dea23e.title: Creamy penne with ricotta and tomato sauce
e369d095f2ef403ba2c03bf4a7dea23e.description: Our Creamy Penne with Ricotta and Tomato Sauce is an easy family dinner that packs a ton of flavor into one pot. The best part? It's ready in just 30 minutes. Not only does this meal come together quickly, but it also looks beautiful on a plate. It’s hard to believe such deliciousness came out of just one pot!

ingredients.name: Great Value Penne Pasta, 16 oz
Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon
Bella Sun Luci Julienne Cut Sun Dried with Italian Herbs Tomatoes, 8.5 oz
ingredients.description: 1 jar (8.5 oz) Sun-Dried Tomatoes in Olive Oil (drained, chopped, and reserve 3 Tbsp of the oil)

ingredients.name: Yellow Onions, Each
Garlic Bulb, Each
Lawry's Casero Smoked Paprika, 2 oz
Great Value Organic Red Pepper Flakes, 1.2 oz
Great Value Original Ricotta Cheese, 15 oz
Great Value Finely Shredded Parmesan Cheese, 6 oz
Shenandoah Growers Organic Fresh Potted Basil, 1 Each
ingredients.description: 1/2 bunch Fresh Basil, chopped, plus more for garnish

ingredients.name: Lemons, Each
ingredients.description: 1 Lemon, juiced (2 Tbsp of juice needed)

ingredients.name: Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a large stockpot of Water (6 cups) , add Penne Pasta (2 2/3 cups) and Salt (to taste) . Bring to a boil and cook until al dente according to the package instructions.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a separate pot, heat the oil from Sun-Dried Tomatoes in Olive Oil (1 jar) over medium-high heat. Then add the Yellow Onion (1) and Garlic (3 cloves) . Cook for about 3 minutes until soft and fragrant.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add the sun-dried tomatoes, Smoked Paprika (1 Tbsp) , Crushed Red Pepper Flakes (1 Tbsp) , Salt (to taste) , and Ground Black Pepper (to taste) . Continue stirring for about 4-5 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add pasta, Ricotta Cheese (1 2/3 cups) , and Shredded Parmesan Cheese (1 cup) . Cook for 3 more minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in Fresh Basil (1/2 bunch) and 2 Tbsp of Lemon Juice (1) .

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Transfer to a serving platter and garnish with basil. Serve immediately!

de3bb49d5bbced5f0cb0c814359ffc75.title: Thai red vegetable curry
de3bb49d5bbced5f0cb0c814359ffc75.description: This delicious vegetable curry recipe is so easy to make that you can have a delightful and surprisingly healthy meal ready in under 30 minutes, with minimal effort. Made with a rich and spicy Thai red curry paste, to which you can add your favorite vegetables, it’s sure to satisfy all your tastebuds and make for an irresistible option. Plus, there are enough leftovers for the next day – if you don’t eat it all! Whether as a mid-week pick-me-up or an indulgent cozy night in, this vegetable curry will hit the spot.

ingredients.name: Birds Eye Asian Stir Fry Frozen Vegetables with Sauce, 52.2 oz
ingredients.description: 3 3/4 cups Frozen Asian Stir-Fry Vegetable Mix

ingredients.name: Bush's Garbanzo Beans, Canned Chickpeas, 16 oz Can
Great Value Vegetable Broth, 32 oz
Fresh Red Onions, Each
Fresh Ginger Root, Each
Garlic Bulb, Each
Mae Ploy Paste - Red Curry 14 OZ
Savia Coconut Milk, 13.5 fl oz
Great Value Less Sodium Soy Sauce, 15 fl oz
Crisco Pure Vegetable Oil, 16 fl oz
Limes, Each
Stonefire Original Naan Dippers, 7.05 oz, 20 Count
Fresh Cilantro, Bunch
ingredients.description: Roughly Chopped Fresh Cilantro Leaves, for garnish

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a deep frying pan over medium-high heat, heat Vegetable Oil (2 Tbsp) . Add Garlic (3 cloves) , Fresh Ginger (1 Tbsp) , and Red Onion (1) . Stir for about 3 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add in the Frozen Asian Stir-Fry Vegetable Mix (3 3/4 cups) and stir fry for 6-8 minutes or until they are starting to get tender.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add in Red Curry Paste (3 Tbsp) , Chickpeas (1 can) , Coconut Milk (1 can) , Vegetable Broth (1 cup) , and Soy Sauce (1 Tbsp) . Bring to a simmer for about 5 minutes or until the curry has thickened up.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Remove from heat and stir in the juice of a Lime (1) . Garnish with Fresh Cilantro Leaves (to taste) (optional) and serve with Naans (4) if desired.

640aee0a2d7c061f3fbdee46828190e2.title: Copycat chicken lettuce wraps
640aee0a2d7c061f3fbdee46828190e2.description: These make great appetizers for a party or can be a low-carb entrée.

ingredients.name: Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon
Kikkoman Tamari Less Sodium Soy Sauce , 10 Fl Oz
Panda Lee Kum Kee Sauce Oyster, 9 Oz
Mizkan Mirin Sweet Cooking Seasoning, 12fl oz- Pack of 1
Kikkoman No Preservatives Added Gluten-Free Hoisin Sauce, 13.2 oz
BetterBody Foods Organic Coconut Palm Sugar, 24 Oz
Arrowroot Powder 4 Ounces (1/4 Pound)
Ocean's Halo, Organic and Vegan Rice Noodles, 6.3 oz.
Great Value 100% Pure Avocado Oil Cooking Spray, 4.7 oz, Metal Bottle, Shelf Stable/ Ambient
Foster Farms Fresh & Natural Cage Free Family Pack Chicken Thighs 64 -88 oz (4-5.5 lb) Tray
ingredients.description: 1 1/2 pound chicken thighs, ¼-inch dice for filling

ingredients.name: Morton Sea Salt, Fine, 4.4 Ounce
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
PAM, Non-GMO, Avocado Cooking Oil Spray, 5 fl oz
Imperial Dragon 100% Pure Sesame Seed Oil, 5 fl oz
Dynasty Water Chestnuts Sliced, 8 Oz
ingredients.description: 8 ounce canned water chestnuts, drained and diced into ¼ inch pieces

ingredients.name: Sliced Baby Bella Mushrooms, 16 oz
Garlic Bulb, Each
Fresh Ginger Root, Each
Fresh Green Onions Bunch, Each
Marketside Butter Lettuce Salad Blend, 6 oz Bag, Fresh
ingredients.description: 2 heads butter lettuce (or romaine, if unavailable), washed, core removed and separated into individual leaves

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a medium-sized bowl, add all of the ingredients for the sauce and whisk to combine. Set aside.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: If you would like the vibrant white crispy noodles like the traditional recipe, in a small pot set over medium-high heat, add about 1/3 cup avocado oil. Once the oil is hot (350 F to 365 F), slowly add the noodles, breaking them up, and fry for 2 to 4 seconds. Remove the noodles using a fork or spider ladle.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Set a large wok over medium-high heat. Once hot, spray with avocado oil and, cooking in batches, add about 1/3 of the diced chicken, salt and pepper. Cook the chicken until it’s crispy and no longer pink, about 8 to 10 minutes. Remove from the wok and set aside. Repeat with two more batche

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Once all of the chicken is cooked, heat spray avocado oil and sesame oil. Add water chestnuts and mushrooms, cooking for 2 to 3 minutes. In the last minute, add garlic, ginger, if using, and green onions, and toss to combine.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Add the chicken (and its juices) back to the wok and continue tossing everything together for 1 minute. Reduce the heat to low, add the prepared sauce and continuously stir as the sauce thickens. As soon as it thickens, remove the wok from the heat.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: BUILD THE WRAPS: Take a leaf of lettuce, add 1 tablespoon of crispy noodles and 1 to 2 tablespoons of chicken mix.

568cb70093804e2404000e2d7ca19349.title: Deconstructed falafel salad
568cb70093804e2404000e2d7ca19349.description: The crispy balls of fried falafel are a perfect match for warm pita bread, tahini sauce and endless fresh toppings like cucumbers, tomatoes, olives and herbs.The Deconstructed Falafel Salad has all the spicy flavors and fresh elements that you expect from your favorite falafel cart, but it is a bit lighter and more nutritious.

ingredients.name: KRINOS TAHINI MIX, 16 OZ
Concord Foods Lemon Juice, 4.5 oz
ingredients.description: 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice, for dressing

ingredients.name: Garlic Bulb, Each
ingredients.description: 1 clove garlic, finely grated, for dressing

ingredients.name: Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon
ingredients.description: 3 tablespoons water, plus more as needed, for dressing

ingredients.name: Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
ingredients.description: 1/8 teaspoon kosher salt, for dressing,kosher salt, for salad

ingredients.name: McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
ingredients.description: 1/8 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, for dressing,freshly ground black pepper, for salad

ingredients.name: Fresh Cucumber, Each
ingredients.description: 3 Persian cucumbers, thinly sliced, for salad

ingredients.name: Fresh Red Radish, Bunch
Fresh Red Onions, Each
ingredients.description: 1/2 small red onion, thinly sliced, for salad

ingredients.name: Great Value Distilled White Vinegar, 32 fl oz
ingredients.description: tablespoons distilled white vinegar, for salad

ingredients.name: C&H Premium Pure Cane Granulated Sugar, 1 lb Box
Bush's Garbanzo Beans, Canned Chickpeas, 16 oz Can
ingredients.description: 2 (15-ounce) cans chickpeas, rinsed and drained, for salad

ingredients.name: Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
ingredients.description: 5 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided, for salad

ingredients.name: Dea Harissa Hot Sauce Tube - 4.23 oz
Fresh Green Kale Bunch, Each
ingredients.description: 1 (10-ounce) bunch curly kale, stems removed, leaves torn into bite-size pieces, for salad

ingredients.name: Josephs Low Net Carb Flax Pita Bread, 1 Pack, 6 Count
ingredients.description: 2 (8-inch) pitas, torn into bite-size pieces, for salad

ingredients.name: Cherry Tomato, 10 oz Package
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved, for salad

ingredients.name: Great Value Pitted Kalamata Greek Olives, 6.35oz Jar
ingredients.description: 1/3 cup pitted Greek olives, for salad

ingredients.name: Fresh Italian Parsley Bunch, Each
Mint Fresh Cut, 0.75 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: MAKE THE VINAIGRETTE

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a small bowl, whisk together tahini, lemon juice, oil, garlic, water, salt and pepper until smooth and a spoonable consistency (add more water 1 teaspoon at a time to thin out if needed).

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: MAKE THE SALAD

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: In a medium bowl, combine cucumber, radish, onion, vinegar, sugar and ? teaspoon salt. Let stand at room temperature at least 20 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Meanwhile, preheat oven to 425 F with a rimmed baking sheet on the center rack; heat for 15 minutes. Pat chickpeas dry, then toss with 2 tablespoons oil, harissa and ½ teaspoon salt. Carefully spread into a single layer on the preheated baking sheet. Roast, tossing once, until crisp, about 10 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Push chickpeas to one side of the baking sheet; toss pita with 1 tablespoon oil, ½ teaspoon salt and ? teaspoon pepper; add to other side of baking sheet. Toss kale with remaining 2 tablespoons oil, ½ teaspoon salt and ? teaspoon pepper and spread onto a second baking sheet. Continue roasting both sheets until pita is crisp and kale is tender and golden in places, 8 to 12 minutes more. Let cool slightly.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Drain pickle mixture from brine and arrange on a serving platter, along with roasted kale, chickpeas, pita, tomatoes and olives. Scatter herbs over salad and drizzle tahini dressing over the top.

049664aa6e40bc51514bd77e0558ca4c.title: Old fashioned sloppy joes
049664aa6e40bc51514bd77e0558ca4c.description: These old-fashioned Sloppy Joes taste even better than you remember. Mix up a batch of the juicy, meaty burgers, and you're all set for game night, parties, or picnics. They're also great for a quick lunch or dinner any day of the week. And don't worry about the mess - that's all part of the fun!

ingredients.name: All Natural* 73% Lean/27% Fat Ground Beef, 1 lb, Roll
Fresh Red Onions, Each
Fresh Green Bell Pepper, Each
Great Value Petite Diced Tomatoes in Tomato Juice, 14.5 Oz
Great Value Sloppy Joe Sauce, 15 oz
Great Value Hamburger Buns, 8 Count, 11 oz
Great Value Sweet Cream Salted Butter, 16 oz
Great Value Garlic Powder, 3.4 oz
Crisco Pure Vegetable Oil, 16 fl oz
Ore-Ida Extra Crispy Fast Food Fries, French Fried Frozen Potatoes, 26 oz Bag
ingredients.description: French Fries to taste (optional), for for serving

ingredients.name: Tillen Farms Pickled Baby Cucumbers
ingredients.description: Pickled Cucumbers to taste (optional), for for serving

ingredients.name: Kraft Coleslaw Salad Dressing, 16 fl oz Bottle
ingredients.description: Coleslaw Mix to taste (optional), for for serving

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: To a large skillet or frying pan over medium-high heat add Vegetable Oil (1 tsp) and brown Ground Beef (1 lb) until no longer pink, about 5 minutes. Drain any excess oil.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add Onion (1/2) to ground beef as well as Green Bell Peppers (2) . Cook until vegetables are translucent, about 2-3 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add Diced Tomatoes (1 can) and Sloppy Joe Sauce (1 can) . Once it comes to a boil, reduce heat to medium-low to simmer. Cook for 5-10 minutes, stirring occasionally until tomatoes and peppers are cooked and the sauce is no longer runny.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Meanwhile, Butter (2 Tbsp) open sides of the Hamburger Buns (4) and sprinkle lightly with Garlic Powder (1/2 Tbsp) . Toast on a frying pan for 3-4 minutes or until lightly browned.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Serve meat sauce over buns, like a burger. Serve with Coleslaw Mix (to taste) , Pickled Cucumbers (to taste) , and a side of French Fries (to taste) .

887fceb9c9898c8c8f69d7b2aa9fd8d6.title: Marinated steak wraps
887fceb9c9898c8c8f69d7b2aa9fd8d6.description: With our delicious steak wraps, you can have a nutritious and delicious meal any day of the week. Bring them to any picnic, lunch, or big game, and enjoy healthy lean beef combined with fresh veggies! Eating smart has never been so tasty – it’s like having your personal dietitian on the go every time.

ingredients.name: Beef Choice Angus Sirloin Tender Steak, 0.6 - 1.62 lb, Tray
Garlic Bulb, Each
Great Value Original Taco Seasoning Mix, 1 oz
Great Value Garlic Powder, 3.4 oz
Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Fresh Romaine Lettuce Hearts 3 Count, Each
Cherubs Grape Tomatoes, 10 oz Package
Avocados, Each
Fresh Red Onions, Each
World Harbors Mexican Style Fajita Sauce & Marinade
Great Value Burrito Flour Tortillas, 20 oz, 8 Count

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a small bowl, combine Garlic (2 cloves) , Taco Seasoning (1 Tbsp) , Garlic Powder (1 Tbsp) , Salt (1/2 tsp) , and Ground Black Pepper (1 tsp) .

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Rub the Flank Steak (1 lb) with the mixture and place in a ziplock bag for 5-10 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In a cast iron or heavy bottom pan, heat the Oil (3 Tbsp) over medium-high. Once hot, add steak and sear for 5 minutes on each side or until internal temperature reaches 160 degrees F (72 degrees C).

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Set aside and let the beef rest for at least 5 minutes. This will allow the proteins to rest and the juices won’t bleed out when you cut into it.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: In a pan over medium heat, warm the Flour Tortillas (4) until softened, about 15 seconds a side.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Prepare each wrap by topping each tortilla with beef and Lettuce (5 cups) , Avocado (1) , Red Onion (1/2) , Tomato (1) , and Mexican Style Hot Sauce (1 Tbsp) .

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Wrap it up and serve!

9c4d952c0e3b574d7ca13d40dae41875.title: Lemon garlic shrimp pasta
9c4d952c0e3b574d7ca13d40dae41875.description: This easy 30-minute pasta recipe transforms ingredients that you already have in your kitchen into a posh, seafood dish you’ll want to serve at your next dinner party. And since the whole dish is made in a single pot, clean-up is easy. Don’t be surprised if this becomes your favorite quick go-to.

ingredients.name: Great Value Linguine, 16 oz
Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
Garlic Bulb, Each
Great Value Organic Red Pepper Flakes, 1.2 oz
Great Value Frozen Raw Small Peeled & Deveined, Tail-off Shrimp, 12 oz (60-80 Count per lb)
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Litehouse Freeze Dried Oregano, 0.28 Oz
Marketside Fresh Baby Spinach, 6 oz Bag, Fresh
Great Value Finely Shredded Parmesan Cheese, 6 oz
Fresh Italian Parsley Bunch, Each
Concord Foods Lemon Juice, 4.5 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a large pot, boil water and add pasta. Cook (stirring frequently) until al dente.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Drain and set pasta aside.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In the same pan, heat olive oil and 2 tablespoons of butter. Add garlic and crushed red pepper, cook until fragrant.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Toss in shrimp, salt and pepper to taste, and stir until shrimp start to turn pink, but are not fully cooked.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Add oregano and spinach, cook until wilted.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Return cooked pasta to the pot, add remaining butter, parmesan, and parsley. Stir until well mixed and the butter is melted.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: When the shrimp are cooked, add lemon juice, mix once more, then serve while hot.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

ingredients.name: Beef Top Sirloin Steak Family Pack, 1.15 - 2.43 lb, Tray
ingredients.description: 2 lb sirloin steak, cut into 1-inch cubes

ingredients.name: Great Value Ground Cumin, 2.5 oz
Great Value Chili Powder, 3 oz
Great Value Garlic Powder, 3.4 oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Fresh Green Bell Pepper, Each
ingredients.description: 2 green bell peppers, cut into 1-inch pieces

ingredients.name: Fresh Red Bell Pepper, 1 Each
ingredients.description: 2 red bell peppers, cut into 1-inch pieces

ingredients.name: White Onions, Each
ingredients.description: 1 large white onion, cut into 1-inch pieces

ingredients.name: GoodCook ProFreshionals 10" Bamboo Skewers for BBQ and Kebab 100-count, Natural
ingredients.description: 8 skewers bamboo skewer, soaked in water for 20 minutes for equipment

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Combine the steak, cumin, chili powder, garlic powder, salt, and pepper in a medium bowl and mix until the steak is evenly coated.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Slide a piece of steak down a skewer, followed by a piece of green pepper, red pepper, and onion. Continue until there is a 1-inch gap on the top of the skewer.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Repeat with the remaining skewers.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Grease the surface of the grill by rubbing the grates with an oiled paper towel (use tongs to grip!).

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Grill the skewers for 10-15 minutes with the lid closed, flipping them halfway through.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

ingredients.name: All Natural* 73% Lean/27% Fat Ground Beef, 1 lb, Roll
ingredients.description: 2 pounds ground beef or ground turkey for meatloaf

ingredients.name: Armour Pepperoni Slices, 5 oz
Fresh Italian Parsley Bunch, Each
ingredients.description: 3 tablespoons fresh parsley, chopped for meatloaf,1 tablespoon fresh parsley, chopped plus more for garnish for sauce

ingredients.name: Garlic Bulb, Each
Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count
Great Value Italian Style Bread Crumbs, 15 oz
Great Value Whole Vitamin D Milk, Half Gallon, 64 fl oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
Great Value Italian Seasoning, 0.95 Oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
ingredients.description: 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper for meatloaf

ingredients.name: Great Value Shredded Low-Moisture Part-Skim Mozzarella Cheese, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese for meatloaf

ingredients.name: Great Value Pizza Sauce, 23.9 oz
Great Value Garlic Powder, 3.4 oz
Litehouse Freeze Dried Oregano, 0.28 Oz
Gourmet Garden Lightly Dried Basil, 0.42 oz
Great Value Organic Red Pepper Flakes, 1.2 oz
ingredients.description: 1/8 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes for sauce

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: FOR THE MEATLOAF:Preheat the oven to 375 F.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Combine all of the meatloaf ingredients together in a mixing bowl, with the exception of the shredded mozzarella cheese

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Form the meat mixture into the shape of the 9- by 5-inch loaf pan and place in the pan.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Make a horizontal well down the center of the meatloaf with your hand, wide enough to add the shredded cheese. Place the cheese in the middle of the meatloaf and seal the opening with the meat mixture so that no cheese is exposed.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Place loaf in the oven and bake for 50 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: FOR THE SAUCE: While the meatloaf is baking, add sauce and seasonings and stir together in a medium saucepan or pot over medium heat. Continue to cook until it begins to bubble.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Turn down the heat to low and occasionally stir while the meatloaf is baking, about 20 more minutes.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: TO SERVE: Remove the meatloaf from the oven and allow it to rest for 10 minutes before slicing. Ladle sauce on top of the meatloaf or slice it and ladle sauce on individual slices, if desired.

561eabeb0de110da82ad6a0877381e3c.title: Honey garlic chicken veggie skewers
561eabeb0de110da82ad6a0877381e3c.description: These skewers are the perfect combination of sweet and savory, featuring juicy chicken, crunchy vegetables, and a flavorful honey garlic marinade. They are perfect for a summer barbecue or as an easy and healthy weeknight dinner.

ingredients.name: Crisco Pure Vegetable Oil, 16 fl oz
Great Value Organic Strained Raw Honey, 12 oz Inverted Plastic Bottle
Great Value Less Sodium Soy Sauce, 15 fl oz
Garlic Bulb, Each
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Great Value All Natural Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts, 3 lb (Frozen)
Fresh Red Onions, Each
Fresh Red Bell Pepper, 1 Each
Fresh Orange Bell Pepper, Each
Fresh Yellow Bell Pepper, Each
Fresh Curly Parsley Bunch, Each
ingredients.description: fresh parsley, to taste, for skewers

ingredients.name: GoodCook ProFreshionals 10" Bamboo Skewers for BBQ and Kebab 100-count, Natural
ingredients.description: wooden skewer, soaked in water, for special equipment

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Soak the skewers in water for 5-10 minutes and set aside.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a bowl with the chicken, add the ingredients for the marinade.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Mix until coated. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 30 minutes to 2 hours.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: If baking, preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Prepare the vegetables by cutting them into 1-inch (2 ½ cm) squares.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Assemble the skewers starting with the red onion, followed by the bell peppers and chicken. Repeat three times.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Place the prepared skewers on a baking sheet and brush with remaining marinade.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Bake or grill for 20-30 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Sprinkle with parsley.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

13dcf171ce1b3e3ee9f1a915691d1b23.title: Easy shrimp ceviche
13dcf171ce1b3e3ee9f1a915691d1b23.description: Dive into this refreshing Easy Shrimp Ceviche, perfect for a light and zesty appetizer! With a burst of citrusy flavors and succulent shrimp, your taste buds will be dancing with delight.

ingredients.name: Limes, Each
Great Value Frozen Raw Small Peeled & Deveined, Tail-off Shrimp, 12 oz (60-80 Count per lb)
ingredients.description: 1 lb shrimp, peeled, deveined, and diced

ingredients.name: Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
Fresh Jalapeno Pepper, Approx. 3-5 per 0.25 Pound
Fresh Red Onions, Each
Cherry Tomato, 10 oz Package
Fresh Cilantro, Bunch
ingredients.description: fresh cilantro leaf, for garnish, optional

ingredients.name: Great Value Restaurant Style White Corn Tortilla Chips, 13 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Halve the limes, then juice using a citrus press or a pair of kitchen tongs. You should have about 1 cup (240 ML) total.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a medium bowl, combine the shrimp, lime juice, salt, jalapeños, onion, and tomatoes. Mix well.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Cover and refrigerate for about 4 hours, until the shrimp is opaque and firm.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Serve the ceviche chilled. Garnish with cilantro, if desired, and serve with tortilla chips.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

65778fa0c3ae3c8a05f972bdbca1fbf1.title: Zucchini fries
65778fa0c3ae3c8a05f972bdbca1fbf1.description: These zucchini fries are packed full of flavor and umami. It’s crispy and herbaceous, great for any appetizer at a party. Using the panko breadcrumbs allows it to stay crunchy for a long time.

ingredients.name: Fresh Zucchini Squash, Each
GV All Purpose Flour 2LB Bag
Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count
Kikkoman Panko Breading Crumbs, 16 oz Box
Great Value Finely Shredded Parmesan Cheese, 6 oz
Great Value Organic Red Pepper Flakes, 1.2 oz
Great Value Italian Seasoning, 0.95 Oz
Fresh Curly Parsley Bunch, Each
Crisco Pure Vegetable Oil, 16 fl oz
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
ingredients.description: Freshly Ground Black Pepper to taste

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Place a medium pot filled halfway with Oil (as needed) over medium heat and let the heat reaches 350 degrees F (180 degrees C).

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a large mixing bowl; add in Panko Breadcrumbs (2 cups) , Parmesan Cheese (1/2 cup) , Italian Seasoning (1 tsp) , and Crushed Red Pepper Flakes (1/2 Tbsp) , and season with Kosher Salt (to taste) and Freshly Ground Black Pepper (to taste) .

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Set up 3 mixing bowls, one with All-Purpose Flour (1/2 cup) , one for Large Eggs (3) , and one for the Panko mixture.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: First, place the Zucchini (2) into the flour and dust off the excess flour, then dip into eggs and lastly coat into the panko mixture. Press the zucchini into the panko mixture so that it is evenly coated.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: When the heat reaches 350 degrees F (180 degrees C), place 4-5 pieces of the zucchini in the pot and fry until golden brown for about 4-5 minutes. Do this in batches until all the zucchini are done and crispy. Do not overcrowd the pot or the temperature will go too low.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Transfer the zucchini fries to the cooling rack to drain out the excess oil before serving.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Serve immediately, garnished with Fresh Parsley (2 Tbsp) or ranch, if desired.

7d30b3f597eae1657f55f74b7b2cc89f.title: Rotisserie chicken fried rice
7d30b3f597eae1657f55f74b7b2cc89f.description: We’re always looking for smart and exciting ways to repurpose rotisserie chicken. Say goodbye to chicken salad and welcome this takeout-inspired recipe with open arms. Using leftover or store-bought rotisserie chicken in this easy dinner is the trick to creating a macro-friendly meal any night of the week in no time at all.

ingredients.name: Oscar Mayer Deli Fresh Rotisserie Seasoned Sliced Chicken Breast Deli Lunch Meat, 16 Oz Package
ingredients.description: 1 pound skinless rotisserie chicken meat, 1/2-inch dice

ingredients.name: Great Value Thai Hom Mali Jasmine Rice, 32 oz
ingredients.description: 3 cups cooked brown or jasmine rice

ingredients.name: Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count
Great Value Peas & Diced Carrots, 8.5 oz Can
Great Value Less Sodium Soy Sauce, 15 fl oz
ingredients.description: 3 tablespoons low-sodium soy sauce, plus more to taste

ingredients.name: Fresh Green Onions Bunch, Each
ingredients.description: fresh sliced green onion, for garnish

ingredients.name: Sushi Chef Sesame Seeds, 3.75 Oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a large nonstick skillet set over medium-high heat, heat oil. Add chicken and cooked rice and stir to combine, cooking for about 2 minutes (enough to get a very light sear on the chicken), then make a hole in the middle of the skillet.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Beat 2 eggs together in a small bowl then pour them in the middle of the skillet. Let the eggs bubble for a brief second, then immediately begin chopping the eggs up with a spatula and folding them into chicken and rice. There should be no large, visible chunks of egg.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Fold in frozen peas, carrots and soy sauce, stirring for about 1 minute.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Remove from the heat, and if desired, garnish with green onion and toasted sesame seeds.

7a489831523a92d8c0d55915d195332c.title: One-pan moroccan chicken
7a489831523a92d8c0d55915d195332c.description: This one pan harissa spiced Moroccan chicken dish is a full meal for two that is packed with flavor.

ingredients.name: Great Value All Natural Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts, 3 lb (Frozen)
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Great Value Ground Cumin, 2.5 oz
Fresh Red Onions, Each
Cherry Tomato, 10 oz Package
Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon
Bush's Garbanzo Beans, Canned Chickpeas, 16 oz Can
Fresh Zucchini Squash, Each
Frontier Co-Op Harissa Seasoning Blend Organic 1.9 oz. Bottle
Great Value Organic Strained Raw Honey, 12 oz Inverted Plastic Bottle

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Season the chicken with pepper and cumin powder to taste.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: On a medium-low heat, cook the chicken in some oil with the onion for 3 to 4 minutes stirring and turning occasionally.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add the cherry tomatoes, the water, the chickpeas, the harissa paste, the honey and the courgette.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally until the sauce slightly thickens.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

54a71321f48bbc0012272d7871ca51ca.title: Nutrient packed colorful super salad
54a71321f48bbc0012272d7871ca51ca.description: Boring salads no more! This colorful super salad is the perfect way to start the new year off with a bang. Carrot, broccoli, kale, cabbage, red bell pepper, and creamy avocado are just a few of the many ingredients that pack in tons of various vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants to boost your health, AND they taste delicious! Crazy! This dish will be your new staple recipe to get tons of nutrients in one meal.

ingredients.name: Maille Gluten Free and Kosher Certified Whole Grain Old Style Mustard, 7.3 oz
Maple Grove Farms Organic Pure Maple Syrup, 8.5 fl oz
Fresh Ginger Root, Each
Garlic Bulb, Each
El Guapo Whole Sesame Seed (Ajonjol Entero), 2 oz
Lawry's Casero Cayenne Pepper, 1.62 oz
Great Value Apple Cider Vinegar, 32 fl oz
Concord Foods Lemon Juice, 4.5 oz
Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Fresh Green Kale Bunch, Each
Fresh Whole Carrots, 1 lb Bag
Fresh Broccoli Crowns, Each
Red Cabbage, Each
Fresh Red Bell Pepper, 1 Each
ingredients.description: 1 red bell pepper, seeded and thinly sliced

ingredients.name: Avocados, Each
Fisher Chef's Naturals Chopped Walnuts, 8 oz
Fresh Cilantro, Bunch

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a liquid measuring cup, combine the mustard, maple syrup, ginger, garlic, sesame seeds, cayenne, apple cider vinegar, lemon juice, and olive oil. Whisk until fully incorporated. Season to taste with salt and pepper.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add the kale, carrots, red cabbage, broccoli, red cabbage, bell pepper, avocado, walnuts, and parsley to a large serving bowl.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Pour desired amount of dressing over the salad and toss until everything is well coated.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Garnish with more toasted sesame seeds

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

5a3371be6355407119f5c52b04128b63.title: Chimichurri steak bites
5a3371be6355407119f5c52b04128b63.description: These Chimichurri Steak Bites are a super easy recipe that will help you turn simple, everyday ingredients into something special your guests will love - without fuss. Bite-sized pieces of steak are cooked in a skillet until smoky and charred and then comes the best part - spooning on that incredible herby-garlicky chimichurri over the top. The result? A flavor explosion that's sure to be the star of your appetizer table.

ingredients.name: Beef Choice Angus Sirloin Tender Steak, 0.6 - 1.62 lb, Tray
ingredients.description: 1 lb Sirloin Steak cut into bite-sized pieces

ingredients.name: Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Great Value Balsamic Vinegar of Modena, 8.45 fl oz
Great Value Garlic Powder, 3.4 oz
Great Value Less Sodium Soy Sauce, 15 fl oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup Extra-Virgin Olive Oil, for chimichurri sauce

ingredients.name: Great Value White Wine Vinegar, 12.7 fl oz
ingredients.description: 2 Tbsp White Wine Vinegar, for chimichurri sauce

ingredients.name: Fresh Curly Parsley Bunch, Each
ingredients.description: 3/4 cup Chopped Fresh Parsley, for chimichurri sauce

ingredients.name: Fresh Cilantro, Bunch
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup Chopped Fresh Cilantro, for chimichurri sauce

ingredients.name: Garlic Bulb, Each
ingredients.description: 4 cloves Garlic , minced, for chimichurri sauce

ingredients.name: Litehouse Freeze Dried Oregano, 0.28 Oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 Tbsp Dried Oregano, for chimichurri sauce

ingredients.name: Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
Fresh Green Onions Bunch, Each
ingredients.description: 2 Tbsp Diced Shallots, for chimichurri sauce

ingredients.name: Great Value Organic Strained Raw Honey, 12 oz Inverted Plastic Bottle
Great Value Organic Red Pepper Flakes, 1.2 oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 tsp Crushed Red Pepper Flakes (start with 1/4 tsp and adjust to taste), for chimichurri sauce

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a medium bowl, mix together Olive Oil (3 Tbsp) , Balsamic Vinegar (1 Tbsp) , Garlic Powder (1/2 tsp) , Soy Sauce (1 Tbsp) , and Ground Black Pepper (1/4 tsp) .

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add the Steak (1 lb) to the marinade and mix well, making sure each piece is coated evenly. Cover and marinate for at least 30 minutes or up to overnight.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Meanwhile, in a food processor, add Fresh Parsley (3/4 cup) , Fresh Cilantro (1/2 cup) , Shallots (2 Tbsp) , White Wine Vinegar (2 Tbsp) , Honey (1/8 tsp) , Garlic (4 cloves) , Dried Oregano (1/2 Tbsp) , Salt (1/2 tsp) , and Crushed Red Pepper Flakes (1/2 tsp) . Blend everything together.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: While blending, add Extra-Virgin Olive Oil (1/2 cup) until it is a paste-like mixture. Scraping down the sides as you go.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: In a heavy bottom pan over medium-high heat, add the steak cubes in a single layer. Cook without disturbing for 30 to 60 seconds on each side or until each side is browned.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Serve the steak bites with chimichurri sauce.

1e1af0d3a985736c3458d22cea63bdff.title: Caprese salad
1e1af0d3a985736c3458d22cea63bdff.description: Caprese salad hails from the Italian island of Capri, hence its name. The colors of each signature ingredient — green basil, white mozzarella and red tomatoes — pay homage to the colors of the Italian flag. A peak-summer Caprese salad is hard to beat. That’s because it’s a dish that’s all about the quality of ingredients. Since all you really need to make it are tomatoes, mozzarella, basil and olive oil, it's important that each ingredient sings.

ingredients.name: Fresh Roma Tomato, Each
ingredients.description: 1 1/2 pounds medium heirloom or beefsteak tomatoes (about 3), cored and sliced 1/4-inch thick

ingredients.name: Great Value Finely Shredded Low-Moisture Part-Skim Mozzarella Cheese, 8 oz
ingredients.description: 8 ounces fresh mozzarella cheese (sliced into 1/4-inch-thick rounds)

ingredients.name: Basil Fresh Cut 0.75 oz
Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Morton Sea Salt, Fine, 4.4 Ounce
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
ingredients.description: freshly ground black pepper, for serving

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: 1.Arrange the tomato and mozzarella slices in an alternating, overlapping pattern on a serving platter.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: 2.Tear the basil leaves into small pieces if large; otherwise keep them whole. Sprinkle the basil over the tomatoes and mozzarella.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: 3.Drizzle with the olive oil. Garnish with a generous pinch of flaky salt and several grinds of black pepper.

8ac9771fe1fef5d4df1b83fa8684ca8f.title: Sweet potato gnocchi
8ac9771fe1fef5d4df1b83fa8684ca8f.description: Gnocchi are something you probably order all the time at restaurants but never think about making from scratch. Well, now’s the time to start. These lightened-up homemade gnocchi call for sweet potato in place of regular potato. The sweet potato is mashed with flour, egg, and Parmesan and boiled into little dumplings. Then, the gnocchi get tossed in a simple sauce of butter and sage until just golden.

ingredients.name: Sweet Potatoes, Each
Great Value Grated Parmesan Cheese, 8 oz
Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count
GV All Purpose Flour 2LB Bag
ingredients.description: 2 cups flour, plus more to dust

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Salted Butter, 16 oz
Sage Fresh Cut .75oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat oven to 400ºF (200ºC).

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Prick the sweet potato with a fork several times and bake for 40 minutes (or microwave for 5 minutes).

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Allow potato to cool at least 5 minutes before peeling skin off.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, mash potato with masher or fork until smooth.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Add parmesan cheese, egg, and flour. Knead the dough until it is firm and no longer sticky, adding flour as needed, forming a ball with the dough.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Divide the dough into four equal parts. Take one part and roll it out into a long rope, about a 1-inch (2 ½ cm) wide.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Slice into ½-inch (1 cm) rectangles and set aside.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Using an overturned fork, slide each gnocchi over the fork prongs so they become serrated in a corkscrew shape.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Bring a large pot of water to a boil and add the gnocchi. Boil until the gnocchi float to the top, about 1-2 minutes. Drain in a colander.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: In a pan over medium heat, melt butter and add sage. Simmer for 1 minute without letting butter burn.

tasks.title: Step 11
tasks.instruction: Add gnocchi to pan with the sage and butter, tossing until lightly golden.

tasks.title: Step 12
tasks.instruction: Top with more Parmesan cheese.

tasks.title: Step 13
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

cb593476927e71c56804bea256f210ef.title: Beyond meat burger with homemade zesty mayo sauce
cb593476927e71c56804bea256f210ef.description: After trying this juicy and savory Beyond Meat Burger recipe, you won't miss the meat. It tastes beyond delicious paired with our homemade mayo sauce with a spicy kick from cilantro and garlic and earthy depth from cumin. Plus, it's easy to make, and your whole family will love chowing down on these healthy burgers.

ingredients.name: Gardein Ultimate Plant-Based Vegan Burger Patties, 24 oz, 6 Count (Frozen)
Great Value Hamburger Buns, 8 Count, 11 oz
Great Value Greek Plain Nonfat Yogurt, 5.3 oz
Great Value Mayonnaise, 15 fl oz
Lemons, Each
ingredients.description: 2 Lemons, juiced (1/4 cup of juice needed)

ingredients.name: Fresh Cilantro, Bunch
Garlic Bulb, Each
Great Value Ground Cumin, 2.5 oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Fresh Iceberg Lettuce, Each
Slicing Tomato, Each
ingredients.description: Sliced Tomatoes to taste, for topping (optional)

ingredients.name: Fresh Red Onions, Each
ingredients.description: Red Onions to taste, for topping (optional)

ingredients.name: Frigo Crumbleed Feta Cheese, 5 Oz
ingredients.description: Crumbled Feta Cheese to taste, for topping (optional)

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a skillet over medium heat, toast the cut sides of the Hamburger Buns (4) for 1-2 minutes. Set aside.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Grill Vegan Burger Patties (4) according to the package direction. Season with Salt (to taste) and Ground Black Pepper (to taste) if needed.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In a food processor, add Greek Yogurt (3/4 cup) , Mayonnaise (1/2 cup) , 1/4 cup Lemon Juice (2) , Fresh Cilantro (1/2 bunch) , Garlic (1 clove) , Ground Cumin (1 Tbsp) , Salt (to taste) , and Ground Black Pepper (to taste) . Blend until smooth. Transfer to a bowl.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Spread the cilantro sauce mixture over the bottom buns, then place Lettuce (to taste) , Red Onions (to taste) , Tomatoes (to taste) , patty, and top with Crumbled Feta Cheese (to taste) . Cover the burger stacks with the top buns and enjoy immediately!

55b5375b469fb8ebe050636d891c0eed.title: Rotisserie chicken salad
55b5375b469fb8ebe050636d891c0eed.description: Our Rotisserie Chicken Salad recipe is simple, delicious, and budget-friendly. This dish is packed with flavor and comes together in just a few minutes. Rotisserie chicken is a great time-saver, giving the salad a wonderfully moist and tender texture. This simplified classic chicken salad is perfect for lunch or dinner and also excellent for meal-prepping.

ingredients.name: Oscar Mayer Deli Fresh Rotisserie Seasoned Chicken Breast, for a Low Carb Lifestyle, 9 oz Tray
Fresh Romaine Lettuce, Each
ingredients.description: 1 bag (9 oz) Chopped Romaine Spring Mix

ingredients.name: Jolly Time White Popcorn Kernels Bag, 32 oz Gluten-Free, Non-GMO.
Cherry Tomato, 10 oz Package
Avocados, Each
Fresh Red Onions, Each
Bella Rosa Shaved Parmesan Cheese, 5 Oz
Great Value Seasoned Croutons, 5 oz
Great Value Classic Ranch Salad Dressing & Dip, 16 fl oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a large shallow salad bowl, add Romaine Spring Mix (1 bag) as the base. Then top with Rotisserie Chicken (1) , Corn Kernels (1 can) , Red Onions (1/2 cup) , Avocados (2) , Cherry Tomatoes (1 cup) , Croutons (1 bag) , and Shaved Parmesan Cheese (1 tub)

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Toss and combine everything together with the Ranch Dressing (3/4 cup) and enjoy it right away!

a18897610190aeea4573228e37ad698e.title: Grilled chicken tostados
a18897610190aeea4573228e37ad698e.description: Just wait until you get a whiff of these Chicken Tostadas! They're easy to make and full of flavor. The crispy, crunchy tortilla shells are layered with refried beans, seasoned ground chicken, fresh pico de gallo, and shredded cheese. They are flavorful and will be a hit with your family and friends. Perfect meal for any night of the week - they are healthy, delicious, and easy to make. They are super versatile, so you can add your favorite toppings.

ingredients.name: Marketside Antibiotic-Free Boneless Skinless Chicken Thighs, 1.3 - 1.9 lb
Charras Tostadas Orig Yllw
Great Value Traditional Refried Beans, 16 Oz
Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Great Value Original Taco Seasoning Mix, 1 oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Fresh Romaine Lettuce Hearts 3 Count, Each
Cherubs Grape Tomatoes, 10 oz Package
Fresh Red Onions, Each
Fresh Cilantro, Bunch
Great Value All Natural Sour Cream, 16 oz Tub
Freshness Guaranteed Guacamole, Mild, 8 oz
Fresh Serrano Pepper, 4 Ounce Bag

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a small mixing bowl, combine Taco Seasoning (2 Tbsp) with Salt (1 Tbsp) and Ground Black Pepper (1 Tbsp) , set aside.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a skillet over medium-low heat, heat up the Olive Oil (1/4 cup) . Add Boneless, Skin-On Chicken Thighs (1.5 lb) , skin side down and cook for about 15 minutes, flip halfway through, or until chicken is fully cooked and the internal temperature reads 165 degrees F (74 degrees C). Season each side with the seasoning mixture.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Transfer the chicken to a cutting board and let it rest for 10 minutes. Then roughly chop the chicken, transfer it to a bowl and set aside.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: In the same skillet over medium-high heat, add Refried Beans (1 can) , stir, and heat for about 2 minutes, set aside.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Assemble the tostadas on a baking sheet. Place Tostada Shells (6) on a baking sheet. Layer each one with refried beans, chopped chicken, Tomatoes (3) , Red Onion (1) , Lettuce (5 cups) , Fresh Cilantro (1 bunch) , Sour Cream (2 cups) , Guacamole (1 cup) , and Jalapeño Peppers (1/2 cup) . Serve immediately.

0611cc89394e4a19f9245624fa1f3ffe.title: Fusilli tuna salad
0611cc89394e4a19f9245624fa1f3ffe.description: This Fusilli Tuna Salad is light and tangy, and it has just enough flavor to bring smiles of joy to everyone's face. We start with some fusilli and dress it up with flaky tuna, briny black olives, and sweet cherry tomatoes, and then lightly toss it in a bright lemon juice dressing. The best part is that it comes together in no time – just 15 minutes, to be exact! What better way is there to make sure your summer parties are the talk of the town?

ingredients.name: Great Value Chunk Light Tuna in Water, 5 oz
ingredients.description: 1 3/4 cups Canned Tuna in Water, drained and flaked

ingredients.name: Rao's Homemade Bronze Die Cut Fusilli Pasta, 16 oz
Cherry Tomato, 10 oz Package
Lindsay Sliced Black Ripe Olives 2.25 oz
Fresh Red Onions, Each
Fresh Cucumber, Each
ingredients.description: 2 cups Cucumbers, halved lengthwise and sliced

ingredients.name: Lemons, Each
ingredients.description: 3 Lemons, zested, juiced (zest of 1/2 lemon and 1/2 cup juice needed)

ingredients.name: Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Fresh Curly Parsley Bunch, Each
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a large stockpot of water, add Fusilli Pasta (10 oz) and Salt (to taste) . Bring to a boil and cook until al dente according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a large mixing bowl, whisk Olive Oil (1/2 cup) , Lemon Zest (3) , and 1/2 cup of lemon juice. Season with Salt (to taste) and Ground Black Pepper (to taste) .

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Mix in pasta, Canned Tuna in Water (1 3/4 cups) , Cherry Tomatoes (2 cups) , Sliced Black Olives (1/2 cup) , Red Onion (1/2) , Cucumbers (2 cups) , and Fresh Parsley (1/4 cup) . Stir to combine.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Transfer to a serving plate. Serve immediately.

97ecbbcecf294543f967cc7a005a04a5.title: Healthy mediterranean salad
97ecbbcecf294543f967cc7a005a04a5.description: Looking for a delicious, nutritious salad packed with fresh Mediterranean flavors? Look no further than this tasty recipe! Featuring crisp cucumbers, juicy cherry tomatoes, and tangy feta cheese, this salad is the perfect way to brighten up your day and nourish your body. Plus, with a light and zesty homemade dressing, it's easy to whip up in no time at all!

ingredients.name: Great Value All Natural Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts, 3 lb (Frozen)
Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon olive oil,2 tablespoons olive oil, for dressing

ingredients.name: Concord Foods Lemon Juice, 4.5 oz
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon lemon juice,1 tablespoon lemon juice, for dressing

ingredients.name: Garlic Bulb, Each
ingredients.description: 2 cloves garlic, minced,1 clove garlic, minced, for dressing

ingredients.name: Sprout House Fresh Cut Dill - 0.75oz
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon fresh dill,1 tablespoon fresh dill, for dressing

ingredients.name: Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
ingredients.description: salt, to taste,salt, to taste, for dressing

ingredients.name: McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
ingredients.description: pepper, to taste,pepper, to taste, for dressing

ingredients.name: Great Value Greek Plain Nonfat Yogurt, 5.3 oz
Star Italian Kitchen Red Wine Vinegar, 12 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon red wine vinegar, for dressing

ingredients.name: Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon
Fresh Iceberg Lettuce, Each
Fresh Cucumber, Each
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup cucumber, sliced and halved, for toppings

ingredients.name: Great Value Sliced Ripe Olives 3.8oz
Fresh Red Onions, Each
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup red onion, thinly sliced, for toppings

ingredients.name: Cherry Tomato, 10 oz Package
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup cherry tomato, halved, for toppings

ingredients.name: Frigo Crumbleed Feta Cheese, 5 Oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup feta cheese, crumbled, for toppings

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Place chicken breast on a baking sheet lined with aluminum foil or parchment paper. Top with olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, dill, and salt and pepper to season.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Bake for 35-40 minutes until internal temperature reaches 165°F (75°C) and the juices run clear.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add all dressing ingredients in a small bowl or cup and whisk until with a fork until combined.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Slice thinly or cube chicken, cutting to your preference for topping the salad.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Assemble your salad, starting with a base of romaine lettuce. Then top with chicken, cucumber, olives, red onion, tomatoes, feta, and the dressing. Toss to evenly incorporate ingredients

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

05f43e3d38d08bc222821a476744df3b.title: Roasted garlic parmesan brussel sprouts
