05f43e3d38d08bc222821a476744df3b.description: Savor the scrumptiousness of Roasted Garlic Parmesan Brussels Sprouts, a delightful side dish that'll make you crave veggies! With a crispy, cheesy exterior and tender, flavorful interior, this dish is a guaranteed crowd-pleaser.

ingredients.name: Fresh Brussels Sprouts, 1 lb Bag
Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Great Value Garlic Powder, 3.4 oz
Great Value Italian Style Bread Crumbs, 15 oz
Great Value Grated Parmesan Cheese, 8 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Remove the stem from each sprout and cut in half. Place the brussels sprouts in a large bowl.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add the rest of the ingredients to the bowl and toss to cover.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Spread the sprouts onto a baking sheet.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Bake in a 400°F (200°C) oven for 20 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Flip the sprouts, then bake for an additional 20 minutes or until the sprouts are fork-tender and golden.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

fe54604e64ffd3613dff1506c5e29d9b.title: Cacio e pepe roasted cauliflower
fe54604e64ffd3613dff1506c5e29d9b.description: To make this Italian-inspired side dish, toss bite-size cauliflower florets with melted butter, salt, and — you guessed it — cheese and pepper. As everything roasts in a super-hot oven, the cauliflower caramelizes and the cheese crisps, creating crunchy, chip-like cheese bits in every single bite. Plus, the freshly cracked black pepper adds its signature pungent flavor and lingering heat.

ingredients.name: Fresh Cauliflower, Each
ingredients.description: 1 medium cauliflower, cut into bite-sized florets

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
Rao's Homemade Vodka Sauce | 24 oz | Creamy Tomato Sauce | Pasta Sauce | Carb Conscious, Keto Friendly | All Natural, Premium Quality | With Parmigiano Reggiano and Pecorino Romano Cheeses & Vodka
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup freshly grated pecorino Romano cheese, divided

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: 1.Place a rimmed baking sheet on the center rack of the oven. Preheat the oven to 450 F.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: 2.In a large bowl, toss the cauliflower with the butter, pepper, and salt. Add 1/4 cup of the cheese and toss again to coat.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: 3.Carefully transfer the cauliflower to the hot baking sheet and spread into an even layer.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: 4.Roast until the cauliflower is crispy and golden brown, 20 to 25 minutes. Sprinkle with the remaining 1/4 cup cheese, toss to combine, and serve warm.

ingredients.name: Marketside Antibiotic-Free Boneless Skinless Chicken Thighs, 1.3 - 1.9 lb
Fresh Romaine Lettuce Hearts 3 Count, Each
Cherry Tomato, 10 oz Package
Fresh Red Onions, Each
Avocados, Each
Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon olive oil for chicken marination,4 tablespoons olive oil for dressing

ingredients.name: Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
ingredients.description: 1 teaspoon salt for chicken marination,1 teaspoon salt for dressing

ingredients.name: Garlic Bulb, Each
ingredients.description: 2 cloves garlic, minced for chicken marination

ingredients.name: Fresh Jalapeno Pepper, Approx. 3-5 per 0.25 Pound
ingredients.description: 1 jalapeño pepper, minced for chicken marination

ingredients.name: Great Value Chili Powder, 3 oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 teaspoon chili powder for chicken marination

ingredients.name: Great Value Organic Strained Raw Honey, 12 oz Inverted Plastic Bottle
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon honey for chicken marination,2 tablespoons honey for dressing

ingredients.name: Concord Foods Reconstituted Lime Juice, 4.5 oz
ingredients.description: 4 tablespoons lime juice for chicken marination,4 tablespoons lime juice for dressing

ingredients.name: McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a medium bowl, combine all the ingredients for the chicken marinade.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Toss in the chicken thighs and marinate for at least one hour.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In a cast-iron skillet, cook chicken on high heat until there is a nice sear on the surface of the chicken, and the inside is no longer pink. Roughly four minutes each side. Set chicken aside.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Place chopped lettuce, tomatoes, red onion, and avocados in a large salad bowl.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Slice cooked chicken thighs and add to the salad bowl.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: In a small bowl, combine all the ingredients for the dressing. Mix well.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Toss the salad with the dressing and serve immediately.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

ingredients.name: Fresh Yellow Squash, Each
ingredients.description: 2 small delicata squash, halved lengthwise, seeded, and cut into 1/2-inch thick slices

ingredients.name: Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil, plus 1 tablespoon and more for drizzling

ingredients.name: Mariposa Farms Fresh Cut Thyme, .75 oz
ingredients.description: 5 to 7 sprigs thyme, divided, plus more for garnish

ingredients.name: Garlic Bulb, Each
ingredients.description: 2 cloves garlic, minced for meatloaf,8 cloves garlic, thinly sliced

ingredients.name: Morelli Organic Black Squid Ink Linguine Pasta Made in Italy  8.8oz / 250g
Pancetta, Dry Cured Bacon, Sliced, 3oz
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
Heinz Chili Sauce, 12 oz Bottle
BelGioioso Parmesan Cheese Wedge, Specialty Hard Cheese, 8 oz
ingredients.description: 2 cups parmesan cheese or Parmigiano Reggiano, plus more for garnish

ingredients.name: Lemons, Each
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat oven to 400 F.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Place the squash slices on a rimmed baking sheet in a single layer. Drizzle with olive oil and toss together. Season with kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper and toss again. Top with 2 to 3 sprigs of fresh thyme and place into the oven to roast for 25 to 30 minutes, flipping halfway through until golden-brown and crispy. Set aside.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Once boiling, heavily season with salt and cook the pasta according to the package directions, stirring occasionally, until al dente. Once cooked, set aside 2 cups of pasta  water and drain the rest.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: In a large saucepan over medium heat, add 1 tablespoon of olive oil. Once shimmering, add pancetta and cook 3 to 4 minutes stirring occasionally, until the fat has rendered and the pancetta begins to crisp. Add in the garlic and thyme to the same pan, and cook for 2 to 3 minutes more until the garlic is fragrant and softened. Remove from heat.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Using tongs, add drained pasta to the saucepan along with 1 cup pasta water and calabrian chili paste, and toss to coat. Add parmesan cheese to the pasta, ¼ cup at a time, tossing in between, to emulsify the sauce. Once silky and creamy, add the zest and juice of 1 lemon and toss to combine. Add in half of the roasted squash and toss once more. Adjust seasoning to taste. Before serving, remove thyme stems.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Transfer into serving bowls, top with remaining roasted squash, additional parmesan, fresh thyme leaves, and enjoy!

7ccaeebbf226c3eddb5c9d2dfe4bb864.title: Steak and avocado salad
7ccaeebbf226c3eddb5c9d2dfe4bb864.description: Savor the irresistible harmony of tender, juicy steak and creamy avocado as they unite in a mouthwatering salad symphony. Each vibrant bite will have you dreaming of sun-soaked picnics and al fresco feasts.

ingredients.name: Beef Choice Angus Sirloin Tender Steak, 0.6 - 1.62 lb, Tray
ingredients.description: 1 lb sirloin steak (about 1/2 inch or 1cm thick)

ingredients.name: Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Great Value Classic Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Fresh Romaine Lettuce Hearts 3 Count, Each
Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count
Avocados, Each
Cherry Tomato, 10 oz Package
Great Value Creamy Caesar Salad Dressing & Dip, 16 fl oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Salt and pepper the steak on both sides, being sure to rub in the seasoning.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Heat the oil in a pan over high heat until slightly smoking.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Sear the steak for about 2 minutes per side.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Rest the steak on a cutting board for 10 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Slice the steak.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, combine the lettuce, eggs, avocados, cherry tomatoes, steak, and dressing.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Toss the salad until evenly coated and serve.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

4d3876f72ad8421a7a243e2a0acea63b.title: Mango chicken salad
4d3876f72ad8421a7a243e2a0acea63b.description: Our Mango Chicken Salad Recipe is a fun and fresh way to enjoy chicken salad. Sweet and juicy mangos complement rotisserie chicken, creating a delicious and unique flavor combination. The salad is packed with healthy ingredients like baby greens, cherry tomatoes, and peppers. Plus, it's topped with red onions and ricotta cheese for a little bit of zing.

ingredients.name: All Natural* 73% Lean/27% Fat Ground Beef, 1 lb, Roll
Yellow Onions, Each
Fresh Green Bell Pepper, Each
Garlic Bulb, Each
Great Value Mild Thick & Chunky Salsa, 24 oz
HERDEZ Salsa Verde, 7 oz Tray
Great Value Original Taco Seasoning Mix, 1 oz
Swanson 100% Natural, Gluten-Free Chicken Stock, 32 oz Carton
Great Value All Natural Sour Cream, 16 oz Tub
ingredients.description: 1 cup sour cream,sour cream, for garnish

ingredients.name: Great Value Black Beans, 15 oz Can
ingredients.description: 1 cup black beans, drained and rinsed

ingredients.name: Great Value Cream of Mushroom Condensed Soup, 10.5 oz
Great Value Finely Shredded Fiesta Blend Cheese, 8 oz
ingredients.description: 3 cups Mexican-blend cheese, shredded and divided

ingredients.name: Great Value Nacho Cheese Tortilla Chips, 9.75 oz
ingredients.description: 1 (14-ounce) bag nacho cheese-flavor tortilla chips (such as Doritos), crushed into slightly smaller pieces

ingredients.name: Cherubs Grape Tomatoes, 10 oz Package
Fresh Iceberg Lettuce, Each
Fresh Cilantro, Bunch
Lindsay Sliced Black Ripe Olives 2.25 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 F. Grease a 13-by-9-inch casserole dish with non-stick cooking spray.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add ground beef (or turkey), onion, bell pepper and garlic in a large skillet until meat is cooked all the way through, then drain fat from the skillet.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add both salsas, taco seasoning, and chicken stock. Allow the mix to cook for 4 to 5 minutes or until the liquid evaporates and thickens somewhat. Remove from heat.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, combine meat mixture, sour cream, black beans, cream of mushroom and half of the cheese. Fold everything together.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Add about 2 cups of nacho tortilla chips to the greased casserole dish then top with half of the meat mixture in the bowl. Repeat the layers again until you end with the meat mixture then add another 2 cups of chips and then add the remaining cheese.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Cover with non-stick foil and bake for about 30 minutes then remove the foil. Sprinkle the remaining cheese on top and bake, uncovered, until cheese is melted.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Cool for 10 minutes then garnish and serve.

2557376307529a886c8a64b513829253.title: Pulled pork barbecue biscuit cups
2557376307529a886c8a64b513829253.description: This a fun and easy recipe to use pre-made pulled pork. These Pulled Pork Barbecue Biscuit Cups are perfect for feeding a crowd. Serve with coleslaw and fries or chips for a complete meal, or enjoy it as a tasty snack or lunch. So good, they'll be gone in a flash!

ingredients.name: Great Value Butter Flavor Flaky Jumbo Biscuits, 8 Count
Great Value Pulled Pork, in BBQ Sauce, 2.6 oz Pouch
ingredients.description: 3/4 cup Canned BBQ Pulled Pork, shredded

ingredients.name: Cherubs Grape Tomatoes, 10 oz Package
Great Value Kosher Spears Dill Pickle Fresh Pack, 24 fl oz
Fresh Red Onions, Each
Kraft Mexican Style Four Cheese Blend Shredded Cheese, 8 oz Bag
Kraft Coleslaw Salad Dressing, 16 fl oz Bottle
ingredients.description: Coleslaw Mix or Chips (optional) to taste

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Lightly spray 10 muffin cups with nonstick spray.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Flatten the Refrigerated Biscuits (1 tube) slightly and press over the bottom and on the sides of the muffin cups. Make sure the biscuits are high enough on the sides of the muffin tin.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Top each tin with about 1 to 1 1/2 tablespoons of Canned BBQ Pulled Pork (3/4 cup) , some Tomato (1) , some Kosher Dill Pickle Spears (2) , and some Red Onion (1/2) . Then sprinkle each cup with Shredded Mexican Cheese Blend (1/2 cup) .

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Bake for 12-14 minutes, until lightly browned.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Optionally serve with Coleslaw Mix (to taste) or chips.

7ab9cb22e4004318a27ed45a2f94cd39.title: Caesar deviled eggs
7ab9cb22e4004318a27ed45a2f94cd39.description: Oil-packed anchovies, garlic and Worcestershire sauce join forces with the Caesar salad dressing mainstays of Dijon mustard and lemon juice. All of these umami-packed flavors are mashed together with hard-boiled egg yolks and mayonnaise to create the creamy deviled egg filling. What makes these deviled eggs even more special is the crunchy, salty topping. When you’re ready to serve, toast some panko breadcrumbs in a little olive oil. Once cool, stir in grated Parmesan cheese and minced chives and generously sprinkle over the top to mimic croutons.

ingredients.name: Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count
Season Brand Flat Fillet Anchovies in 100% Olive Oil, Glass Jar, 4.2 ounces
Garlic Bulb, Each
ingredients.description: 1 small clove garlic, smashed and peeled

ingredients.name: Great Value Mayonnaise, 15 fl oz
Concord Foods Lemon Juice, 4.5 oz
Great Value Dijon Mustard, 12 oz Squeeze Bottle
Great Value Worcestershire Sauce, 10 fl Ounce
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
ingredients.description: kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper

ingredients.name: Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Great Value Plain Panko Bread Crumbs, 8 oz
Great Value Grated Parmesan Cheese, 8 oz
Sprout House Fresh Cut Chives - 0.75oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: 1.Place eggs in a medium saucepan and cover completely with water. Bring to a boil, then remove from heat; cover and let stand for 9 minutes. Drain eggs and place them in a bowl of ice water. Cool completely, then drain the water and ice.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: 2.Peel and cut eggs in half lengthwise. Gently separate yolks from whites and place the yolks in a small bowl.Mash the yolks with a fork.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: 3.Finely chop anchovies and garlic, then use the back of a knife to mash into a paste. Transfer to a small bowl and whisk in mayonnaise, lemon juice, mustard, Worcestershire sauce and ? teaspoon each salt and pepper; stir in mashed yolks. Transfer mixture to a piping bag or resealable plastic bag; snip a ½-inch hole in the tip of the bag. Pipe filling evenly into cavities of egg whites.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: 4.Heat oil in a small skillet over medium. Add breadcrumbs and ? teaspoon salt. Cook, stirring occasionally, until deeply golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool completely. Stir in cheese and chives. Sprinkle breadcrumb mixture over eggs and serve.

93d0ac09812ac55d0ee18886305f42d1.title: Eggplant caponata pasta salad
93d0ac09812ac55d0ee18886305f42d1.description: If you prefer your pasta salad mayo-free, this recipe is for you. Inspired by eggplant caponata, this pasta salad is punchy, deeply savory, herbaceous, nutty and the perfect make-ahead dish for summer. Eggplant caponata, which comes from Sicily, is essentially cooked eggplant in a tomato-y, sweet and sour, agrodolce-esque sauce, typically packed with a myriad of ingredients that bring savory, salty, sweet or brine-y flavors to round out the dish (the specific ingredients used vary from cook to cook). Core ingredients you’ll often come across include eggplant, olive oil, tomatoes or tomato paste, celery, olives, capers, vinegar and sugar.

ingredients.name: Star Italian Kitchen Red Wine Vinegar, 12 fl oz
Great Value Organic Granulated Cane Sugar, 2 Lb
Great Value Tomato Paste, 6 oz
Garlic Bulb, Each
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
ingredients.description: 2 teaspoons kosher salt, divided, plus more for salting pasta water

ingredients.name: McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
ingredients.description: 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, divided

ingredients.name: Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Fresh Chinese Eggplant, Each
ingredients.description: 1 1/2 pounds globe/American eggplant (cut into 1/2 to 3/4-inch cubes)

ingredients.name: Great Value Organic Red Pepper Flakes, 1.2 oz
Yellow Onions, Each
ingredients.description: 1 small yellow onion, peeled and diced

ingredients.name: Great Value Non-Pareil Capers, 3.5 fl oz
De Cecco Cavatappi No.87 Pasta, 16 oz
Cherry Tomato, 10 oz Package
BelGioioso Fresh Mozzarella Cheese Pearls, Mini Snacking Cheese, 8 oz
Mezzetta Pitted Italian Castelvetrano Olives, 8 oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup Castelvetrano olives, pitted and halved

ingredients.name: Basil Fresh Cut 0.75 oz
ingredients.description: 1 cup fresh basil, roughly chopped, plus more for topping as desired

ingredients.name: Great Value Pine Nuts, 4 oz
ingredients.description: 1/3 cup pine nuts, toasted, plus more for topping as desired

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: 1.Position a rack in the middle of the oven and preheat the oven to 425 F.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: 2.In a large bowl, whisk together red wine vinegar, sugar, 1 1/2 tablespoons tomato paste, grated garlic, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper. Slowly stream in 5 tablespoons olive oil until emulsified. Set aside.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: 3.On an unlined, rimmed baking sheet, toss the eggplant with crushed red pepper (if using), 3 tablespoons of the dressing, the remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 tablespoon tomato paste, 1 teaspoon salt and 1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper until the eggplant is evenly coated. Arrange the eggplant in a single layer.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: 4.Roast the eggplant on the middle rack for 12 minutes. Remove the sheet pan from the oven, add the onion and another 3 tablespoons dressing to the eggplant, toss with a heatproof spatula or tongs to coat and spread into an even layer. Continue to cook until the eggplant is fork tender and browned in spots and the onion is softened and translucent, 12 to 15 minutes more.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: 5.Remove the pan from the oven, add the capers to the eggplant and toss. Let cool slightly.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: 6.Meanwhile, bring a large pot of water to a boil and season generously with salt. Add the cavatappi and cook to firm (typically 1 to 2 minutes past al dente) according to the package directions. Drain the pasta in a colander, rinse under cold water until room temperature, and transfer to the bowl with the rest of the dressing. Toss well to coat the pasta.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: 7.Add the eggplant mixture, cherry tomatoes, mozzarella and olives and toss to combine. Add the basil and pine nuts and toss until just combined. Serve right away at room temperature or let chill in the refrigerator for the flavors to meld, covered, up to overnight. Top with more pine nuts and basil before serving if desired.

9d4eb18ca93c16a3047afaef1f9d16e2.title: Sheet-pan chicken scarpariello
9d4eb18ca93c16a3047afaef1f9d16e2.description: This dinner has all the big, hearty flavors of chicken scarpariello but comes together quickly and easily on a sheet pan. Translated to “shoemaker’s chicken,” a nod to its humble origins, chicken scarpariello is a classic Italian-American dish that pairs chicken with sausage, peppers (both red bell and pickled) and a rich, tangy sauce. It’s traditionally braised on the stovetop — starting with browning the chicken, sausage and vegetables in sequential steps, then combining everything for a slow simmer. Though not difficult, this chicken dish requires a level of time and attention that may be hard to muster on a busy night.

ingredients.name: Foster Farms Fresh & Natural Cage Free Family Pack Chicken Thighs 64 -88 oz (4-5.5 lb) Tray
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
ingredients.description: kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper

ingredients.name: Fresh Red Onions, Each
ingredients.description: 1 large red onion (peeled and sliced 1/4-inch thick)

ingredients.name: Fresh Red Bell Pepper, 1 Each
Litehouse Freeze Dried Oregano, 0.28 Oz
Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Johnsonville Sweet Italian Sausage, 5 Links, 1 lb 3 oz (Fresh)
Swanson 100% Natural, Gluten-Free Chicken Stock, 32 oz Carton
Cherubs Grape Tomatoes, 10 oz Package
La Costena Green Pickled Jalapeno Peppers, 26 Oz
ingredients.description: 2/3 cup pickled peppers (such as peppadew) (plus 2 tablespoons brine from the jar)

ingredients.name: Fresh Italian Parsley Bunch, Each

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: 1.Heat oven to 450 F. Place an empty 13-by-18-inch sheet pan into the oven to heat. (Don’t line with foil or parchment.)

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: 2.Pat the chicken thighs dry. Place them in a large bowl and season on both sides with salt and pepper. Add onions, peppers, oregano, olive oil, and salt. Mix well to evenly coat everything in the oil and seasonings.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: 3.Remove the sheet pan from the oven (careful, it’ll be hot!) and place the chicken thighs, skin side down. Nestle the peppers and onions around the chicken in an even layer. Transfer to the oven and cook for 10 minutes. (Save the now empty bowl for the next step!)

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: 4.Remove the sausage from the casings, and, using your hands, tear each link into bite-sized pieces (about 3/4-inch in size). Place the sausage in the bowl.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: 5.When the timer goes off, nestle the sausage coins around the chicken. Cook for an additional 6 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: 6.In a small bowl or measuring cup, combine the chicken stock, tomato paste, pickled peppers and pickled pepper brine.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: 7. Once the chicken and sausage are finished cooking, lower the oven to 425 F. Flip the chicken and pour the stock mixture around (but not over the top of) the chicken thighs. Continue roasting until the chicken is done and the sauce has reduced, about 10 minutes, or until the chicken has reached an internal temperature of 165 F. Run the pan under the broiler to crisp up the skin. Note: Because of the pan sauce, it works best to place the top rack at least 6 to 8 inches from the heating element.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: 8.Garnish with parsley, if using. Serve warm with pasta or crusty bread.

627df4694b2607ddabc2182b5586dee2.title: Pappa al pomodoro (tuscan tomato and bread soup)
627df4694b2607ddabc2182b5586dee2.description: Pappa al pomodoro translates to tomato pap, or tomato mush, and while that might not sound very appealing, allow me to explain. It’s a thick dish that’s not quite a soup and not quite a stew, made from tomatoes, aromatics such as onion and garlic, olive oil, basil and stale bread. This peasant dish has been around since the 19th century and is still one of the most popular items on Tuscan trattoria menus. It can be served warm, at room temperature or even chilled, and is a wonderful way to make use of leftover bread that’s gone stale.

ingredients.name: Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
ingredients.description: 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, plus more for serving

ingredients.name: Yellow Onions, Each
Garlic Bulb, Each
Great Value Organic Red Pepper Flakes, 1.2 oz
Oak Leaf Vineyards Pinot Grigio/Colombard White Wine - 750ml, American
Cherubs Grape Tomatoes, 10 oz Package
Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
ingredients.description: 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, plus more for serving

ingredients.name: Basil Fresh Cut 0.75 oz
ingredients.description: 2 sprigs fresh basil, plus additional torn fresh leaves for serving

ingredients.name: Sun-Maid Cinnamon Swirl Raisin Bread, Cinnamon Raisin Bread, 16 oz Loaf
ingredients.description: 12 ounces stale rustic bread, such as a country loaf or ciabatta

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: 1.Heat the oil in a large Dutch oven or pot over medium heat until shimmering. Add the onion and sautè until softened and translucent, 5 to 7 minutes. Add the garlic and sautè until fragrant, about 1 minute.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: 2.Add the red pepper flakes, if using, and white wine and cook, stirring occasionally, until it has almost evaporated, 1 to 2 minutes. Add the strained tomatoes, water, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil then reduce the heat to low, stir in the basil sprigs and simmer, uncovered, for 30 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: 3.Meanwhile, cut or tear the bread (no need to remove the crust) into roughly 1-inch, bite-sized pieces (about 6 cups).

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: 4.Stir in the bread and then remove from heat and cover. Let sit off the heat for 1 hour, stirring occasionally, to allow the bread to absorb the liquid and the soup to become the texture of thick oatmeal. Remove and discard the basil sprigs. Serve warm or at room temperature, garnished with olive oil, torn basil and pepper.

0ad7d21b7d36b286053558ce3c312daf.title: Mojo chicken with avocado salad
0ad7d21b7d36b286053558ce3c312daf.description: This Latin “mojo”-style marinade made with plenty of garlic and citrus juice adds tons of flavor to a simple weeknight chicken dinner. Instead of making a separate marinade, the ingredients are added right into a mixing bowl along with the chicken, which sit for a few minutes while you assemble an easy avocado salad. Using thin chicken breasts helps them absorb the marinate quickly and also cuts down on the cooking time.

ingredients.name: Great Value All Natural Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts, 3 lb (Frozen)
ingredients.description: 1 1/2 pounds thinly sliced boneless skinless chicken breasts (about 4-6 pieces), for chicken

ingredients.name: Garlic Bulb, Each
Limes, Each
ingredients.description: 1 large lime, juiced, for chicken,1 large lime, juiced, for avocado salad

ingredients.name: Florida's Natural Orange Juice With Pulp 52 oz
Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1/3 cup extra-virgin olive oil, plus more for cooking, for chicken,3 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil, for avocado salad

ingredients.name: Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
Litehouse Freeze Dried Oregano, 0.28 Oz
Great Value Ground Cumin, 2.5 oz
Marketside Organic Spring Mix Salad Blend, 16 oz. Clam Shell, Fresh
ingredients.description: 2 cups salad greens such as watercress, baby arugula or mesclun, for avocado salad

ingredients.name: Avocados, Each
ingredients.description: 2 ripe Hass avocados, sliced, for avocado salad

ingredients.name: Cherubs Grape Tomatoes, 10 oz Package
ingredients.description: 1 large ripe tomato, for avocado salad

ingredients.name: Fresh Red Onions, Each
ingredients.description: 1/2 red onion, peeled and thinly sliced, for avocado salad

ingredients.name: Star Italian Kitchen Red Wine Vinegar, 12 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon red or white wine vinegar, for avocado salad

ingredients.name: GOYA Sazon Coriander & Annatto Seasoning 1.41 Oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 teaspoon ground coriander, for avocado salad

ingredients.name: Morton Sea Salt, Fine, 4.4 Ounce
ingredients.description: flaky sea salt (such as malden) or kosher salt, for avocado salad

ingredients.name: McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
ingredients.description: freshly ground black pepper, for avocado salad

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: 1.Place the chicken breasts in a large mixing bowl. Use a microplane to grate the garlic cloves directly over the chicken. Add the lime juice, orange juice, olive oil, kosher salt, oregano and cumin. Use a fork to toss the chicken in the marinade, making sure to fully coat the chicken on all sides in all the ingredients. Set aside while you make the salad.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: 2.Spread the mixed greens on a large platter or a large shallow bowl. Alternate slices of avocado, tomato and red onion around to create a layered pattern on top of the greens.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: 3.In a small bowl, whisk together the juiced lime, vinegar, 1/4 cup olive oil and coriander. Drizzle the dressing over the salad. Season generously with the flaky salt and cracked black pepper.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: 4.Cook the chicken: heat a heavy-bottomed skillet or grill pan over medium-high. Drizzle with 1 to 2 teaspoons of oil and add the chicken breasts, 2 at a time. Cook for about 3 minutes, until the chicken is golden and easily releases before flipping. Cook for an additional 2 to 3 minutes, or until a meat thermometer inserted in the thickest part of the breast reaches 165 F.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: 5.Serve the chicken with the salad.

9ec2ab39fe99c139e8ed2f4fa1370f80.title: One-pan shrimp fra diavolo
9ec2ab39fe99c139e8ed2f4fa1370f80.description: The main protein in this one-pot recipe is shrimp, however you can use a myriad of seafood options like lobster, clams or mussels, but shrimp is a hearty, crowd-pleasing and affordable option. The shrimp is accompanied by pantry staples that lend bold flavors such as sweet onion, garlic, dried oregano and plenty of crushed red pepper flakes. Start conservatively with ¾ teaspoon — even this will put the “devil” in Diavolo. You can always sprinkle more on top if you’re feeling brave! And if you like things extra spicy, try some sliced Calabrian chiles in lieu of pepper flakes.

ingredients.name: Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Great Value Frozen Raw Small Peeled & Deveined, Tail-off Shrimp, 12 oz (60-80 Count per lb)
ingredients.description: 1 pound (16/20 count) large shrimp, peeled and deveined

ingredients.name: Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
ingredients.description: kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper

ingredients.name: Sweet Onions, Each
ingredients.description: 1 sweet onion, halved and thinly sliced

ingredients.name: Garlic Bulb, Each
Litehouse Freeze Dried Oregano, 0.28 Oz
Great Value Organic Red Pepper Flakes, 1.2 oz
Cherubs Grape Tomatoes, 10 oz Package
Snow's All Natural Clam Juice, 8 oz
Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon
Concord Foods Lemon Juice, 4.5 oz
ingredients.description: 3 tablespoons fresh lemon juice, plus wedges for serving

ingredients.name: Fresh Curly Parsley Bunch, Each
Freshness Guaranteed French Bread, 14 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: 1.Heat oil in a large straight-sided skillet over medium-high. Pat shrimp dry and season with 1½ teaspoons salt and ¼ teaspoon pepper. Add to skillet in a single layer and cook, flipping once, until shrimp turn pink and begin to curl, 1 to 2 minutes. Transfer to a plate.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: 2.Reduce heat to medium and add onion, garlic and ¼ teaspoon salt to the skillet. Cook, stirring occasionally, until softened, 6 to 7 minutes. Add oregano and red pepper flakes; cook until fragrant, about 1 minute. Stir in tomatoes, clam juice, water and ½ teaspoon salt. Bring to a gentle simmer and cook, stirring occasionally, until sauce thickens slightly, 18 to 20 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: 3.Remove from heat and stir in lemon juice and parsley. Serve with bread and lemon wedges.

b28ff31b6e6012ad89a3c63ef52e929b.title: Bang bang shrimp rice bowl
b28ff31b6e6012ad89a3c63ef52e929b.description: The benefit of air frying anything—be it frozen foods or fresh seafood such as shrimp—is that there's lighter calories than deep-fried. For a low-carb meal, use cauliflower rice rather than white or brown rice. The cornflake coating provides crunch and subtle sweetness that's a welcome addition to this dish. To make this dish even more colorful, add a side dish such as a slaw to double the amount of vegetables.

ingredients.name: Fresh Cauliflower, Each
ingredients.description: 1 large head cauliflower, leaves removed, for cauliflower rice

ingredients.name: Great Value Frozen Raw Small Peeled & Deveined, Tail-off Shrimp, 12 oz (60-80 Count per lb)
ingredients.description: 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined, for shrimp

ingredients.name: Great Value Garlic Powder, 3.4 oz
Great Value Onion Powder, 3.25 oz
Lawry's Casero Smoked Paprika, 2 oz
Morton Sea Salt, Fine, 4.4 Ounce
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
ingredients.description: 1/8 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, for shrimp

ingredients.name: Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count
Arrowroot Powder 4 Ounces (1/4 Pound)
Great Value Toasted Corn Flakes Breakfast Cereal, 18 oz
Great Value Light Mayonnaise, 30 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup reduced-fat mayonnaise, for spicy mayo sauce

ingredients.name: FAGE Total 2% Milkfat All Natural Lowfat Greek Strained Yogurt, 5.3 oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup Greek yogurt (2%), for spicy mayo sauce

ingredients.name: Huy Fong Sriracha Hot Chili Sauce Ketchup 20oz
ingredients.description: 3 tablespoons Sriracha, for spicy mayo sauce

ingredients.name: Best Foods Sauce Roasted Garlic Gluten Free, Dairy Free, No Artificial Flavors, No High-Fructose Corn Syrup 9 oz
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon garlic, peeled and minced, for spicy mayo sauce

ingredients.name: Great Value Organic Strained Raw Honey, 12 oz Inverted Plastic Bottle
ingredients.description: 2 teaspoons honey, for spicy mayo sauce

ingredients.name: Great Value Organic Red Pepper Flakes, 1.2 oz
ingredients.description: red chili flakes (optional), for spicy mayo sauce

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: 1.Fill a large pot of water about a ¼ of the way and bring to a simmer.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: 2.Add chopped cauliflower and florets to a food processor and pulse until it resembles grains of rice. Note: do not blend the cauliflower, as it will be too fine. Add the cauliflower to a mesh strainer, then set it over the pot of boiling water (it should not be touching the water). Cover with a lid and allow it to steam for 10 to 15 minutes. Set aside to cool.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: 3.Set an air-fryer (or oven) to 400 F.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: 4.In a large bowl, add shrimp, seasonings and egg and toss to combine. Sprinkle in the arrowroot power and mix again — it should be very sticky. If not, add another teaspoon of arrowroot until it’s sticky.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: 5.Add crushed cornflakes to a bowl or a baking tray or shallow bowl. Coat the shrimp in the crushed cornflakes, pressing the cornflakes onto the shrimp to ensure it sticks. Transfer the shrimp to an air fryer and cook for 5 to 7 minutes, or until they are golden brown and cooked through. Depending on the size of your air fryer, you may need to cook the shrimp in batches.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: 6.While the shrimp cooks, prepare the spicy mayo. In a medium bowl, add the mayonnaise, Greek yogurt, Sriracha, garlic, honey and red chili flakes (if using) and whisk to combine.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: 7.Serve the shrimp over steamed cauliflower rice. Drizzle the Bang Bang sauce on top.

9fd131a7415e279351e0af801e2750a2.title: Hot honey grilled chicken thighs with sweet chili sauce
9fd131a7415e279351e0af801e2750a2.description: Looking for an affordable everyday grilling recipe? This is the answer.

ingredients.name: Great Value Organic Granulated Cane Sugar, 2 Lb
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup granulated sugar, for pig beach hot honey bbq seasoning

ingredients.name: Great Value Paprika, 2.5 oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup sweet paprika, for pig beach hot honey bbq seasoning

ingredients.name: Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
ingredients.description: 2 tablespoons kosher salt, for pig beach hot honey bbq seasoning

ingredients.name: Tones Granulated Garlic Spice, 11 oz
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon granulated garlic, for pig beach hot honey bbq seasoning

ingredients.name: Badia Onion Granulated, Bottle
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon granulated onion, for pig beach hot honey bbq seasoning

ingredients.name: C&H Premium Pure Cane Dark Brown Sugar, 2 lb
ingredients.description: 3 tablespoons dark brown sugar, for pig beach hot honey bbq seasoning

ingredients.name: Litehouse Freeze Dried Oregano, 0.28 Oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 teaspoon dried oregano, for pig beach hot honey bbq seasoning

ingredients.name: Great Value Ground Cumin, 2.5 oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin, for pig beach hot honey bbq seasoning

ingredients.name: Great Value Ground Thyme, 1.4 oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 teaspoon dried thyme, for pig beach hot honey bbq seasoning

ingredients.name: McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon ground black pepper, for pig beach hot honey bbq seasoning

ingredients.name: Great Value Chili Powder, 3 oz
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon chili powder, for pig beach hot honey bbq seasoning

ingredients.name: Badia Honey Granules  9.25 oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup honey granules, for pig beach hot honey bbq seasoning

ingredients.name: Lawry's Casero Cayenne Pepper, 1.62 oz
ingredients.description: 1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper, for pig beach hot honey bbq seasoning

ingredients.name: Marketside Antibiotic-Free Boneless Skinless Chicken Thighs, 1.3 - 1.9 lb
ingredients.description: 6 boneless skinless chicken thighs, for chicken thighs

ingredients.name: Fire & Smoke Society Honey BBQ, Barbecue Seasoning Rub, 9.5 Ounce
ingredients.description: 3/4 cup Pig Beach Hot Honey BBQ Seasoning (above), for chicken thighs

ingredients.name: Huy Fong Sriracha Hot Chili Sauce Ketchup 20oz
Maggi Mild Sweet Chili Sauce, No Msg Added, 11.43 oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup sweet chili sauce, such as Mae Ploy, for chicken thighs

ingredients.name: Great Value Organic Strained Raw Honey, 12 oz Inverted Plastic Bottle
Sky Valley Sambal Oelek Chili Paste 7 oz
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon sambal oelek, for chicken thighs

ingredients.name: OLD BAY 30% Less Sodium Seasoning, 2 oz Mixed Spices & Seasonings
ingredients.description: 1/4 teaspoon Old Bay seasoning, for chicken thighs

ingredients.name: Great Value Ground Cumin, 2.5 oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 teaspoon ground cumin, for chicken thighs

ingredients.name: GOYA Sazon Coriander & Annatto Seasoning 1.41 Oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 teaspoon ground coriander, for chicken thighs

ingredients.name: Fresh Green Onions Bunch, Each
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup sliced scallions, for chicken thighs

ingredients.name: Fresh Cilantro, Bunch
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup fresh cilantro leaves, for chicken thighs

ingredients.name: Limes, Each

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: MAKE THE PIG BEACH BBQ SEASONING: In a large mixing bowl, combine all ingredients. Store in an airtight container until ready to use.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: MAKE THE CHICKEN: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat on one side and low heat on another to create temperature zones for cooking.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: 2.While the grill is heating, toss chicken thighs with 3/4 cup Pig Beach BBQ Seasoning in a large bowl. Allow them to marinate for 15 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: 3.In a separate bowl, make the sweet chili glaze and dipping sauce: combine the Sriracha, sweet chili sauce, honey, sambal oelek, Old Bay seasoning, cumin and coriander. Set aside.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: 4.Once the grill is up to temperature, place the seasoned chicken thighs on the medium-high heat zone of the grill and cook for 6 to 8 minutes per side.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: 5.Once the chicken thighs reach an internal temperature of 160 F, transfer to the low heat zone of the grill and brush the tops of the thighs with the sweet chili glaze and dipping sauce.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: 6.Cook for about 5 minutes on the low zone of the grill to create a sticky charred glaze. Garnish with sliced scallions, fresh cilantro and lime wedges. Serve with additional sweet chili dipping sauce on the side.

fc1d5cb55b781375110e756a9857c027.title: Pesto palmiers
fc1d5cb55b781375110e756a9857c027.description: Two grocery store staples — puff pastry and pesto — are all you need to create this easy and irresistible party appetizer that’s perfect to serve with cocktails. When shopping, choose a finely textured pesto for the best results. If you prefer to use a homemade version, purée it for an additional minute or two in the food processor to make it as smooth as possible. Though you’ll get plenty of flavor from these two ingredients, you can also feel free to play around with it by adding a sprinkle of chili flakes or finely grated cheese. Looking for other fun ways to mix it up? Try swapping in an olive tapenade or a sun-dried tomato pesto.

ingredients.name: Pepperidge Farm Puff Pastry Frozen Pastry Dough Sheets, 2-Count, 17.3 oz. Box
Great Value Traditional Basil Pesto, 6.7 oz
GV All Purpose Flour 2LB Bag

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: 1.Preheat oven to 400 F. Line two baking sheets with parchment paper.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: 2.Dust a work surface with flour. Working with one sheet at a time, remove puff pastry from packaging and unroll onto the flour-dusted surface. Dust the top of the pastry with more flour. Use a rolling pin to roll lightly until the dough measures about 13-by-13-inches.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: 5.Using an offset spatula or pastry brush, spread about half the pesto in a thin even layer over the surface of the pastry.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: 6.Use a butter knife, the back of a spoon or your fingertip to gently draw a vertical line in the pesto to mark the center of the pastry. (Do not cut through or go into the dough — you’re just drawing a line to serve as a guide.)

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: 7.Starting from the left side of the pastry, slowly roll the dough in until it meets the center. Repeat with the right side until the roll meets the other in the center.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: 8.Use a sharp knife to slice the dough into 3/4” slices and place cut-side-up on a parchment-lined baking sheet. Repeat with the second half of the dough and pesto.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: 10.Bake 12 to 15 minutes, or until golden brown and puffed. Serve warm or room temperature.

1dc793b0c8c3abf85052086b2fb37f4d.title: Sheet-pan chicken fajitas
1dc793b0c8c3abf85052086b2fb37f4d.description: This is a fantastic weeknight recipe for the family—lots of flavor in just a little time, easy to pull together, and mostly hands off. And bonus, by making your own fajita spice mix, you can not only control the amount of salt, but also have extra for another night when you need a quick boost of flavor!

ingredients.name: Freshness Guaranteed Chicken Breast Tenderloins, 2.25 - 3.2 lb
ingredients.description: 2 pounds boneless, skinless chicken tenderloins (diced into 1 1/2 pieces)

ingredients.name: Fresh Red Bell Pepper, 1 Each
ingredients.description: 1 large red bell pepper, sliced thinly (about 1/4 inch thick)

ingredients.name: Yellow Onions, Each
ingredients.description: 1 small yellow onion, peeled and sliced thinly (about 1/4 thick)

ingredients.name: Great Value Chili Powder, 3 oz
Great Value Ground Cumin, 2.5 oz
Lawry's Casero Smoked Paprika, 2 oz
Litehouse Freeze Dried Oregano, 0.28 Oz
Great Value Garlic Powder, 3.4 oz
Great Value Onion Powder, 3.25 oz
Lawry's Casero Cayenne Pepper, 1.62 oz
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Concord Foods Reconstituted Lime Juice, 4.5 oz
Fresh Green Onions Bunch, Each
Great Value Burrito Flour Tortillas, 20 oz, 8 Count
ingredients.description: flour or corn tortillas, for serving

ingredients.name: Great Value All Natural Sour Cream, 8 oz Tub
Freshness Guaranteed Guacamole, Mild, 8 oz
Great Value Mild Thick & Chunky Salsa, 24 oz
Zatarain's Cilantro Lime Rice, 6.9 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: 1.Preheat the oven to 375 F.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: 2.In a large bowl, add chicken, bell pepper and onion

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: 3.In a small bowl, add all of the spices and salt and whisk to combine.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: 4.Pour extra virgin olive oil and 4 tablespoons fajita mixture onto chicken and vegetables and toss until well-coated. Let sit at room temperature for at least 20 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: 5.Line a sheet pan with foil or parchment paper and spread chicken and vegetables into single layer. Bake until chicken is cooked through and juices run clear, about 10 to 12 minutes, or until a thermometer inserted into the thickest part of the chicken registers 160 F. Stir once halfway through cooking.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: 6.Just before serving, toss chicken and vegetables with fresh lime juice and scallions. Serve in warmed tortillas with sour cream, guacamole, salsa, cheese and rice.

db86e984835a0fd5906e3ece26cc6909.title: Air fryer meatballs with tzatziki sauce
db86e984835a0fd5906e3ece26cc6909.description: There are so many ways to serve meatballs but usually you'll find them smothered with marinara sauce and served over spaghetti. Here, they take a trip to the Mediterranean with fresh flavor from golden raisins, flat-leaf parsley, mint and an easy Tzatziki sauce. This recipe calls for ground bison but feel free to use another type of lean meat if you can't find, or don't like the flavor of, bison. Roasted almonds add crunch to the meatballs in every bite.

ingredients.name: Marketside Butcher Ground Bison, 1 lb (Fresh)
ingredients.description: 1 pound ground bison (or lean meat of your choice), for meatballs

ingredients.name: Great Value Brown Rice, Whole grain, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup cooked and cooled brown rice, for meatballs

ingredients.name: Great Value Sliced Almonds, 4 oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup roasted almonds, crushed, for meatballs

ingredients.name: Great Value Seedless Golden Raisins, 15 oz
Mint Fresh Cut, 0.75 oz
ingredients.description: 1/8 cup fresh mint, finely chopped, for meatballs

ingredients.name: Fresh Curly Parsley Bunch, Each
ingredients.description: 1/8 cup flat-leaf parsley, finely chopped, for meatballs

ingredients.name: Morton Sea Salt, Fine, 4.4 Ounce
ingredients.description: 1/8 teaspoon fine sea salt, for meatballs,sea salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste, for quick tzatziki

ingredients.name: McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
ingredients.description: 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, for meatballs

ingredients.name: Great Value Greek Plain Nonfat Yogurt, 5.3 oz
ingredients.description: 1 cup Greek yogurt (2%), for quick tzatziki

ingredients.name: Fresh Cucumber, Each
ingredients.description: 1/2 cucumber, grated and squeezed to remove moisture using cheesecloth, for quick tzatziki

ingredients.name: Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1 1/2 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil, for quick tzatziki

ingredients.name: Concord Foods Lemon Juice, 4.5 oz
ingredients.description: juice from 1/2 lemon, for quick tzatziki

ingredients.name: Garlic Bulb, Each
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon garlic, peeled and minced, for quick tzatziki

ingredients.name: Great Value Dill Weed, 0.75 oz
ingredients.description: 1 1/2 tablespoons fresh dill, chopped, for quick tzatziki

ingredients.name: Great Value Whole Wheat Soft Taco Flour Tortillas, 16 oz, 10 Count
Fresh Iceberg Lettuce, Each
ingredients.description: lettuce, for garnish, for quick tzatziki

ingredients.name: Cherubs Grape Tomatoes, 10 oz Package
ingredients.description: tomato, sliced, for garnish, for quick tzatziki

ingredients.name: Fresh Red Onions, Each
ingredients.description: red onion, peeled and chopped, for garnish, for quick tzatziki

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: 1.Preheat the oven or an air fryer to 450 F.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: 2.In a large mixing bowl, add all of the ingredients for the meatballs and gently toss together using your hands until combined. Shape meatballs using a small ice cream scoop or spoon.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: 3. Line a baking tray with parchment paper and place the meatballs on the tray closely together. Doing so will lock in the juices, preventing dry meatballs. Bake for 12 to 15 minutes. If using an air-fryer, line the basket with parchment paper and place the meatballs inside. Air fry for 12 to 15 minutes, checking the meatballs halfway through to ensure they are not burning. Depending on the size of your air-fryer, you may cook the meatballs in batches.”

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: 4.In a small bowl, combine the ingredients for the tzatziki. Season to taste with sea salt and pepper.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: 5.Slice the pita in half and stuff it with the other half of the pita. Spread tzatziki on the inside, stuff with green lettuce, tomato slices, red onion and 2 to 3 meatballs.

6737a12b98f764aaa33dc2986bca8ba4.title: Sheet-pan buffalo chicken pizza
6737a12b98f764aaa33dc2986bca8ba4.description: Buffalo sauce works wonders across the board – just look at what it has done for cauliflower! This sheet pan pizza is no exception. Everything that makes wings a crowd favorite – saucy coated chicken, blue cheese, celery – can be found here, with the added benefit of a crisp yet pillowy-soft pizza crust.

ingredients.name: Great Value All Natural Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts, 3 lb (Frozen)
ingredients.description: 1 pound boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs

ingredients.name: Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
ingredients.description: kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
Crystal Louisiana's Pure Hot Sauce, 12 Fl Oz
ingredients.description: 1/3 cup hot sauce, such as Frank’s Red Hot

ingredients.name: Great Value Garlic Powder, 3.4 oz
Lawry's Casero Cayenne Pepper, 1.62 oz
Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
DeLallo Non-GMO, Pizza Dough Kit, 17.6 oz Bag
Great Value Finely Shredded Low-Moisture Part-Skim Mozzarella Cheese, 8 oz
Great Value Blue Cheese Salad Dressing & Dip, 16 fl oz
Fresh Red Onions, Each
ingredients.description: 1 small red onion, peeled and thinly sliced into rings

ingredients.name: Great Value Mayonnaise, 15 fl oz
Concord Foods Lemon Juice, 4.5 oz
Fresh Celery Stalk, Each
ingredients.description: 2 stalks celery, ribs thinly sliced, leaves roughly chopped

ingredients.name: Sprout House Fresh Cut Chives - 0.75oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: 1.In a medium saucepan, add chicken thighs and cover completely with water; season with 1 tablespoon salt. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until chicken is cooked through, 14 to 16 minutes. Transfer to a plate and let cool slightly. When cool enough to handle, shred into bite-size pieces.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: 2.Melt butter in a medium bowl in the microwave.Whisk in hot sauce, garlic powder, cayenne, and ? teaspoon salt. Toss chicken in sauce.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: 3.Preheat the oven to 450 F with a rack in the lowest position. Drizzle 3 tablespoons olive oil over the bottom of a 9-by-13-inch rimmed baking sheet or a 9-to-10-inch heavy-bottomed pan. Press pizza dough into the pan, stretching to fit to the edges. Drizzle with remaining 1 tablespoon oil and season with ¼ teaspoon each salt and pepper. Sprinkle mozzarella, blue cheese and onions evenly over dough, leaving a ½-inch border. Top with chicken. Bake on the lowest rack until cheese is melted and bubbly and crust is golden on the bottom, 20 to 25 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: 4.In a medium bowl, whisk together mayonnaise, lemon juice, and ? teaspoon each salt and pepper. Add celery and chives (if using) and toss to coat. Scatter salad over pizza and serve immediately.

d1593a932fc1fc28798854573d3e6629.title: Pork souvlaki with tzatziki
d1593a932fc1fc28798854573d3e6629.description: This succulent skewered pork is loaded with flavor from the marinade and charred to perfection. Once you add the tzatziki - it’s truly a match made in heaven.

ingredients.name: Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup extra-virgin olive oil, for marinade

ingredients.name: Garlic Bulb, Each
ingredients.description: 4 cloves garlic, minced, for marinade,3 cloves garlic, minced, for tzatziki

ingredients.name: Star Italian Kitchen Red Wine Vinegar, 12 fl oz
ingredients.description: 4 tablespoons red wine vinegar, for marinade

ingredients.name: Concord Foods Lemon Juice, 4.5 oz
ingredients.description: 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice, for marinade,2 tablespoons lemon juice, for tzatziki

ingredients.name: Litehouse Freeze Dried Oregano, 0.28 Oz
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
ingredients.description: kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, for marinade

ingredients.name: Pork Center Cut Loin Chops Thin Boneless, 1.0 - 2.2 lb, Tray
ingredients.description: 1 1/2 pounds pork loin, trimmed of silver skin and excess fat (cut into 1-inch cubes), for marinade

ingredients.name: Great Value Greek Plain Nonfat Yogurt, 5.3 oz
Fresh Cucumber, Each
ingredients.description: 1 Persian cucumber, finely chopped, for tzatziki

ingredients.name: Sprout House Fresh Cut Dill - 0.75oz
ingredients.description: 2 tablespoons freshly chopped dill, for tzatziki

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: 1.In a small bowl, mix all marinade ingredients together. In a large plastic bag, add the pork and pour the marinade mixture over the meat. Remove any excess air, seal the bag and toss to coat pork evenly with the marinade. Place the bag in the refrigerator for at least two hours or overnight.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: 2.In a medium bowl, combine the tzatziki ingredients. Cover and place in the refrigerator overnight overnight.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: 3.Soak the wooden skewers in water for at least 30 minutes prior to use. Remove the pork from the marinade and thread the cubes of marinated pork onto the skewers.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: 4.Preheat an indoor grill pan to medium-high heat. Grill the pork skewers until they browned on all sides and cooked through, 8 to 12 minutes, turning so each side gets direct heat during cooking. Transfer the skewers to a plate and rest for 5 minutes. Serve with tzatziki, fresh pita and extra lemons, as desired.

9409abd695c4c3cc03b824673dd2aaf7.title: Classic macaroni salad
9409abd695c4c3cc03b824673dd2aaf7.description: A classic macaroni salad is a must-have at summer picnics and potlucks alike. A few simple ingredients (many of which you probably have on hand) come together to make a surprisingly flavorful pasta salad that is perfect to serve at room temperature or straight from the refrigerator. This recipe has everything you want in a macaroni salad – a creamy but light dressing, al dente pasta, crunchy fresh vegetables and a sprinkle of fresh herbs.

ingredients.name: Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
ingredients.description: 2 tablespoons (plus 1 teaspoon) kosher salt, divided, plus more to taste

ingredients.name: McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Great Value Elbows Pasta, 16 oz
Great Value Mayonnaise, 15 fl oz
Great Value All Natural Sour Cream, 8 oz Tub
Great Value Distilled White Vinegar, 32 fl oz
Great Value Organic Granulated Cane Sugar, 2 Lb
Great Value Dijon Mustard, 12 oz Squeeze Bottle
Fresh Red Bell Pepper, 1 Each
Fresh Celery Sticks, 20 oz Bag
Fresh Green Onions Bunch, Each
Fresh Curly Parsley Bunch, Each

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: 1.Bring a large pot of water to a boil and season with 2 tablespoons salt. Add pasta and cook according to the package directions. Drain and let cool slightly.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: 2.In a large bowl, whisk together mayonnaise, sour cream, vinegar, sugar, mustard, 1 teaspoon salt and ½ teaspoon pepper. Add cooked pasta, bell pepper, celery and scallions and toss to combine. Cover and refrigerate at least 2 hours and up to 3 days. Stir in parsley before serving.

692c15e080476ef2d67a48c364b6da05.title: 4-ingredient air fryer salmon
692c15e080476ef2d67a48c364b6da05.description: This is one of my absolutely favorite salmon recipes when I need to create a meal for my family in a serious pinch.  I grab the 4 ingredients and this is on the table in 20 minutes or less. Also it uses an air fryer, which is the best appliance for busy families.

ingredients.name: Great Value Organic Strained Raw Honey, 12 oz Inverted Plastic Bottle
Great Value Less Sodium Soy Sauce, 15 fl oz
Garlic Bulb, Each
Great Value Frozen Wild Caught Pink Salmon Skin-on Fillets, 2 lb
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
ingredients.description: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: 1.In a small bowl, whisk together the honey, soy sauce, and garlic or garlic powder. Set aside.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: 2.Pat the salmon filets dry with a paper towel. Season each side with salt and pepper.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: 3.Line an air fryer basket with aluminum foil. Preheat the air fryer to 400 F for 3 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: 4.Place the salmon filets into the air fryer basket and evenly pour the glaze over the top. If using minced garlic, make that the garlic stays around it and not on the top as it will have a tendency to burn. Replace the lid and cook for 4 to 8 minutes, or until cooked through.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: 5.Carefully remove the salmon from the air fryer and serve with the remaining sauce in the foil.

ea58802856d5904bab18fe078978a876.title: Caesar chicken thighs with broccoli
ea58802856d5904bab18fe078978a876.description: It’s hard to beat a classic Caesar salad, but why should romaine lettuce have all the fun? Rich, creamy Caesar dressing can upgrade all sorts of dishes — including your next chicken dinner. Drizzle the umami-rich combo of oil, eggs, Parmesan cheese, garlic, lemon and anchovies over bone-in, skin-on chicken thighs to add deep flavor and to help the meat brown beautifully. And you don’t even need to make your own dressing. Bottled Caesar works wonderfully and is so much easier.

ingredients.name: Marketside Antibiotic-Free Boneless Skinless Chicken Thighs, 1.3 - 1.9 lb
ingredients.description: 4 bone-in, skin-on chicken thighs (about 2 pounds total)

ingredients.name: Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
Great Value Garlic Powder, 3.4 oz
Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Fresh Broccoli Crowns, Each
ingredients.description: 2 ounces broccoli, florets separated, stems peeled and finely chopped

ingredients.name: Great Value Creamy Caesar Salad Dressing & Dip, 16 fl oz
Whisps Parmesan Cheese Crisps, 100% Real Cheese Baked Snack, 1.95 oz
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Lemons, Each

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: 1.Preheat the oven to 425 F. Using a paper towel, pat the chicken dry; season with salt and garlic powder.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: 2.In a large, ovenproof skillet, heat the oil over medium-high. When the oil shimmers, add the chicken skin-side down. Cook undisturbed until the skin is golden and releases easily from the pan, 8 to 10 minutes. Flip the chicken and cook until very lightly browned, about 3 minutes. Transfer the chicken to a plate.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: 3.Reduce the heat to medium and add the broccoli stems. Cook, stirring frequently, until the stems soften, 2 to 3 minutes. Add the broccoli florets and toss to coat with the pan juices. Turn off the heat and drizzle 3/4 cup dressing over the broccoli; toss to coat. Arrange the chicken thighs on top of the broccoli. Evenly drizzle the remaining 1/4 cup dressing over the chicken (about 1 tablespoon per thigh).

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: 4.Transfer the skillet to the oven and bake until the broccoli is tender and the chicken registers 165 F on an instant-read thermometer, about 15 minutes. Let the chicken rest 5 minutes before serving. Top with crushed Parmesan crisps, pepper and lemon zest, if using.

346694bc22c09d447369e331b59bb4b7.title: Mushroom and kale stuffed shells
346694bc22c09d447369e331b59bb4b7.description: This is a kid-friendly dish to make — and one that your little ones can help out with, too. Let them help you fill the stuffed shells with the mushroom, kale and ricotta filling. For more heft, add a lean protein such as ground turkey.

ingredients.name: Great Value Shells Pasta, 16 oz
Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Garlic Bulb, Each
White Onions, Each
Fresh Whole Portabella Mushroom Caps, 6 oz
ingredients.description: 5 portobello mushroom caps, gills removed and diced

ingredients.name: Morton Sea Salt, Fine, 4.4 Ounce
ingredients.description: 1/8 teaspoon sea salt, plus more to taste

ingredients.name: McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
ingredients.description: freshly ground black pepper, to taste

ingredients.name: Fresh Green Kale Bunch, Each
Great Value Original Ricotta Cheese, 15 oz
Great Value Traditional Basil Pesto, 6.7 oz
Mariposa Farms Fresh Cut Thyme, .75 oz
Litehouse Freeze Dried Oregano, 0.28 Oz
Great Value Marinara Pasta Sauce, 23 oz
Great Value Reduced Fat Shredded Mozzarella Cheese, 16 oz
Fresh Curly Parsley Bunch, Each

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: 1.Preheat the oven to 420 F.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: 2.Bring a pot of salted water to boil. Cook pasta shells according to the package instructions given. Drain, then set aside.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: 3.Meanwhile, heat a heavy-bottomed pot such as a Dutch oven over medium heat. Add oil, garlic, onion mushrooms, salt and pepper and stir to combine, cooking until onions turn brown and the mushrooms shrink in size, 3 to 5 minutes. Transfer the mixture to separate bowl and set aside.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: 4. In the same Dutch oven, add shredded kale and a few tablespoons of water to create steam. Toss the kale in the pot until it turns a vibrant green color. Set aside.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: 5.In a large bowl, combine ricotta cheese, mushroom mixture, sautéed kale, pesto, thyme and oregano.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: 6.In a casserole dish, spread about ½ cup of the marinara on the bottom. Then one by one, stuff a pasta shell with about 2 tablespoons of the ricotta mix, then add it to the dish.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: 7.Cover the shells with the remaining marinara and mozzarella cheese. Cover with foil and bake for 20 minutes. For the final 5 minutes, remove the foil so the mozzarella can brown. Sprinkle with freshly chopped parsley just before serving.

074a2de878beac3abb3c668beee13b4f.title: Spring vegetable lasagna
074a2de878beac3abb3c668beee13b4f.description: While lasagna tends to be pretty dense, meaty and heavy, this recipe is much lighter while still being a filling and oh-so satisfying vegetarian meal. This is a great recipe to put together on Sunday afternoon and enjoy for dinner. It takes some time to build, but once you have all of your components ready, it’s a cinch. Par-boiled lasagna noodles are topped with five flavorful layers — a creamy bechamel sauce, blanched spinach and peas, nutty Parmesan cheese, lemon-scented ricotta and a homemade garlicky pesto sauce.

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 6 tablespoons unsalted butter, softened, plus more for pan

ingredients.name: Great Value All-Purpose Flour, 5LB Bag
Great Value Half & Half, 16 fl oz
Great Value Ground Nutmeg, 1.5 oz
Lawry's Casero Cayenne Pepper, 1.62 oz
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
ingredients.description: kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper

ingredients.name: Great Value Lasagna Pasta, 16 oz
Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup extra-virgin olive oil, plus more for drizzling

ingredients.name: Marketside Fresh Spinach, 10 oz Bag, Fresh
Great Value Canned Sweet Peas, 15 oz Can
Garlic Bulb, Each
Great Value Original Ricotta Cheese, 15 oz
McCormick Gourmet California Lemon Peel, 1.5 oz
Great Value Grated Parmesan Cheese, 8 oz
ingredients.description: 4 ounces Parmesan cheese, finely grated (about 1 cup)

ingredients.name: Sprout House Fresh Cut Chives - 0.75oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: 1.Preheat the oven to 400 F. Brush a 9-by-13-inch baking dish with butter; set aside.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: 2.Melt 4 tablespoons butter in a small saucepan over medium heat. Add flour and cook, stirring, until lightly toasted, about 2 minutes. Slowly whisk in half-and-half. Bring to a gentle simmer and cook, whisking often, until thickened slightly, 3 to 4 minutes. Remove from heat and whisk in nutmeg, cayenne and ½ teaspoon salt; cover to keep warm.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: 3.Meanwhile, bring a large pot of water to a boil and season with 2 tablespoons salt and a generous drizzle of oil. Add noodles and cook for 5 minutes. Gently lift noodles out of water and drain on paper towels. Return water to a boil and add spinach and peas; cook until just wilted and bright green, about 1 minute. Drain the vegetables in a colander and rinse under cold water. Once cool, use your hands to squeeze out as much liquid as possible.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: 4.Place 1½ cups of spinach and peas, garlic, olive oil, ½ teaspoon salt and ¼ teaspoon pepper in the bowl of a food processor or blender and pulse until smooth. In a small bowl, combine ricotta, lemon zest, and ? teaspoon each salt and pepper.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: 5.To assemble, line the bottom of the prepared baking dish with ¼ of the noodles. Spread 1/4 of the bechamel and 1/3 of the ricotta mixture over the noodles. Scatter 1/3 of the spinach and peas and 1/4 of the Parmesan over the top; drizzle with 1/3 of the spinach pesto. Repeat the layering process three times, ending with the last layer of noodles and remaining bechamel and Parmesan. Dot top of lasagna with remaining 2 tablespoons butter. Cover tightly with aluminum foil.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: 6.Bake for 20 minutes. Uncover and continue baking until browned in places and bubbling around the edges, 15 to 20 minutes more. Let stand at least 15 minutes before serving, sprinkled with chives.

aab75d362cb0bbdc3bd5167eb080dde7.title: After-school zucchini pizzas
aab75d362cb0bbdc3bd5167eb080dde7.description: An after-school snack idea for the week!

ingredients.name: Fresh Zucchini Squash, Each
Great Value Marinara Pasta Sauce, 23 oz
Great Value Finely Shredded Low-Moisture Part-Skim Mozzarella Cheese, 8 oz
Great Value Cheese & Pepperoni Mini Pizza Bagels, 7 oz, 9 Count

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Slice zucchini at an angle into ¼-inch (6 ½ mm) slices. Place on a baking sheet, and broil for 4 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Top each zucchini slice with marinara, mozzarella, and toppings of your choice (we used mini pepperoni). Broil an additional 3 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

7f7e2c993076178fce62222f5927c7b0.title: Paccheri with italian sausage, fennel and lemony pine nuts
7f7e2c993076178fce62222f5927c7b0.description: This recipe is the perfect dinner for a casual weeknight or an elevated dinner party with friends. The best part? It all happens in one pot, minimizing cleanup and making the fruits of your labor well worth it. Serve on its own or alongside crusty bread to sop up all the flavorful sauce.

ingredients.name: Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
ingredients.description: kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper

ingredients.name: Barilla Classic Rigatoni Pasta, 16 oz Box
ingredients.description: 1 pound tube-shaped pasta, such as paccheri or rigatoni

ingredients.name: Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Great Value, Mild Ground Italian Sausage, Pork, 1lb (Fresh)
Lemons, Each
Great Value Pine Nuts, 4 oz
Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
Great Value Organic Fennel Seed, 1.6 oz
ingredients.description: 1 medium-size bulb fennel, cored and diced, fronds reserved for garnish

ingredients.name: White Onions, Each
Garlic Bulb, Each
Great Value Grated Parmesan Cheese, 8 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: 1.Finely chop half a seeded lemon.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: 2.Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta 1 minute shy of the package instructions. Reserve 1 cup pasta water and drain.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: 3.While the pasta is cooking, add olive oil to a large Dutch oven set over medium-high heat. Once shimmering, add sausage and cook, breaking up the meat with a wooden spoon or potato masher until golden brown and cooked through, about 6 minutes. Remove the sausage with a slotted spoon and set aside in a bowl.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: 4.Reduce the heat to medium and add the finely chopped lemon and pine nuts. Cook, stirring continuously, until the mixture is fragrant and the nuts are golden brown, 2-3 minutes. Remove with a slotted spoon and set aside on a cutting board. Season with salt. Once cooled, roughly chop.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: 5.Melt the butter in the same Dutch oven. Add fennel and onion, cooking until softened and the onion is translucent, about 10 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Add garlic and cook 2 minutes more. Reduce the heat to low.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: 6.Add the pasta, reserved sausage and ½ cup pasta water and toss everything to coat, sprinkling in the Parmesan cheese, a handful at a time. Add the juice of the reserved lemon half and toss again, adding more pasta water as necessary to achieve a silky sauce. To serve, top with reserved pine nuts, lemon and fennel fronds.

67df904bbe9b586e8f405dab26a945ac.title: Mini chipotle shrimp tacos
67df904bbe9b586e8f405dab26a945ac.description: There’s something about mini food that makes it absolutely irresistible and always the hit of any party. For this crowd-friendly appetizer, you’ll need a 3-inch round cookie or biscuit cutter to make these mini soft taco shells cut out of regular size flour tortillas or wraps. Use the smallest shrimp you can find to make these extra cute and super poppable. You’ll get 24 mini tacos out of this recipe, but you may want to double it since they’ll go quickly!

ingredients.name: Great Value Frozen Raw Small Peeled & Deveined, Tail-off Shrimp, 12 oz (60-80 Count per lb)
ingredients.description: 1 pound small or medium shrimp, deveined with peels and tails removed

ingredients.name: Embasa Gluten-Free Chipotle Peppers in Adobo Sauce, 7 oz
ingredients.description: 3 tablespoons adobo sauce from a can of chipotles in adobo sauce

ingredients.name: Limes, Each
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
Fresh Red Onions, Each
Fresh Red Bell Pepper, 1 Each
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup red bell pepper, finely diced

ingredients.name: Great Value All Natural Sour Cream, 16 oz Tub
Great Value Ground Cumin, 2.5 oz
Great Value Burrito Flour Tortillas, 20 oz, 8 Count
Fresh Cilantro, Bunch
Great Value Classic Round Wood Toothpicks, Toothpick Box, 500 Count

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: 1.Combine shrimp with adobo sauce, lime juice and salt. Toss to coat well. Heat a large skillet over medium high heat and add shrimp, cooking until pink and thoroughly cooked, about 3 to 5 minutes. Toss with the red onion and bell pepper, then set aside.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: 2.In a small bowl, whisk together sour cream and cumin.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: 3.Use a 3-inch round cookie or biscuit cutter to cut mini circles out of the tortillas (you should get about 5 small tortillas per each large one).

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: 4.Assemble the tacos by placing a spoonful of the cumin sour cream, top with 1 to 2 shrimp, then skewer with a toothpick. Repeat with rest of shrimp and tortillas. Garnish tacos with fresh cilantro.

dd1d3f32fbedbd342600f8b2528f645d.title: Brown sugar & soy glazed pork with elote salad
dd1d3f32fbedbd342600f8b2528f645d.description: Looking for an affordable everyday grilling recipe? This is the answer.

ingredients.name: Great Value Onion Powder, 3.25 oz
ingredients.description: 2 teaspoons onion powder, for brown sugar & soy glazed pork steaks

ingredients.description: 3/4 cup sour cream, for grilled mexican street corn 'elote' salad (serves 6-8)

ingredients.name: Great Value Mayonnaise, 15 fl oz

ingredients.description: 2 cloves garlic, peeled and minced, for grilled mexican street corn 'elote' salad

ingredients.name: Limes, Each
ingredients.description: zest of 2 limes, for grilled mexican street corn 'elote' salad,juice of 2 limes, for grilled mexican street corn 'elote' salad

ingredients.description: 8 ears sweet corn on the cob, husks removed, for grilled mexican street corn 'elote' salad

ingredients.name: Crisco Pure Vegetable Oil, 16 fl oz
ingredients.description: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, for grilled mexican street corn 'elote' salad

ingredients.name: Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon kosher salt, for grilled mexican street corn 'elote' salad

ingredients.name: FUD Cotija Mexican Style Grating Cheese 8 oz. Bag
ingredients.description: 1 cup crumbled cotija cheese, for grilled mexican street corn 'elote' salad

ingredients.name: Fresh Jalapeno Pepper, Approx. 3-5 per 0.25 Pound
ingredients.description: 1 jalapen~o pepper, seeded and finely diced, for grilled mexican street corn 'elote' salad

ingredients.name: Limes, Each
ingredients.description: 6 lime wedges, for garnish, for grilled mexican street corn 'elote' salad

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: MAKE THE PORK: In a small mixing bowl, whisk together the ground black pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, ground ginger, light brown sugar, soy sauce, rice wine vinegar and vegetable oil. Place the pork steaks in an airtight plastic bag and pour half of the marinade over the pork (reserve the other half of the marinade for basting and dipping). Refrigerate for at least one hour and up to overnight.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: 2.Spray the grill grates with nonstick grill spray. Preheat the grill to medium-high heat on one side and low heat on the other.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: 3.Once the grill is hot, remove the pork steaks from the marinade and transfer to a plate to remove any excess marinade to prevent flareups on the grill.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: 4.Place the pork steaks at a 45-degree angle over the grill grates over medium-high heat and cook for 3 to 4 minutes, then lift and turn the pork steaks 90 degrees and place on an unused hot spot of the grill. Baste with reserved marinade and cook for another 3 to 4 minutes. Flip the pork steaks and place on a 45 degree angle against the grill grates on an unused hot spot of the grill. Baste with reserved marinade and cook for another 3 to 4 Minutes. Lift and turn the pork steaks 90 degrees and place on an unused hot spot of the grill and baste again. After 12 to 16 minutes of cook time, check the internal temperature. If the internal temperature has reached 145 F, remove the pork steaks from the grill and transfer to a clean plate and allow them to rest for 5 minutes. If the pork steaks need more time, transfer them to the low heat section of your grill and cook with the lid closed as needed until the temperature reaches 145 F.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: 5.Once rested, slice thin on the bias and drizzle some of the remaining marinade over the meat. Serve with additional marinade on the side.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: MAKE THE GRILLED MEXICAN STREET CORN “ELOTE” SALAD: Preheat the grill to high.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: 2.Make the dressing: in a large mixing bowl, whisk together the sour cream, mayonnaise, cilantro, garlic, lime zest and lime juice. Set aside.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: 3. Once the grill comes up to temperature, clean the grates using a wire grill brush and spray with nonstick grill spray.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: 4. Season the corn with oil, salt and pepper, then grill for about 2 to 3 minutes per side.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: 5.Once the corn is cooked, transfer to a cutting board to cut the kernels off the cob, then discard the cobs.

tasks.title: Step 11
tasks.instruction: 6.Transfer the grilled corn kernels to a large mixing bowl and toss with prepared dressing, crumbled cotija cheese and jalapeño. Garnish with lime wedges.

e16e1cd780035bfc998bb24259920d3f.title: Butter-basted pork chops
e16e1cd780035bfc998bb24259920d3f.description: Pork is incredible in an endless number of ways but pork chops (bone in or boneless) are the most popular cut of pork. They come from the loin which is the meat that runs from the pig’s hip to its shoulder.  Look for something that’s just over 1 inch thick. You’ll be able to find thinner cuts, but anything in the 1¼  inch realm is my favorite thickness for this recipe. If you can only get a thinner cut, no problem. The cooking time in the below recipe will change – but regardless, the internal temperature of this cut should be 145 F once done. So whip out your meat thermometer to be sure!

ingredients.name: Pork Center Cut Loin Chops Thick Boneless, 0.8 - 2.0 lb, Tray
ingredients.description: 2 (14- to 16-ounce) bone-in, center-cut pork loin chops, about 1 1/4-inches thick

ingredients.name: Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
McCormick Black Pepper Grinder, 1 oz Pepper & Peppercorns
Great Value Paprika, 2.5 oz
Great Value Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 17 fl oz
Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
