tasks.title: Step 20
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

ingredients.name: Fresh Baby-Cut Carrots, 2lb Bag
King Arthur Flour Unbleached All-Purpose Flour 5 lb. Bag
ingredients.description: 2 1/2 cups all-purpose flour, plus 1 tablespoon, divided

ingredients.name: Great Value Kosher Ground Cinnamon, 2.5 Oz
Great Value Organic Ground Allspice, 1.6 oz
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
Great Value Double Acting Baking Powder, 8.1 oz
Great Value Baking Soda, 16 oz
Great Value Light Brown Sugar, 32 oz
C&H Premium Pure Cane Granulated Sugar, 1 lb Box
Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count
Crisco Pure Vegetable Oil, 16 fl oz
Great Value Sun-Dried Raisins, 20 oz
Great Value Canned Pineapple Chunks packed in 100% Pineapple juice, 20 oz
Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 1 cup unsalted butter, (2 sticks) room temperature for icing

ingredients.name: Great Value Whipped Cream Cheese Spread, 12 oz
ingredients.description: 12 oz cream cheese, room temperature for icing

ingredients.name: Great Value Pure Vanilla Extract, 1 fl oz
Great Value Confectioners Powdered Sugar, 32 oz
Great Value Walnuts Halves & Pieces, 16 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Grease 3 8-inch (20 cm) round cake pans and line with parchment paper.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Grate the carrots on the small holes of a box grater. Set aside.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, sift together 2 1/2 cups (310 G) of flour, the cinnamon, allspice, salt, baking powder, and baking soda. Whisk together.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: In a separate large bowl, beat the brown sugar, granulated sugar, and eggs together with an electric hand mixer on medium speed until just combined.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: With the mixer running, gradually pour in the vegetable oil.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: With the mixer on medium-low speed, add ? of the flour mixture at a time to the wet ingredients. Beat just to incorporate. Stop mixing when there is just a small amount of flour visible.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: In a small bowl, toss the raisins with the remaining tablespoon of flour.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Add the raisin, grated carrots, and pineapple to the batter and fold to incorporate with a rubber spatula.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Divide the cake batter evenly between the prepared pans and smooth the tops.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Bake for 25-30 minutes, until a fork inserted in the center of a cake comes out clean.

tasks.title: Step 11
tasks.instruction: Cool the cakes on a wire rack until the pans are cool to the touch. Remove the cakes from the pans and let cool completely on the rack.

tasks.title: Step 12
tasks.instruction: Make the icing: In a large bowl, beat together the butter, cream cheese, and vanilla with an electric hand mixer on medium-low speed. Once combined, mix on medium-high speed for 30 seconds, until light and fluffy.

tasks.title: Step 13
tasks.instruction: Add the powdered sugar, 1/2 cup (60 G) at a time, beating on medium-low speed to incorporate each addition.

tasks.title: Step 14
tasks.instruction: Assemble the cake: Check to see if the top of each cake is flat. If not, use a serrated knife level off the cakes.

tasks.title: Step 15
tasks.instruction: Place 1 cake layer on a serving platter or cake stand. Spoon ¼ of the icing on top and spread in an even layer. Add another layer of cake and spread with another 1/4 of the icing. Set the last cake layer on top with the bottom up to ensure a very flat surface. Spread the rest of the icing over the top and sides.

tasks.title: Step 16
tasks.instruction: Gently press the walnuts into the icing around the sides of the cake.

tasks.title: Step 17
tasks.instruction: Chill for 30-60 minutes to let the icing set, then slice and serve.

tasks.title: Step 18
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

ingredients.name: GV All Purpose Flour 2LB Bag
Great Value Active Dry Yeast, 0.25 oz, 3 Count
Great Value Sugar Cannister 20oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
Great Value Purified Drinking Water, 16.9 fl oz, 24 Count
Augason Farms Dried Whole Egg Powder Resealable Pouch Emergency Food Storage 11.9 oz.
Great Value Sweet Cream Salted Butter, 16 oz
Smucker's Apple Jelly, 18 Ounces

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a mixing bowl, combine flour, yeast, sugar, and salt. Mix for 1 minute. Next add water and half of the beaten egg. Mix. Add butter and mix until combined. Knead by hand until smooth and elastic, about 10 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Cover the dough and let it rise in a warm place for about 30 minutes. After that, punch the dough down and make a large round ball and allow it to rise for 10 minutes longer.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Now take out the dough ball and roll it out with a rolling pin until you have roughly a 12 x10 inch rectangle that is about 1/4 inch thick.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Place the apple jam across the dough. Spread it across the surface of the dough but leave about a 1 inch border around the entire rectangle – so the jam doesn’t ooze out. Roll the dough up into a log. Cut the log into 7 equal slices using a sharp knife.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Place the dough slices in a greased baking pan. Allow to rise for 10 minutes. Next, brush the remaining beaten egg over the top of the bread.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Bake at 200°C for 20 minutes or until golden brown. Serve and enjoy.

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 1 1/2 sticks unsalted butter, softened, plus more for greasing

ingredients.name: Great Value Pure Vanilla Extract, 1 fl oz
Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon
Lemons, Each
Great Value Double Acting Baking Powder, 8.1 oz
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
Great Value Organic Strained Raw Honey, 12 oz Inverted Plastic Bottle
Great Value Sugar Cannister 20oz
King Arthur Flour Unbleached All-Purpose Flour 5 lb. Bag
ingredients.description: 1 1/2 cups all purpose flour, plus more for dusting

ingredients.name: Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count
Freshness Guaranteed Gala Apples, 3 lb Bag
ingredients.description: 2 sweet tart apples, such as honeycrips

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 335°F (170°C). Grease a 9-inch (22 cm) tart pan (with a removable base) with butter, then dust with flour, turning to coat evenly and tapping out the excess.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, cream the sugar, butter, and lemon zest together with an electric hand mixer until light and fluffy, 2–3 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Make a well in the center of the creamed sugar and butter. Add the eggs, vanilla, and salt to the well. Beat to combine.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Sift in the flour and baking powder, then beat just to incorporate. The batter will be thick and sticky.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Using a rubber spatula, transfer the batter to the prepared tart pan and spread in an even layer, starting at the center and working toward the outer edges.Cut lobes off of the apples, then discard the cores.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Stick a skewer crosswise through the flat side of each apple wedge, just deep enough so the skewer is not exposed; this will prevent the knife from cutting all the way through the apple. Set the apples flat-side down and thinly slice lengthwise, stopping your knife when you hit the skewer. Remove the skewers.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Arrange the apples in a circle pattern over the batter and gently push in to submerge slightly.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Bake the cake for about 45 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out almost completely clean. The cake will brown around the edges before it’s done.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: In a small bowl, mix together the honey and water.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Brush the honey mixture over the top of the warm cake.

tasks.title: Step 11
tasks.instruction: The cake can be served immediately, but it is even better the next day, as the apples will infuse the cake with their flavor when left to sit covered at room temperature overnight. Remove the tart ring, then slice and serve

tasks.title: Step 12
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

ingredients.name: Sara Lee All Butter Pound Cake, Family Size, 16 oz (Frozen)
Blue Ribbon Classics Strawberry Shortcake Bar
ingredients.description: 8 strawberry shortcake ice cream bars, softened

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
Great Value Freeze Dried Strawberry Fruit Crisps, 1 oz
Great Value Fudge Striped Shortbread Cookies, 11.5 oz
Great Value Whipped Topping, 16 oz, Frozen Dessert Topping

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Line a 9-inch square glass baking dish with plastic wrap.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Trim the ends off of the pound cake, then slice crosswise into 8 1-inch-thick slices.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Arrange the pound cake slices tightly in the bottom of the prepared baking dish.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: One at a time, place a strawberry shortcake ice cream bar on top of the pound cake layer, then remove the stick. Freeze for about 3 hours.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: In a medium bowl, toss together the melted butter, freeze-dried strawberries, and shortbread cookies. It should resemble the cookie coating from the outside of the strawberry shortcake bars.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Remove the baking dish from the freezer. Spread the whipped topping over the strawberry shortcake bar layer, then sprinkle generously with the cookie crumble. (Alternatively, to cover the entire cake, lift the plastic wrap to remove the cake from the baking dish and set on a small baking sheet. Cover the top and sides with double the amount of whipped topping and cookie crumble.) Freeze overnight.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: When ready to serve, use the plastic wrap to remove the ice cream cake from the pan. Place on a cutting board and remove the plastic. Cut into 8–10 pieces and serve immediately.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

ingredients.name: Great Value Sliced Bananas, 16 oz (Frozen)
ingredients.description: 4 bananas, as ripe as possible, for banana bread crust

ingredients.name: Crisco Pure Vegetable Oil, 16 fl oz
ingredients.description: 4 tablespoons vegetable oil, for banana bread crust

ingredients.name: Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count
Great Value Sugar Cannister 20oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup sugar, for banana bread crust,1/2 cup sugar, for cheesecake filling

ingredients.name: Great Value Pure Vanilla Extract, 1 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, for banana bread crust,1 tablespoon vanilla extract, for cheesecake filling

ingredients.name: King Arthur Flour Unbleached All-Purpose Flour 5 lb. Bag
ingredients.description: 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour, for banana bread crust

ingredients.name: Great Value Double Acting Baking Powder, 8.1 oz
ingredients.description: 1 teaspoon baking powder, for banana bread crust

ingredients.name: Great Value Baking Soda, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 1 teaspoon baking soda, for banana bread crust

ingredients.name: Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 teaspoon salt, for banana bread crust

ingredients.name: Great Value Kosher Ground Cinnamon, 2.5 Oz
ingredients.description: 1 teaspoon cinnamon, for banana bread crust

ingredients.name: Great Value Cream Cheese, 8 oz
ingredients.description: 32 oz cream cheese, softened, for cheesecake filling

ingredients.name: Great Value 2% Reduced Fat Milk, Half Gallon, 64 fl oz
Great Value Unflavored Gelatin, 0.25 Oz, 4 Count
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon gelatin powder, for cheesecake filling

ingredients.name: Torani Puremade Caramel Sauce, Authentic Coffeehouse Sauce and Dessert Topping, 16.5 oz
ingredients.description: caramel sauce, for drizzling, for cheesecake filling

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, mash the bananas with a fork.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add the oil, egg, sugar, and vanilla. Stir until combined.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add the flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon. Stir until just combined. Don’t over mix.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Pour the banana bread batter into a greased 9-inch (22 cm) springform pan.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Bake for 30-40 minutes, or until the top is set.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, add the cream cheese, sugar, and vanilla. Whisk until combined.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Microwave the milk until hot, about 2 minutes, then add the gelatin powder. Quickly stir until gelatin is completely dissolved, about 5 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Pour the gelatin mixture over the cream cheese and whisk again until smooth.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Pour the cheesecake mixture over the baked banana bread crust.

tasks.title: Step 11
tasks.instruction: Chill for 3 hours, or overnight.

tasks.title: Step 12
tasks.instruction: Unmold the cheesecake, then slice and serve drizzled with caramel sauce.

tasks.title: Step 13
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

ingredients.name: Great Value Sugar Cannister 20oz
C&H Premium Pure Cane Dark Brown Sugar, 2 lb
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
BetterBody Foods Refined Organic Coconut Oil, 28.0 fl oz Jar
Great Value 2% Reduced Fat Milk, Half Gallon, 64 fl oz
Great Value Pure Vanilla Extract, 1 fl oz
King Arthur Flour Unbleached All-Purpose Flour 5 lb. Bag
Great Value Baking Soda, 16 oz
Enjoy Life Baking Chocolate Semi-Sweet Mega Chunks, Dairy Free Chocolate Chips, Soy Free, Nut Free, Non GMO, Gluten Free | 5 Lb
Enjoy Life Baking Chocolate, Soy free, Nut free, Gluten free, Dairy free, Non GMO, Vegan, Paleo, Dark Chocolate Morsels, 9 Ounce Bag

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, whisk together the sugar, brown sugar, salt, and coconut oil until combined.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Whisk in non-dairy milk and vanilla, until all sugar has dissolved and the batter is smooth.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Sift in the flour and baking soda, then fold the mixture with a spatula, being careful not to overmix.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Fold in the chocolate chunks evenly.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Chill the dough for at least 30 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C).

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Scoop the dough with an ice cream scoop onto a parchment paper-lined baking sheet. Be sure to leave at least 2 inches of space between cookies and the edges of the pan so cookies can spread evenly.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until cookies just begin to brown.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Cool completely.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

ingredients.name: Honeycrisp Apples, Each
ingredients.description: 1 honeycrisp apple for applie pie filling

ingredients.name: Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon water for apple pie filling

ingredients.name: Great Value Kosher Ground Cinnamon, 2.5 Oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon for apple pie filling,1/4 teaspoon cinnamon, plus more for crumble topping

ingredients.name: Great Value Light Brown Sugar, 32 oz
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon brown sugar for apple pie filling,1 tablespoon brown sugar for crumble topping

ingredients.name: King Arthur Flour Unbleached All-Purpose Flour 5 lb. Bag
ingredients.description: 1 teaspoon all purpose flour for apple pie filling,1 tablespoon all purpose flour for crumble topping

ingredients.name: Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
ingredients.description: 1 pinch kosher salt for applie pie filling,1 pinch kosher salt for crumble topping

ingredients.name: Great Value Organic Old Fashioned Oats 18oz
ingredients.description: 3 tablespoons old fashion oats for crumble topping

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, softened for crumble topping

ingredients.name: Great Value Whipped Topping, 8 oz, Frozen Dessert Topping

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Make the filling: Peel the apple, then dice into small pieces, avoiding the core.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add the apple and water to a large, microwave-safe mug. Microwave for 1 minute, until the apple is tender.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Remove from the microwave and stir in the cinnamon, brown sugar, flour, and salt.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Make the crumble topping: In a small bowl, mix together the oats, flour, brown sugar, cinnamon, and salt with a fork. Mash in the butter until crumbly chunks form.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Spoon the topping over the apple mixture. Microwave on high power for 3–4 minutes, until the filling is juicy and bubbling and the topping is golden brown.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Top with whipped cream and a sprinkle of cinnamon, then serve.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

ingredients.name: Great Value Sugar Cannister 20oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup sugar for caramel sauce, 1/3 cup sugar for apple filling, 1 tablespoon sugar for pie dough

ingredients.name: Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count
King Arthur Flour Unbleached All-Purpose Flour 5 lb. Bag
ingredients.description: 1 1/4 cups all purpose flour, plus more for dusting

ingredients.name: Granny Smith Apples, Each
ingredients.description: 1 1/2 lb granny smith apple, or Fuji apple, peeled, cored and sliced

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 8 tablespoons unsalted butter, cubed and chilled for pie dough, 1 tablespoon unsalted butter for apple filling, 1 tablespoon unsalted butter for caramel sauce

ingredients.name: Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon
Great Value Heavy Whipping Cream, 16 Oz
Concord Foods Lemon Juice, 4.5 oz
Great Value Kosher Ground Cinnamon, 2.5 Oz
Great Value Apple Cider Vinegar, 32 fl oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Make the pie dough: In a medium bowl, combine the flour, sugar, and salt. Mix with fork.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add the butter and work into the flour with a fork until only pea-size lumps remain.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add the apple cider vinegar and mix into the dough with your fingers. Gradually add the ice water and mix with your hands until the dough starts to come together. Add more water as needed if the dough is dry. The dough should not be very tacky or sticky. Shape the dough into a rough ball and cover with plastic wrap. Chill in the refrigerator for 30 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Meanwhile, make the apple filling: In a large skillet over medium heat, combine the sliced apples, lemon juice, cinnamon, and sugar. Cook, stirring continuously, until the apples are soft, about 10 minutes. Add the butter and stir to incorporate. Remove the pan from the heat and let the filling cool.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: On a lightly floured surface, roll out the dough into a round that is about ?-inch (3 mm) thick. Roll the dough around the rolling pin and transfer to the prepared baking sheet.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Bake the galette for 25 minutes, until the crust is golden brown.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Bake the cake for about 45 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out almost completely clean. The cake will brown around the edges before it’s done.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Meanwhile, make the caramel sauce: In a small pot, combine the sugar, salt, and butter. Cook over medium heat until the sugar dissolves and turns amber in color, 2-3 minutes, swirling the pan occasionally.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Pour in the heavy cream and stir with wooden spoon. Remove from the heat and let cool slightly.

tasks.title: Step 11
tasks.instruction: Drizzle the caramel sauce over the galette, then slice and serve.

tasks.title: Step 12
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

79c1c7a5aeda32e23211e2613f029dec.title: Quick peanut butter energy balls
79c1c7a5aeda32e23211e2613f029dec.description: These energy balls can be mixed together in a large bowl in less than five minutes. My kids love them for an after-school snack. Add in dried cranberries, use a different nut butter, or use sunflower or pumpkin seeds. Keep these energy balls in a sealed container for up to a week in the fridge or in the freezer for up to 3 months

ingredients.name: Great Value Creamy Peanut Butter, 18 oz Jar
Great Value Organic Old Fashioned Oats 18oz
Great Value Organic Strained Raw Honey, 12 oz Inverted Plastic Bottle
Manitoba Harvest Organic Hemp Heart Seeds, 7.0 Oz, 6 Servings
ingredients.description: 2 to 3 Tbsps of mix-ins such as chia, flax, or hemp seeds, or more rolled oats

ingredients.name: Great Value Pure Vanilla Extract, 1 fl oz
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
Great Value Mini Semi-Sweet Chocolate Baking Chips, 12 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Combine all the ingredients in a bowl and stir together. The dough should be slightly sticky and hold together.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Line a rimmed baking sheet with parchment or wax paper.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Using a cookie scoop or spoon, roll the dough into balls the size of a walnut or golf ball, about a generous tablespoon. Transfer to the rimmed baking sheet.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Chill in the fridge for at least 15 minutes to firm up (but you can certainly eat these right out of the bowl!) Transfer to a sealed container and store in the refrigerator for up to a week.

b1d57ab8d02713b330987734c9e86162.title: Marshmallow sweet potato pie
b1d57ab8d02713b330987734c9e86162.description: No one has to know you didn’t make the pie! Add a homemade cheater’s meringue topping using marshmallow fluff and whipped egg whites and you’ll have your guests thinking that you’ve been in the kitchen all day!

ingredients.name: Bob Evans Cage Free Liquid Egg Whites, 32 oz, Pack of 1
Jet-Puffed Mini Marshmallows, 10 oz Bag
Patti LaBelle 8 inch Sweet Potato Pie, 21 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Beat the egg whites in a large bowl with an electric hand mixer on high speed until soft peaks form, 2–3 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Gradually add the marshmallow fluff and continue beating until stiff, glossy peaks form, 2–3 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Dollop the topping on top of the sweet potato pie and swirl into peaks.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Bake the pie until the meringue has browned, 10–12 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Let cool before serving.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

ingredients.name: King Arthur Flour Unbleached All-Purpose Flour 5 lb. Bag
Great Value Sugar Cannister 20oz
Great Value Baking Unsweetened Cocoa Powder, 8 oz
Great Value Double Acting Baking Powder, 8.1 oz
Great Value 2% Reduced Fat Milk, Half Gallon, 64 fl oz
Crisco Pure Vegetable Oil, 16 fl oz
Great Value Pure Vanilla Extract, 1 fl oz
Great Value Hazelnut Spread, 13 oz
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon chocolate hazelnut spread, plus more for topping

ingredients.name: Great Value Confectioners Powdered Sugar, 32 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a 12-ounce (375 ml) mug or larger, mix all ingredients (except the chocolate hazelnut spread) until just combined.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Once combined, spoon the chocolate hazelnut spread on top of the batter.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Microwave on high for 90 seconds to 2 minutes, watching to make sure it doesn’t spill over (depending on the size of the mug).

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Let cool one minute before eating. Top with additional chocolate hazelnut spread and powdered sugar (optional).

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

c6431fe6a4b801fc1de4ef04d925ec7a.title: Old fashioned easy apple crisp
c6431fe6a4b801fc1de4ef04d925ec7a.description: This easy old-fashioned apple crisp recipe is packed with all the cozy flavors of fall, and it's sure to bring back happy memories of Grandma's cooking. Best of all, it comes together quickly and doesn't require any special ingredients. Serve it with a scoop of vanilla ice cream and caramel sauce for an extra-special treat.

ingredients.name: Freshness Guaranteed Gala Apples, 3 lb Bag
ingredients.description: 6 Golden Apples, peeled and chopped (other varieties can be used, can also be sliced)

ingredients.name: C&H Premium Pure Cane Granulated Sugar, 1 lb Box
Great Value Kosher Ground Cinnamon, 2.5 Oz
Concord Foods Lemon Juice, 4.5 oz
Great Value Light Brown Sugar, 32 oz
Great Value Organic Old Fashioned Oats 18oz
GV All Purpose Flour 2LB Bag
Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
Little Debbie Fudge Rounds Ice Cream, Fudge Crme with Fudgy Chocolatey Cookie, Pint
Great Value Canola Oil Non-Stick Cooking Spray, 8 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Butter an 8×8 baking dish, or spray with non-stick cooking spray. Set aside.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In a mixing bowl, add chopped apples, granulated sugar, 3/4 tsp of the cinnamon and lemon juice. Stir to combine, then transfer to the prepared baking dish.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: In a separate mixing bowl, add brown sugar, oats, flour, 1 tsp cinnamon, salt, and cold butter cubes.  Use two forks or even your hands to cut butter into the mixture until the mixture resembles pea-sized crumbs.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Spread topping over apples in a baking dish, and gently pat to even it out.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Bake for 30-35 minutes, until golden brown and bubbly.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Serve warm and enjoy with ice cream.

4f4a36c95da2ce5259df840b3d81c37f.title: Blackberry crumble
4f4a36c95da2ce5259df840b3d81c37f.description: Not only can this recipe be made gluten-free, but it tastes delicious with hints of cinnamon, syrupy blackberries, and a crisp and sweet oat topping. Serve this warm over scoops of vanilla bean ice cream for a fabulous dessert you can enjoy year-round.

ingredients.name: Fresh Blackberries, 6 oz
ingredients.description: 16 oz. bag frozen blackberries, for the filling

ingredients.name: C&H Premium Pure Cane Granulated Sugar, 1 lb Box
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup granulated sugar, for the filling

ingredients.name: Granny Smith Apples, Each
ingredients.description: 1 medium Granny Smith apple (4-6 oz in size), for the filling

ingredients.name: GV All Purpose Flour 2LB Bag
ingredients.description: 3 tbsp all purpose flour, for the filling

ingredients.name: Great Value Kosher Ground Cinnamon, 2.5 Oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 tsp ground cinnamon, for the filling,1/2 tsp ground cinnamon, for the crumble topping

ingredients.name: Concord Foods Lemon Juice, 4.5 oz
ingredients.description: 1 tbsp fresh lemon juice, for the filling

ingredients.name: Great Value Canola Oil Non-Stick Cooking Spray, 8 oz
ingredients.description: Non Stick Spray or neutral vegetable oil, for the filling

ingredients.name: Great Value Light Brown Sugar, 32 oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup packed brown sugar, for the crumble topping

ingredients.name: Great Value Superfine Blanched Almond Flour 16oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup almond flour, for the crumble topping

ingredients.name: Great Value Organic Old Fashioned Oats 18oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup old fashioned rolled oats, for the crumble topping

ingredients.name: Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
ingredients.description: 1/8 tsp kosher salt, for the crumble topping

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 3 tbsp unsalted butter, softened or at room temperature, for the crumble topping

ingredients.name: Great Value Homestyle Vanilla Flavored Ice Cream, 48 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 gallon Vanilla Ice Cream, for the crumble topping

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat your conventional oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C).

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Use a non stick spray or a neutral cooking oil to grease the inside of the pie dish. Being sure to cover the bottom and sides.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Use a vegetable peeler to peel the skin off of the apple.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Cut the apple from the core in large pieces and then grate the cut pieces of apple onto a box grater.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: In a medium size bowl add the frozen blackberries, granulated sugar, grated apple, all purpose flour, cinnamon, and lemon juice. Mix together until everything is well combined.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Empty the contents of the bowl into the bottom of the pie dish.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: In another bowl, add the softened butter, brown sugar, almond flour, rolled oats, cinnamon, and kosher salt.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Using a fork, or the back of a mixing spoon, work the butter and other ingredients together until they hold together like a loose cookie dough.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Sprinkle the oat topping over the top of the blackberry filling in the pie dish.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Place the pie dish in the oven and bake for 40 minutes until the filling is bubbly and the topping is crisp and just beginning to brown.

tasks.title: Step 11
tasks.instruction: Serve over scoops of vanilla ice cream.

ca2fabc870b955faaa8ade2ba39418aa.title: Cinnamon roll bread pudding
ca2fabc870b955faaa8ade2ba39418aa.description: We all know that cinnamon rolls are delicious. But our Cinnamon Roll Bread Pudding is even better! This sweet and gooey dessert is the perfect way to use any leftover cinnamon rolls, but it's so good that you'll want to make it even if you don't have any leftovers! This Cinnamon Roll Bread Pudding is made with just a few simple ingredients and only takes 30 minutes to make. The bread pudding is infused with the rich flavor of cinnamon, making it the perfect treat for any cinnamon lover. And trust us, once you try this bread pudding, you'll be hooked!

ingredients.name: Freshness Guaranteed Un-Iced Mini Cinnamon Rolls, 16 oz, 15 Count
ingredients.description: 2 pckg (16 oz) Un-Iced Mini Cinnamon Rolls

ingredients.name: Del Monte Fruit Cocktail, 100% Juice, Canned Fruit, 15 oz Can
ingredients.description: 1 can (15 oz) Fruit Cocktails in 100% Juice

ingredients.name: Great Value Whole Vitamin D Milk, Half Gallon, 64 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1 1/4 cups Whole Milk, for baking Cinnamon Roll

ingredients.name: Fisher Chef's Naturals Chopped Walnuts, 8 oz
Great Value Pure Vanilla Extract, 1 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 tsp Vanilla Extract, for baking Cinnamon Roll,1/2 Tbsp Vanilla Extract for Cinnamon Roll Glaze

ingredients.name: Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count
Great Value Canola Oil Non-Stick Cooking Spray, 8 oz
Great Value Confectioners Powdered Sugar, 32 oz
ingredients.description: 2 cups Powdered Confectioners Sugar for Cinnamon Roll Glaze

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Salted Butter, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 2 Tbsp Butter , melted for Cinnamon Roll Glaze

ingredients.name: Great Value Heavy Whipping Cream, 16 Oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup Milk or Heavy Cream for Cinnamon Roll Glaze

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C). Coat the bottom and sides of a deep 8-inch square baking dish with Nonstick Cooking Spray (as needed) .

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, add Fruit Cocktails in 100% Juice (1 can) , Whole Milk (1 1/4 cups) , Walnuts (1/2 cup) , Vanilla Extract (1/2 tsp) , and Large Eggs (4) and mix together.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add Un-Iced Mini Cinnamon Rolls (2 pckg) and mix. Let rest for a few minutes to allow the liquid to soak in about 5-7 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Pour the cinnamon roll mixture into the prepared pan. Bake until golden on top, about 25 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: In a medium mixing bowl, combine Powdered Confectioners Sugar (2 cups) , Butter (2 Tbsp) , Vanilla Extract (1/2 Tbsp) , and Milk (1/4 cup) until smooth and thick like icing.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Pour the icing over warm rolls, spread over top, and cut into 4x4-inch squares.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Serve warm with a nice glass of milk.

4ef6108609fe8c6865e00d5a162b63af.title: Chocolate orange shortbread
4ef6108609fe8c6865e00d5a162b63af.description: Looking for a delicious holiday dessert that is quick and easy to make? Look no further than our Chocolate Orange Shortbread recipe! These luscious bars are bursting with the classic flavor combination of rich chocolate and zesty orange. Kids and adults alike will love this tasty treat! This delicious shortbread will become a new holiday favorite made with just a few simple ingredients.

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Salted Butter, 16 oz
C&H Premium Pure Cane Granulated Sugar, 1 lb Box
GV All Purpose Flour 2LB Bag
Great Value Double Acting Baking Powder, 8.1 oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
Navel Oranges, 4 lb Bag
Great Value Orange Marmalade, 18 oz
Dove Promises Mother's Day Dark Chocolate Candy Bag - 8.46 oz
Great Value Caramel Syrup, 24 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (80 degrees C). Grease and line a 9-inch baking tray with parchment paper, making sure the paper rises above the tray by a couple of inches.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, cream Butter (1 cup) , Granulated Sugar (1 cup) , and Orange Zest (2) together with a hand mixer until light and pale, about 3 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add All-Purpose Flour (2 cups) , Baking Powder (1 tsp) , and Salt (1 tsp) , and mix gently altogether until a dough forms.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Place half of the dough in the prepared tray and press it out evenly, covering the bottom of the tray.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Spread the Orange Marmalade (1 cup) over the dough. Sprinkle the remaining dough and top with the Dark Chocolate (1 cup) .

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes or until light brown.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Remove from the oven and transfer to a cooling rack to cool down to room temperature.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Cut the shortbread into squares, about 3x3-inch. Drizzle Caramel Syrup (1/2 cup) on top. Enjoy.

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Salted Butter, 16 oz
Great Value Cream Cheese, 8 oz
Great Value 2% Reduced Fat Milk, Half Gallon, 64 fl oz
Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count
King Arthur Flour Unbleached All-Purpose Flour 5 lb. Bag
Great Value Corn Starch, 16 oz
Bob Evans Cage Free Liquid Egg Whites, 32 oz, Pack of 1
C&H Premium Pure Cane Granulated Sugar, 1 lb Box
Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon
Great Value Confectioners Powdered Sugar, 32 oz
Fresh Strawberries, 1 lb

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 320°F (160°C).

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a small pot over medium heat, whisk together the butter, cream cheese, and milk until melted and smooth. Remove from the heat and let cool.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, whisk the egg yolks until smooth, then slowly drizzle in the cream cheese mixture, stirring until evenly combined.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Sift in the flour and the cornstarch, whisking to make sure there are no lumps.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: In another large bowl, beat the egg whites with a hand mixer until soft peaks form. Gradually add the sugar while continuing to beat until stiff peaks form.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Fold about 1/4 of the egg whites and into the yolk mixture, then repeat with the remaining egg whites until the batter is evenly combined.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Grease the bottom of a 9 x 3-inch (23 x 7.5 cm) round cake pan, then line the bottom and sides with parchment paper. If using a springform pan, make sure to wrap the bottom and sides completely in foil twice to prevent any leakage.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Pour the batter into the pan and shake to release any large air bubbles.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Place the pan into a larger baking dish lined with 2 paper towels at the bottom. The paper towels ensure that the heat is distributed evenly along the bottom of the pan. Fill the larger pan about 1-inch (2-cm) high with hot water.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Bake for 25 minutes, then reduce the heat to 285°F (140°C), and bake for another 55 minutes, until the cake has risen to almost double its original height.

tasks.title: Step 11
tasks.instruction: Remove from oven, and carefully invert the cake onto your dominant hand and peel off the paper. Be extremely careful, the cake will be hot. You can also invert the cake onto a plate, but this will cause the cake to deflate more.

tasks.title: Step 12
tasks.instruction: Dust the top of the cake with powdered sugar, then slice and serve with strawberries while still warm!

tasks.title: Step 13
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

ingredients.name: Great Value Confectioners Powdered Sugar, 32 oz
ingredients.description: 1 3/4 cups powdered sugar,for macarons,3 cups powdered sugar, for vanilla buttercream

ingredients.name: Great Value Superfine Blanched Almond Flour 16oz
ingredients.description: 1 cup almond flour, finely ground, for macarons

ingredients.name: Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
Bob Evans Cage Free 100% Liquid Egg Whites, 16 oz, Pack of 1 (Refrigerated)
ingredients.description: 3 egg whites, at room temperature, for macarons

ingredients.name: C&H Premium Pure Cane Granulated Sugar, 1 lb Box
Great Value Pure Vanilla Extract, 1 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, for macarons,1 teaspoon vanilla extract, for vanilla buttercream

ingredients.name: Wilton Pink Gel Food Coloring, 1 oz.
ingredients.description: 2 drops pink gel food coloring, for macarons

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 1 cup unsalted butter, 2 sticks, at room temperature, for vanilla buttercream

ingredients.name: Great Value Heavy Whipping Cream, 16 Oz
ingredients.description: 3 tablespoons heavy cream, for vanilla buttercream

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Make the macarons: In the bowl of a food processor, combine the powdered sugar, almond flour, and ½ teaspoon of salt, and process on low speed, until extra fine. Sift the almond flour mixture through a fine-mesh sieve into a large bowl.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a separate large bowl, beat the egg whites and the remaining ½ teaspoon of salt with an electric hand mixer until soft peaks form. Gradually add the granulated sugar until fully incorporated. Continue to beat until stiff peaks form (you should be able to turn the bowl upside down without anything falling out).

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add the vanilla and beat until incorporated. Add the food coloring and beat until just combined.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add about 1/3 of the sifted almond flour mixture at a time to the beaten egg whites and use a spatula to gently fold until combined. After the last addition of almond flour, continue to fold slowly until the batter falls into ribbons and you can make a figure 8 while holding the spatula up.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Transfer the macaron batter into a piping bag fitted with a round tip.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Place 4 dots of the batter in each corner of a rimmed baking sheet, and place a piece of parchment paper over it, using the batter to help adhere the parchment to the baking sheet.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Pipe the macarons onto the parchment paper in 1 1/2-inch (3-cm) circles, spacing at least 1-inch (2-cm) apart.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Tap the baking sheet on a flat surface 5 times to release any air bubbles.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Let the macarons sit at room temperature for 30 minutes to 1 hour, until dry to the touch.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 300°F (150°C).

tasks.title: Step 11
tasks.instruction: Bake the macarons for 17 minutes, until the feet are well-risen and the macarons don’t stick to the parchment paper.

tasks.title: Step 12
tasks.instruction: Transfer the macarons to a wire rack to cool completely before filling.

tasks.title: Step 13
tasks.instruction: Make the buttercream: In a large bowl, add the butter and beat with a mixer for 1 minute until light and fluffy. Sift in the powdered sugar and beat until fully incorporated. Add the vanilla and beat to combine. Add the cream, 1 tablespoon at a time, and beat to combine, until desired consistency is reached.

tasks.title: Step 14
tasks.instruction: Transfer the buttercream to a piping bag fitted with a round tip.

tasks.title: Step 15
tasks.instruction: Add a dollop of buttercream to one macaron shell. Top it with another macaron shell to create a sandwich. Repeat with remaining macaron shells and buttercream.

tasks.title: Step 16
tasks.instruction: Place in an airtight container for 24 hours to “bloom”.

tasks.title: Step 17
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

cd5a664ffd5b69ff36e30e873dec8c2b.title: The best chewy chocolate chip cookies
cd5a664ffd5b69ff36e30e873dec8c2b.description: The Best Chewy Chocolate Chip Cookies

ingredients.name: C&H Premium Pure Cane Granulated Sugar, 1 lb Box
Great Value Light Brown Sugar, 32 oz
Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count
Great Value Pure Vanilla Extract, 1 fl oz
King Arthur Flour Unbleached All-Purpose Flour 5 lb. Bag
Great Value Baking Soda, 16 oz
Great Value Semi-Sweet Chocolate Baking Chips, 12 oz
ingredients.description: 4 oz milk or semi-sweet chocolate chunks

ingredients.name: Great Value Dark Chocolate Baking Chips, 10 oz
ingredients.description: 4 oz dark chocolate chunk or your preference

ingredients.name: Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, whisk together the sugars, salt, and butter until a paste forms with no lumps.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Whisk in the egg and vanilla, beating until light ribbons fall off the whisk and remain for a short while before falling back into the mixture.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Sift in the flour and baking soda, then fold the mixture with a spatula (Be careful not to overmix, which would cause the gluten in the flour to toughen resulting in cakier cookies).

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Fold in the chocolate chunks, then chill the dough for at least 30 minutes. For a more intense toffee-like flavor and deeper color, chill the dough overnight. The longer the dough rests, the more complex its flavor will be.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Scoop the dough with an ice-cream scoop onto a parchment paper-lined baking sheet, leaving at least 4 inches (10 cm) of space between cookies and 2 inches (5 cm) of space from the edges of the pan so that the cookies can spread evenly.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the edges have started to barely brown.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Cool completely before serving.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

2da5d0665849f9dbb03cd51696a97b7e.title: No-bake peanut butter cookies
2da5d0665849f9dbb03cd51696a97b7e.description: When a cookie craving strikes and you don’t want to bother turning on the oven, rest easy knowing that these no-bake peanut butter cookies will save the day. This quick and easy recipe is one to always keep in your back pocket. The cookies come together from start to finish in just about 45 minutes — no need to wait for the oven to preheat.

ingredients.name: Great Value Organic Old Fashioned Oats 18oz
Great Value Creamy Peanut Butter, 18 oz Jar
ingredients.description: 1 cup smooth peanut butter, such as Skippy or Jif

ingredients.name: C&H Premium Pure Cane Granulated Sugar, 1 lb Box
Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
Great Value Whole Vitamin D Milk, Half Gallon, 64 fl oz
Great Value Pure Vanilla Extract, 1 fl oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Line two baking sheets with parchment paper. Measure the oats and peanut butter and set aside.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Place the sugar, butter, milk and vanilla in a 3- to 4-quart saucepan. Keep uncovered and bring to a boil, stirring occasionally, over medium-high heat.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Once the mixture is boiling, continue to boil for 2 minutes, stirring occasionally. The mixture should be thick and foamy and reach a temperature of 230 F with an instant-read or candy thermometer.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Remove the pot from the heat and immediately add the oats and peanut butter. Stir until well-combined.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Drop 24 heaped tablespoons of the cookie dough onto the prepared baking sheets. Cool the cookies at room temperature until they are firm to the touch and no longer shiny, about 30 minutes.

ac4ad476fb5745f461bbd549baa336b1.title: Strawberry rhubarb bars
ac4ad476fb5745f461bbd549baa336b1.description: These strawberry-rhubarb pie bars hit all the buttery, jammy notes of a double-crust fruit pie but are far simpler to make. A single pie dough recipe does double duty as a bottom crust that’s pressed into the pan and a topping that’s strewn over the fruit filling. The dough comes together quickly in a bowl—no special equipment or pie-making prowess needed.

ingredients.name: GV All Purpose Flour 2LB Bag
ingredients.description: 2 cups all-purpose flour, for bottom crust and topping

ingredients.name: Great Value Light Brown Sugar, 32 oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup light brown sugar, for bottom crust and topping

ingredients.name: Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
ingredients.description: 3/4 teaspoon kosher salt, for bottom crust and topping

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 10 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted, for bottom crust and topping

ingredients.name: Great Value Sliced Almonds, 4 oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup sliced almonds, for bottom crust and topping

ingredients.name: Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon
ingredients.description: 1 teaspoon cold water, for bottom crust and topping

ingredients.name: Fresh Strawberries, 1 lb
ingredients.description: 2 cups finely chopped strawberries, for filling

ingredients.name: Lucky Leaf Premium Strawberry Rhubarb Fruit Filling and Topping, 21 oz Can
ingredients.description: 2 cups finely chopped rhubarb, for filling

ingredients.name: Great Value Organic Granulated Cane Sugar, 2 Lb

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: 1.Preheat the oven to 350 F. Coat the bottom of an 8-inch square pan with butter or nonstick spray, and line with parchment paper that hangs over two sides.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: 2.In a medium mixing bowl, whisk together flour, brown sugar and salt. Add melted butter and stir until combined.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: 3.Transfer 1 cup of the dough to a small bowl; this portion will be used as the topping. Add almonds and cold water. Using your hands, press the dough together into a cohesive mass (a few crumbles are fine) and freeze for about 20 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: 4.Transfer the remaining dough to the prepared pan (note: save the mixing bowl for the fruit filling; just wipe it clean). Using your hands, evenly press the dough onto the bottom of the pan. Bake for 15 minutes, or until lightly browned. Transfer to a rack to cool slightly. (You can bake the crust up to 8 hours in advance, or use it while it’s hot.) Increase the oven temperature to 375 F.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: 5.Meanwhile, make the fruit filling: In the same mixing bowl, add the strawberries, rhubarb, sugar and lemon zest and toss to combine. Add the cornstarch and toss to evenly coat.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: 6.Pour the fruit filling over the bottom crust, distributing it evenly.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: 7.Break off clumps of the reserved dough, each about a tablespoon in volume, and flatten to an even thickness between your hands. (It’s okay if the pieces are irregular in shape and size!) Scatter them over the fruit; they should mostly cover (but not obscure) the filling.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: 8.Bake the pie bars for 40 to 50 minutes, or until the fruit filling is bubbling around the edges and the top crust is golden brown. Transfer to a rack to cool completely.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: 9.Run a knife around the pan to release the edges. Using the parchment, lift and transfer to a cutting board and cut into squares. Store at room temperature for up to a day in an airtight container; after that, they’ll keep best in the refrigerator.

01f7e0b424738e7a152732bba1bb04fc.title: Red velvet cake mix cookies
01f7e0b424738e7a152732bba1bb04fc.description: These four-ingredient Red Velvet Cake Mix Cookies are so simple to make and are downright delicious. They're soft and tender, with a beautiful crackled top. And you can use this recipe with any cake mix, so you can experiment with all sorts of flavor combinations.

ingredients.name: Pillsbury Moist Supreme Premium Red Velvet Cake Mix, 15.25 oz Box
ingredients.description: 1 box (15.25 oz) Red Velvet Cake Mix

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Salted Butter, 16 oz
Great Value White Chocolate Baking Bar, 4oz Box
Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Line a sheet pan with parchment paper. Set aside.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In a large mixing bowl, add cake mix, eggs and butter. With a rubber spatula, stir until dough forms (slightly sticky consistency).

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Using your hands, shape the dough into balls (1 ounce each) and place them on the prepared sheet pan, about 2-2.5 inches apart.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Using your hands, shape the dough into balls (1 ounce each) and place them on the prepared sheet pan, about 2-2.5 inches apart.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: In the preheated oven, bake for 10 minutes. Don’t let it brown. Cookies will look soft and not quite done but firm up as they cool.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Let sit on the sheet pan for 5 minutes then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Enjoy it right away. For the remaining cookies; store in an airtight container for up to 5 days, or freeze for up to 3 months.

7664165a5d2f3ed2c7546567965139db.title: No-bake cannoli cheesecake
7664165a5d2f3ed2c7546567965139db.description: A cannoli is a classic Italian pastry. With its crispy shell and creamy, cool, slightly sweet ricotta filling, it checks all the boxes of a delicious dessert (particularly when a little chocolate is added). Here, I have taken everything that everyone loves in a cannoli (including the not-always-traditional, but always welcome pistachio) and created a no-bake cannoli-inspired cheesecake.

ingredients.name: Great Value Vanilla Wafers, 11 oz
ingredients.description: 1 1/2 cups finely ground vanilla wafers, for vanilla wafer crust

ingredients.name: C&H Premium Pure Cane Granulated Sugar, 1 lb Box
ingredients.description: 3 tablespoons granulated sugar, for vanilla wafer crust

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 6 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted, for vanilla wafer crust

ingredients.name: Great Value Whipped Cream Cheese Spread, 12 oz
ingredients.description: 24 ounces cream cheese, room temperature, for ricotta filling

ingredients.name: Great Value Pure Vanilla Extract, 1 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon pure vanilla extract, for ricotta filling

ingredients.name: Great Value Organic Orange Peel, 1.15 oz
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon orange zest, for ricotta filling

ingredients.name: Great Value Kosher Ground Cinnamon, 2.5 Oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon, for ricotta filling

ingredients.name: Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
ingredients.description: 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, for ricotta filling

ingredients.name: Great Value Original Ricotta Cheese, 15 oz
ingredients.description: 16 ounces full-fat ricotta cheese, room temperature, for ricotta filling

ingredients.name: Great Value Confectioners Powdered Sugar, 32 oz
ingredients.description: 1 cup powdered sugar, for ricotta filling

ingredients.name: Great Value Mini Semi-Sweet Chocolate Baking Chips, 12 oz
ingredients.description: 1 cup mini chocolate chips, plus more for sprinkling, for ricotta filling

ingredients.name: Great Value Roasted & Salted Pistachios, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 1/3 cup shelled roasted and salted pistachios, chopped, for sprinkling, for ricotta filling

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Grease the sides and bottom of a 9-inch springform pan with cooking spray or softened butter. Line the bottom and sides with parchment paper.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a large mixing bowl, combine the finely ground cookies, sugar and melted butter with a flexible spatula or your hands. Transfer the mixture to the prepared pan and press it evenly into the bottom of the pan, using a measuring cup or your fingers. Place in the freezer while you assemble the filling.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Place the cream cheese in the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment, and beat on medium-low until smooth, scraping the bowl with a rubber spatula as needed. Add the vanilla, zest, cinnamon and salt and beat until combined. Add the ricotta and powdered sugar and beat until the mixture is thick and uniform. Fold in the chocolate chips.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Transfer the filling to the prepared crust, smoothing the top with an offset spatula or butter knife. Sprinkle with the pistachios and additional chocolate chips. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 6 hours, but preferably overnight.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: When ready to serve, remove the sides and bottom of the pan. Place the cake on a serving plate and slice into wedges. The cake will keep for 3 days in the refrigerator if tightly wrapped.

00bedc763f16760c06d33f01fc8e6659.title: Fudgy brownie pie
00bedc763f16760c06d33f01fc8e6659.description: This recipe is the perfect example of a dessert that’s far greater than the sum of its parts. Imagine the soft, fudgy center of a freshly baked brownie coupled with the crispy, buttery tenderness of pie crust. It’s everything you love about homemade brownies repackaged into a rustic pie. The magic of this recipe comes down to the mingling of two shortcut ingredients: Pre-made pie crust and boxed brownie mix. Together, the two create a decadent dessert that feels fancy enough to serve anytime, anywhere.

ingredients.name: Pillsbury Premade Refrigerated Pie Crusts, 2 Count
ingredients.description: 1 (14.1-ounce) box pre-made pie crust (2 sheets of pie dough)

ingredients.name: Great Value All-Purpose Flour, 5LB Bag
ingredients.description: all-purpose flour, for rolling pie dough

ingredients.name: Duncan Hines Chewy Chocolate Fudge Brownie Mix, 18.3 oz
Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon
Crisco Pure Vegetable Oil, 16 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1/3 cup neutral oil such as canola or vegetable

ingredients.name: Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count
Great Value Homestyle Vanilla Flavored Ice Cream, 48 fl oz
Great Value Heavy Whipping Cream, 16 Oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Place both sheets of pie dough onto a lightly floured work surface. Knead them into one ball and form into a rough disk shape. Roll the dough out into a rough circle shape that’s about 1/3-inch thick, then carefully transfer it into a standard 9-inch metal, ceramic or glass pie plate. Press the dough into the bottom and sides of the pie plate, then trim the excess dough that is hanging off the lip of the pie plate, leaving about a 1-inch overhang. Roll the excess crust underneath itself, then crimp the edge into a decorative pattern using your fingers. (If the dough is sticking to your fingers, lightly dust your hands in flour.) Prick the bottom and sides of the dough with a fork several times and place in the freezer for 20 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: As the dough is chilling, position a rack in the middle of the oven and preheat to 400 F.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Once the dough is fully chilled, line the inside of the pie crust with a sheet of parchment paper and fill the center with enough pie weights or dried beans so they come up to the top of the pie plate. Bake the pie shell until the crust is just barely starting to brown, 12 to 15 minutes. Carefully remove the parchment paper and pie weights by lifting them out by the parchment paper, then return the pie crust to the oven and continue baking until the bottom looks completely matte but doesn't have much browning, 6 to 10 minutes more. Remove the pie from the oven and let cool for at least 20 minutes. Reduce the oven temperature to 350 F.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: As the pie is cooling, combine the brownie mix, water, oil and egg and mix using a rubber spatula until smooth and no streaks of unincorporated egg remain. Pour the brownie batter into the cooled (but still slightly warm) pie shell and bake until the center doesn’t jiggle when you move the pie pan and a toothpick inserted into the center comes out with just a few moist crumbs attached to it, 30 to 35 minutes. If at any point the crust starts to get too brown, tent the edge of the pie with foil.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Let the pie cool at room temperature for at least 2 hours before cutting, then serve with vanilla ice cream or whipped cream, if desired.

73b2a4f3a766687e4a6d9c6fce392d59.title: Salted caramel stuffed crispy rice treats
73b2a4f3a766687e4a6d9c6fce392d59.description: Gooey, buttery crispy rice treats and salted caramel are #couplegoals. Quick tip: if the crispy rice mixture solidifies too much to spread, place the pot in the oven at 250°F for 5 minutes to soften.

ingredients.name: C&H Premium Pure Cane Granulated Sugar, 1 lb Box
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup granulated sugar, for salted caramel

ingredients.name: Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
ingredients.description: 1 teaspoon kosher salt, for salted caramel

ingredients.name: Great Value Salted Butter Sticks, 8 oz, 2 Sticks
ingredients.description: 3 tablespoons salted butter, cut into small pieces, room temperature, for salted caramel

ingredients.name: Great Value Heavy Whipping Cream, 16 Oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup heavy cream, for salted caramel

ingredients.name: Great Value Canola Oil Non-Stick Cooking Spray, 8 oz
ingredients.description: nonstick cooking spray, for greasing, for crispy rice treats

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 1 stick unsalted butter, for crispy rice treats

ingredients.name: Great Value Marshmallows, 10 oz
ingredients.description: 16 oz mini marshmallows, for crispy rice treats

ingredients.name: Great Value Pure Vanilla Extract, 1 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon McCormick® vanilla extract, for crispy rice treats

ingredients.name: Malt-O-Meal Crispy Rice Cereal, Gluten Free Breakfast Cereal, 36 oz Resealable Cereal Bag
ingredients.description: 8 cups puffed rice cereal, for crispy rice treats

ingredients.name: Morton Sea Salt, Fine, 4.4 Ounce
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon flaky sea salt, for crispy rice treats

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Make the salted caramel sauce: In a small saucepan fitted with a candy thermometer, stir together the sugar, water, and salt until no clumps remain, brushing any sugar granules from the sides of the pot. Turn the heat to medium and cook the sugar mixture without stirring until the temperature reaches 350°F (180°C) and the color turns light amber brown, 10–15 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Gently whisk in 1 piece of butter at a time until melted and incorporated.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Remove the pot from the heat. Slowly pour in the heavy cream, whisking continuously to prevent the caramel from overflowing. Use caution as the mixture bubbles. Let the sauce cool completely, then transfer to an airtight container and store in the refrigerator for up to 1 month.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Make the crispy rice treats: Grease a 9 x 13-inch glass baking dish with nonstick spray and line the bottom with parchment paper.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: In a large saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat until lightly browned, 3–4 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: With a rubber spatula, stir in the marshmallows until completely melted. Stir in the vanilla. Turn off the heat, add the puffed rice cereal, and stir until well coated.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Spread half of the crispy rice mixture evenly in the prepared pan. Freeze for 15 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Spread the salted caramel sauce evenly over the first layer of crispy rice treats and sprinkle with the flaky sea salt. Return the pan to the freezer for 10 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Spread the rest of the crispy rice mixture evenly over the caramel sauce. (If the crispy rice mixture solidifies too much to spread, place the pot in the oven at 250°F (120°C) for 5 minutes to soften). Let the treats cool completely, about 20 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Once cooled, invert the treats onto a cutting board and cut into 2-inch squares.

tasks.title: Step 11
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

6afaacbcba444c02d70521871ee07d8e.title: No-bake grasshopper pie
6afaacbcba444c02d70521871ee07d8e.description: This Grasshopper Pie is exactly what your St. Patrick’s Day has been asking for, as well as all of the mint-chocolate lovers in your life (and we hope there are many). Chocolate and mint is a legendary flavor combination that, in our humble opinion, is just so much better than the sum of its (delicious) parts.

ingredients.name: OREO Mint Creme Chocolate Sandwich Cookies, Family Size, 18.71 oz
ingredients.description: 23 mint-filled chocolate sandwich cookies, such as Oreos, finely ground (about 2 cups), plus about 1 more cookie for garnish, for mint chocolate cookie crumb crust

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup (4 tablespoons) unsalted butter, melted, for mint chocolate cookie crumb crust

ingredients.name: Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
ingredients.description: 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt, for mint chocolate cookie crumb crust,1/8 teaspoon kosher salt, for mint chocolate filling

ingredients.name: Great Value Cream Cheese, 8 oz
ingredients.description: 8 ounces cream cheese, softened, for mint chocolate filling

ingredients.name: Great Value Confectioners Powdered Sugar, 32 oz
ingredients.description: 1 1/2 cups confectioners' sugar, for mint chocolate filling,1 tablespoon confectioners' sugar, for whipped cream topping

ingredients.name: Great Value Heavy Whipping Cream, 32 oz
ingredients.description: 1 1/2 cups heavy cream, for mint chocolate filling,1 cup heavy cream, for whipped cream topping

ingredients.name: McCormick Pure Peppermint Extract, 2 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1 1/2 teaspoons peppermint extract, for mint chocolate filling

ingredients.name: Wilton Leaf Green Gel Food Coloring, 1 oz.
ingredients.description: 2 (to 4) drops green food coloring, for mint chocolate filling

ingredients.name: GHIRARDELLI 60% Cacao Bittersweet Chocolate Premium Baking Chips, 10 OZ Bag
ingredients.description: 3/4 cup coarsely chopped bittersweet chocolate, for mint chocolate filling

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: MAKE THE CRUST

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a large mixing bowl, combine the finely ground cookies, melted butter and salt with a flexible spatula or your hands. Transfer the mixture to a 9-inch pie plate and press it onto the bottom and up the sides of the plate, using a 1-cup measuring cup or your fingers. Place in the freezer while you assemble the filling.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: MAKE THE FILLING

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment, beat the cream cheese and sugar on medium speed until incorporated. Pour in the heavy cream and beat until thick, smooth and light, about 2 minutes, increasing the speed about halfway through. Add the peppermint extract and food coloring and mix just until combined. Fold in the chopped chocolate with a flexible spatula. Take the pie crust out of the freezer and transfer the filling into the chilled crust.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Cover the pie with plastic wrap and place in the refrigerator to chill for 6 hours, or, preferably, overnight.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: MAKE THE TOPPING

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Just before serving, make the whipped cream. In a large bowl, whip the heavy cream and confectioners’ sugar together on medium high with a hand mixer until soft peaks form. Dollop the cream in the center of the pie decoratively and spread just a bit with a small offset spatula. Sprinkle a crushed chocolate sandwich cookie on top of the cream.

886b3a07ea5906c63e672884b85198e9.title: No bake cherry chocolate cheesecake
886b3a07ea5906c63e672884b85198e9.description: This cheesecake is the ultimate dessert dream come true! Creamy and velvety smooth, with a decadent chocolate cookie crust and a sweet and tangy cherry topping that will make your taste buds sing. Best of all, it's a no-bake recipe, so you can indulge in all its lusciousness without turning on the oven.

ingredients.name: Stauffer's Chocolate Animal Crackers, 20 Oz.
ingredients.description: 1 1/2 cups chocolate graham cracker crumbs, for crust

ingredients.name: Great Value Light Brown Sugar, 32 oz
ingredients.description: 1/8 cup packed brown sugar, for crust

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Salted Butter, 16 oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
ingredients.description: 1 pinch salt, for crust,1/2 teaspoon salt, for cheesecake filling

ingredients.name: Great Value Cream Cheese, 8 oz
ingredients.description: 16 oz cream cheese (2 packages), for cheesecake filling

ingredients.name: Great Value Pure Vanilla Extract, 1 fl oz
ingredients.description: 2 teaspoons vanilla extract, for cheesecake filling

ingredients.name: Great Value Heavy Whipping Cream, 16 Oz
ingredients.description: 1 pt heavy whipping cream, for cheesecake filling

ingredients.name: C & H Pure Granulated White Cane Sugar, 4 lb
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup white sugar, for cheesecake filling

ingredients.name: Great Value Baking Unsweetened Cocoa Powder, 8 oz
ingredients.description: 1/3 cup cocoa powder, for cheesecake filling

ingredients.name: Great Value Cherry Pie Filling or Topping, 21 oz
ingredients.description: 21 oz cherry pie filling, (1 can), for cheesecake filling

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a bowl, thoroughly mix graham cracker crumbs, brown sugar, salt, and butter. Press evenly into a springform pan. Chill.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a medium bowl, place cream cheese and beat with hand beaters until smooth. Gently pour in cream, adding gradually while stirring, until it’s fully incorporated.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add sugar, vanilla, and salt, then beat until very smooth. Don't forget to scrape the sides. Gradually add cocoa powder into the smooth cream-cheese mixture and beat on medium speed until it’s fully incorporated.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Pour onto chilled crust and smooth out the top. Freeze for 3 hours or refrigerate overnight. Before serving, pour pie filling over the cheesecake.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

ingredients.name: Pillsbury Grands! Southern Homestyle Buttermilk Biscuit Dough, 8 ct., 16.3 oz.
Great Value Sugar Cannister 20oz
GV All Purpose Flour 2LB Bag
Great Value Kosher Ground Cinnamon, 2.5 Oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
Fresh Blueberries, 11 oz or 1 Pint
Fresh Strawberries, 8.8 oz
Fresh Blackberries, 12 oz
Great Value Frozen Whole Red Raspberries, 12 oz
Argo Cornstarch 100% Cornstarch Gluten free
Little Debbie Fudge Rounds Ice Cream, Fudge Crme with Fudgy Chocolatey Cookie, Pint

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Cut biscuits into small even pieces (about 9 per biscuit) and place in a bowl. Sprinkle sugar, flour, cinnamon, and salt over the dough bites. Mix well.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: On the grill, using a disposable foil pan or grill proof pan, combine blueberries, strawberries, blackberries, raspberries, sugar, and cornstarch. Stir well and let cook until fruit starts to release its juices.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Cover fruit with the cinnamon sugar-coated biscuit dough in as even a layer as possible.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Cover pan tightly with foil and close the grill. Keeping the temperature at 350°F (175°C) grill for 20 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Take the foil off pan and close grill again for 10 more minutes, or until dough is cooked through and golden brown. (Times and temperatures may vary based on grill).

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Remove from the grill & serve with a scoop of ice cream.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

27e9a75008c89e3a3551e612ebf0f9d5.title: Vegan chocolate cupcakes with chocolate frosting
27e9a75008c89e3a3551e612ebf0f9d5.description: Vegan chocolate cupcakes with chocolate frosting

ingredients.name: C&H Premium Pure Cane Granulated Sugar, 1 lb Box
ingredients.description: 1 cup organic granulated sugar, for cupcakes

ingredients.name: BetterBody Foods Refined Organic Coconut Oil, 28.0 fl oz Jar
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup refined coconut oil, solid, for cupcakes

ingredients.name: Great Value Baking Unsweetened Cocoa Powder, 8 oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup unsweetened cocoa powder, for cupcakes,1/2 cup unsweetened cocoa powder, for frosting

ingredients.name: Great Value All-Purpose Flour, 5LB Bag
Great Value Baking Soda, 16 oz
Great Value Double Acting Baking Powder, 8.1 oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
Great Value Pure Vanilla Extract, 1 fl oz
ingredients.description: 2 teaspoons vanilla extract, for cupcakes,1 teaspoon vanilla extract, for frosting

ingredients.name: Great Value Original Unsweetened Almond Milk, Half Gallon, 64 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1 cup unsweetened almond milk, for cupcakes

ingredients.name: Great Value Celebration Multi-Color Special Occasion Spiral Birthday Candles, (4.44") 24 Pieces
ingredients.description: red, white, and blue sparkler birthday candle, optional, for cupcakes

ingredients.name: Miyoko's Creamery European Style Cultured Vegan Butter, 8 oz
ingredients.description: 1 cup vegan butter, 2 sticks, for frosting

ingredients.name: Great Value Confectioners Powdered Sugar, 32 oz
ingredients.description: 2 cups organic powdered sugar, for frosting

ingredients.name: Great Value Natural Rainbow Sprinkles, 2.5 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Grease a 12-cup muffin tin or line with paper liners.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, cream together the sugar and coconut oil with an electric hand mixer until smooth.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Sift in the cocoa powder, then add the flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, vanilla, and almond milk, and stir with a rubber spatula until well combined. Fold in the chocolate chips.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Use an ice cream scoop to fill each muffin cup about ¾ of the way.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Bake for 20- 25 minutes, until a toothpick inserted in the center of a cupcake comes out clean

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Make the frosting: In a large bowl, cream the vegan butter with an electric hand mixer until smooth.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Sift in half the powdered sugar and continue to beat. Sift in the rest of the powdered sugar and beat again.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Sift in the cocoa powder and vanilla and beat until smooth

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Use a butter knife to spread the frosting onto the cupcakes, creating a flat top with smooth sides.

tasks.title: Step 11
tasks.instruction: Place the sprinkles in a shallow dish. Roll the edges of the cupcakes in the sprinkles.

tasks.title: Step 12
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

ac531fab1cdc27fdb54fdc16999cd861.title: Apple spice loaf cake with cream cheese frosting
ac531fab1cdc27fdb54fdc16999cd861.description: In this fabulous, make-far-ahead recipe, apples are folded into a traditional loaf cake batter and swirled together with warming fall spices. The cake is baked and can be cooled, tightly wrapped and frozen as an easy option that will keep for weeks ahead of Thanksgiving or whenever you need it (hello, hostess gifts!). The frosting can also be made in advance and stored in the fridge for up to 14 days.

ingredients.name: GV All Purpose Flour 2LB Bag
Great Value Baking Soda, 16 oz
Great Value Double Acting Baking Powder, 8.1 oz
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
ingredients.description: 1 1/2 teaspoons kosher salt for cake,1/4 teaspoon kosher salt for frosting

ingredients.name: Great Value Kosher Ground Cinnamon, 2.5 Oz
ingredients.description: 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon for cake,1 teaspoon ground cinnamon for frosting

ingredients.name: Great Value Ground Nutmeg, 1.5 oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg for cake

ingredients.name: Great Value Organic Ground Ginger, 1.6 oz
C&H Premium Pure Cane Granulated Sugar, 1 lb Box
Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count
ingredients.description: 2 large eggs, room temperature for cake

ingredients.name: Crisco Pure Vegetable Oil, 16 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup olive, grapeseed, canola or vegetable oil for cake

ingredients.name: Great Value Greek Plain Nonfat Yogurt, 5.3 oz
Great Value Pure Vanilla Extract, 1 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon pure vanilla extract for cake,2 teaspoons pure vanilla extract for frosting

ingredients.name: Granny Smith Apples, Each
ingredients.description: 1 1/2 cups Granny Smith apples, peeled, cored and shredded for cake

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 6 tablespoons unsalted butter for cake,1 stick unsalted butter, room temperature for frosting

ingredients.name: Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
Great Value Cream Cheese, 8 oz
ingredients.description: 1 (8-ounce) package cream cheese, room temperature for frosting

ingredients.name: Great Value Confectioners Powdered Sugar, 32 oz
Great Value 2% Reduced Fat Milk, Half Gallon, 64 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1 to 2 tablespoons milk, plus more as needed for frosting

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 F. Spray a loaf pan with cooking spray or grease it with butter.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Whisk together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, cinnamon and nutmeg in a medium bowl.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In a separate medium bowl, whisk together the sugar, eggs, oil, yogurt and vanilla extract.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add the apples to the wet ingredients and fold to combine with a rubber spatula. Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients and gently fold everything together until just combined. Scrape the batter into the prepared pan and bake for 40 to 50 minutes until a toothpick inserted into the center of the loaf comes out clean (the loaf will spring back if you press a fingertip down on the top and the loaf pulls away slightly from the sides of the pan). Cool in the pan for 30 minutes to 1 hour before unmolding.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with a whisk attachment or in a medium bowl with a hand mixer, whisk together cream cheese and butter at a medium speed until light and fluffy, about 3 to 4 minutes. Whip in vanilla extract, cinnamon, confectioners' sugar, salt  and milk in a medium bowl until combined. If the mixture is too thick, add more milk, 1 teaspoon at a time until desired consistency is reached.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Remove the cooled cake from the pan. Slice into 1-inch thick pieces. In a medium skillet over medium heat, working in batches, melt 1 tablespoon butter. Once bubbling, add a slice of apple loaf and toast 1-2 minutes per side until golden. Sprinkle with flaky salt and spread with frosting. Repeat with remaining slices and enjoy!

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Alternatively, wait for the cake to cool, wrap it tightly in plastic and then foil and freeze until ready to serve. The frosting can be made and stored in the fridge for up to 14 days. To thaw, remove the cake from the freezer and transfer it to the fridge for 8 hours. Remove frosting from the fridge, bring to room temperature, and re-whip to improve the texture. Toast the slices in butter, top with salt, spread with cream cheese frosting and enjoy!

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, softened, plus more for greasing

ingredients.name: Great Value Light Brown Sugar, 32 oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup light brown sugar, lightly packed

ingredients.name: Great Value Pure Vanilla Extract, 1 fl oz
Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count
Great Value All-Purpose Flour, 5LB Bag
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
Great Value Semi-Sweet Chocolate Baking Chips, 12 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Grease a large (at least 8-inch (20 cm) diameter) microwave-safe plate with butter.

tasks.title: Step 2
