tasks.instruction: In a medium bowl, use a whisk or fork to stir together the butter, sugar. Add vanilla extract.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add the egg and stir to combine.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add the flour and salt and stir until just incorporated

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Fold in 5 tablespoons of the chocolate chips.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Scoop the dough into a mound at the center of the prepared plate. Lightly press the remaining chocolate chips into the top of the dough.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Microwave until the cookie is dry on top and springs back when lightly pressed in the center, about 1½ minutes. Let sit for a few minutes to cool.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

7e80cbf360a2593a018f6946df9832d1.title: Cherry clafoutis
7e80cbf360a2593a018f6946df9832d1.description: This Cherry Clafoutis is a delightful and classic dessert that is perfect for any occasion. The custardy and slightly sweet base is studded with juicy and tangy cherries, making for a perfectly balanced and delicious treat.

ingredients.name: Fresh Red Cherries, 2.25 lb Bag
GV All Purpose Flour 2LB Bag
Great Value Sugar Cannister 20oz
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count
Great Value Fat Free Half and Half, 32 fl oz
Great Value Pure Vanilla Extract, 1 fl oz
Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
Great Value Confectioners Powdered Sugar, 32 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Pit the cherries by placing them on top of an empty glass bottle, one at a time. Using a chopstick, push through the cherry to remove the pit. Set aside.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In a medium bowl, mix together the flour, sugar, and salt. Add the eggs and stir well to combine. Add the half-and-half and vanilla and whisk until smooth.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Melt the butter in an 8-inch (20 cm) cast-iron skillet over medium heat. Once the butter has melted, remove the pan from the heat.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Spread the cherries evenly in the pan. Pour the batter over the cherries.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Bake for 40-45 minutes, until the clafoutis is golden brown and firm to the touch.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Dust the powdered sugar on top.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

6bc85779c1aeef9cbffa83b0ba49eddd.title: Frozen margarita pie
6bc85779c1aeef9cbffa83b0ba49eddd.description: Whether your summer holiday is just kicking off or you are well into the dog days of the season, a frozen dessert is always a welcome treat. This Frozen Margarita Pie is much like a Key lime pie, which is usually baked and includes eggs or egg yolks. This recipe uses sour cream, heavy cream and condensed milk to mimic the rich, velvety texture of key lime pie (sour cream and condensed milk add creaminess, while whipped cream adds lightness).

ingredients.name: Great Value Honey Graham Crackers, 14.4 oz
C&H Premium Pure Cane Granulated Sugar, 1 lb Box
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
ingredients.description: 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt, for crust,1/4 teaspoon kosher salt, for filling

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 4 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted, for crust

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweetened Condensed Milk 14 oz.
ingredients.description: 1 (14-ounce) can sweetened condensed milk, for filling

ingredients.name: Limes, Each
ingredients.description: 2 tablespoons grated lime zest (plus 1/2 cup fresh juice), for filling,lime zest, for garnish, for filling

ingredients.name: Great Value Heavy Whipping Cream, 16 Oz
Great Value All Natural Sour Cream, 8 oz Tub
Morton Sea Salt, Fine, 4.4 Ounce
ingredients.description: flaky sea salt, for garnish, for filling

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Pulse graham crackers in the bowl of a food processor until finely ground. Add sugar, salt and butter and pulse until combined and evenly moistened. Press evenly over the bottom and up the sides of a 9-inch pie plate. Freeze until firm, about 15 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a medium bowl, whisk together condensed milk, lime zest and juice and salt until smooth. In another bowl, whisk heavy cream until soft peaks form. Add sour cream and whisk just to combine (mixture should still hold soft peaks). Gently fold into condensed milk mixture just until no white streaks remain.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Transfer to the chilled crust and spread into an even layer. Freeze until firm and fully set, at least 8 hours or overnight.3.To serve, sprinkle edges of pie with flaky salt and more lime zest, then slice and serve.

685281a739e21af905af4b6168d6cbd6.title: Snickerdoodle blondies
685281a739e21af905af4b6168d6cbd6.description: This dessert  takes all the cinnamon-y goodness of snickerdoodle and turns it into bar form. Brown butter lends nutty richness to the blondie batter while brown sugar provides soft texture and molasses-like sweetness. Meanwhile,  the combo of cream of tartar and baking soda gives the blondies lift and a touch of tangy flavor that’s signature in snickerdoodles.

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 8 tablespoons unsalted butter, cut in half

ingredients.name: C&H Premium Pure Cane Granulated Sugar, 1 lb Box
Great Value Kosher Ground Cinnamon, 2.5 Oz
Great Value Light Brown Sugar, 32 oz
Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count
GV All Purpose Flour 2LB Bag
McCormick Cream Of Tartar, 1.5 oz
Great Value Baking Soda, 16 oz
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Arrange a rack in the middle of the oven and heat the oven to 350 F.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Melt the butter in a small saucepan over medium heat. Once melted, continue to cook, stirring occasionally and scraping up any browned bits from the bottom of the pot with a wooden spoon or rubber spatula, until the foam subsides and butter just turns toasty brown and has a nutty aroma, 2 to 3 minutes. Immediately transfer the brown butter to a large heatproof bowl and cool for 5 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Meanwhile, line an 8-by-8-inch baking dish with parchment paper, leaving a 2-inch overhang on two opposite sides like a sling.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: In a small bowl, combine the granulated sugar and 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Add the brown sugar and egg to the bowl of brown butter and stir until combined and smooth. Add the flour, the remaining 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt and mix until just combined.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Transfer the batter to the prepared baking pan and press and spread it into an even layer. Sprinkle the cinnamon sugar evenly over the top. Bake until the edges are firm and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out mostly clean with just a few crumbs, 16 to 20 minutes. Let cool in the pan on a wire rack for at least 20 minutes then use the parchment sling to lift the blondie slab out of the pan and onto a cutting board. Cut into 16 squares.

28c9a5ead3cccc1b061a669873661e1b.title: Tahini scotcheroos
28c9a5ead3cccc1b061a669873661e1b.description: Scotcharoos are a beloved no-bake treat hailing from the Midwest. A layer of crispy puffed rice cereal gets coated in a nutty mixture of melted butterscotch chips and peanut butter, pressed into a baking pan and coated in a layer of glossy chocolate ganache. The bars harden into a fuss-free treat that makes a guaranteed hit at any potluck or party. Put a tray of scotcharoos out at any event and watch as they instantly disappear.

ingredients.name: Great Value Canola Oil Non-Stick Cooking Spray, 8 oz
Malt-O-Meal Crispy Rice Cereal, Gluten Free Breakfast Cereal, 36 oz Resealable Cereal Bag
Great Value Light Corn Syrup, 16 fl oz
Great Value Light Brown Sugar, 32 oz
Great Value Pure Vanilla Extract, 1 fl oz
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
KRINOS TAHINI MIX, 16 OZ
Great Value Butterscotch Baking Chips, 11 oz
Great Value Semi-Sweet Chocolate Baking Chips, 12 oz
ingredients.description: 1 cup semisweet or bittersweet chocolate chips

ingredients.name: Great Value Whole Vitamin D Milk, Half Gallon, 64 fl oz
Great Value Organic White Sesame Seed, 2.2 oz
ingredients.description: white and black sesame seeds, for sprinkling

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Spray a 9-by-13-inch metal or glass baking pan with nonstick spray. Line the bottom with a long strip of parchment paper that hangs over the two long sides to create a sling and lightly spray the paper with nonstick spray.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Place the puffed rice cereal into a large, heatproof mixing bowl and set aside.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In a medium saucepan set over medium heat, combine the corn syrup, brown sugar, vanilla extract and salt, stirring often, until the brown sugar is completely dissolved and the mixture has come to a full, rapid boil, 5 to 7 minutes. Remove the pot from the heat and stir in the tahini until smooth. (If your tahini has separated, pour it into a large mixing bowl and vigorously mix until it is emulsified before adding it to the sugar mixture.) Place the pot back on the stove and cook, stirring constantly to prevent burning, just until the mixture comes to a simmer, 1 1/2 to 2 minutes. Immediately pour the mixture into the bowl of puffed rice cereal and use a spatula to evenly coat the cereal. Pour the cereal into the prepared baking pan and gently press it into an even layer using the back of the spatula so it covers the entire bottom of the pan. (Don’t smash the cereal.) Set aside.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: In a medium microwave-safe bowl, combine the butterscotch baking chips, chocolate chips and milk. Microwave on high power in 20-second bursts, stirring between each, until the chocolate is completely melted and the mixture is smooth, 40 to 60 seconds. Pour the chocolate over the top of the cereal bars and smooth into an even layer. Sprinkle the top with the sesame seeds and let set at room temperature for at least 2 hours before slicing.

ingredients.name: Lucky Leaf Premium Strawberry Rhubarb Fruit Filling and Topping, 21 oz Can
Fresh Strawberries, 1 lb
Great Value Sugar Cannister 20oz
Argo Cornstarch 100% Cornstarch Gluten free
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
Jiffy Pie Crust Mix, 9.0 OZ
Great Value Heavy Whipping Cream, 16 Oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, toss the strawberries and rhubarb with the sugar, salt, and cornstarch. Set to the side.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Line a pie tin with the pie dough.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Empty rhubarb and strawberry mixture into the pie tin, evenly distributing the mixture.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Cut pie dough into strips and weave a lattice design on top of the pie. (You can also top with more pie dough in a full sheet with slits.)

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Bake the pie until the filling is bubbling and the crust is golden brown, about 2 hours. Cover the edge of the pie with foil if it begins to darken.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Let cool slightly before serving.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

4d247c6c8fbc5bad8be90cf8614ba9e8.title: Homemade caramel popcorn
4d247c6c8fbc5bad8be90cf8614ba9e8.description: Make some sweet caramel popcorn for a movie night with family and friends! You won’t believe how simple it is to customize homemade popcorn and enjoy new flavors that satisfy your sweet tooth. It’s simple and only uses natural ingredients. This highly addictive treat will be gone faster than you think!

ingredients.name: AMC Theatres Microwave Popcorn 6ct, Lightly Salted
Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon
Great Value Light Brown Sugar, 32 oz
Great Value Pure Vanilla Extract, 1 fl oz
Great Value Heavy Whipping Cream, 16 Oz
Great Value Baking Soda, 16 oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Make microwave popcorn according to the package instructions. About 2 minutes on high.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a medium saucepan, heat the water and sugar together, tilt the pan to dissolve all the sugar if necessary.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Once it reaches a boil, cook until the bigger bubbles start to get smaller and the mixture gets thicker, about 5 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: While the syrup is simmering, mix together the heavy cream, vanilla extract, and baking soda.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: When the syrup reaches a light amber color, have a metal whisk ready in your hand. Once the color starts to turn into a darker amber color, add in the cream mixture and start to whisk vigorously until glossy and smooth. Be very careful of the splashing syrup and the steam.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: On a parchment paper lined tray, evenly spread out the popcorn. Drizzle the caramel mixture over the popcorn. Gently fold the popcorn with the mixture using a spatula, until all pieces are covered. Sprinkle some salt over the popcorn.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Let the popcorn cool to room temperature and serve.

bbc480faaa3f28201055280a6a0c9ddd.title: Fudgy brownie cookies
bbc480faaa3f28201055280a6a0c9ddd.description: These chocolate cookies have all the qualities of richly decadent brownies but in cookie form. With three types of chocolate (melted bittersweet, cocoa powder and chocolate chips), they’re delightfully fudgy in the middle with slightly crisp edges. They have glossy, crinkly tops — the hallmark of a good brownie (or brownie cookie!). And importantly, they stay thick and chewy as they bake, making them unmistakably brownie-like on first bite.

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
Great Value Dark Chocolate Bar, 3.52 oz
ingredients.description: 4 ounces bittersweet or semisweet chocolate, coarsely chopped or broken into pieces with your hands

ingredients.name: DeLallo, Gluten Free, Non-GMO, Instant Espresso Powder for Baking & Drinks, 100% Instant Coffee, Naturally Caffeinated, 1.94 oz Jar
C&H Premium Pure Cane Granulated Sugar, 1 lb Box
Great Value Light Brown Sugar, 32 oz
Great Value Pure Vanilla Extract, 1 fl oz
Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count
Bob Evans Cage Free Liquid Egg Whites, 32 oz, Pack of 1
GHIRARDELLI Premium Baking Cocoa 100% Cocoa Dutch Process Unsweetened Cocoa Powder - 8 oz.
GV All Purpose Flour 2LB Bag
Great Value Double Acting Baking Powder, 8.1 oz
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
Great Value Semi-Sweet Chocolate Baking Chips, 12 oz
Morton Sea Salt, Fine, 4.4 Ounce

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Place racks in upper and lower thirds of oven and preheat to 350 F.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a small saucepan set over low heat, melt the butter, chocolate and espresso powder (if using) together. Alternatively, combine them in a heat-proof bowl and microwave in two 30-second intervals, stirring between each, then shorter intervals until just melted. Stir and set aside.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the whisk attachment, combine sugars, vanilla, eggs, and egg white. Mix on low speed until moistened, then increase speed to high and beat until thick, fluffy and lighter in color, about 7 minutes (could be longer if using a hand mixer).

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Meanwhile, in a bowl, whisk together cocoa powder, flour, baking powder and salt.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Reduce speed and pour the still-warm chocolate-butter mixture into the sugar and egg mixture. Slowly add the flour mixture and continue mixing until no streaks of flour remain, scraping down the bowl as needed. Add the chips and mix until just incorporated.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Use a cookie scoop to drop dough into heaping 2 tablespoon-sized portions on parchment-lined baking sheets, spacing at least 2 inches apart. Bake for 9 to 11 minutes, rotating sheets from top to bottom and front to back halfway through. The tops should be crinkled, edges firm and middles set but still a little soft.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Top each cookie with a little flaky salt (if using). Let cookies cool for a few minutes on the baking sheets, then carefully transfer them to a wire rack to cool more. Store cookies in an airtight container for 3 to 5 days at room temperature.

d9d80930c746f6ded46cbe3196586185.title: Mixed berry galette
d9d80930c746f6ded46cbe3196586185.description: Our Mixed Berry Galette is a sweet and summery way to end your night. This rustic and easy dessert is perfect for a 4th of July BBQ or any summer party. All you need are a few fresh berries and some basic baking staples like sugar and a frozen pie crust, and you can have this beautiful galette assembled for baking in just a few short minutes.

ingredients.name: Fresh Blueberries, 11 oz or 1 Pint
Fresh Strawberries, 8.8 oz
Fresh Raspberries, 6 oz
C&H Premium Pure Cane Granulated Sugar, 1 lb Box
Argo Cornstarch 100% Cornstarch Gluten free
Florida's Natural Orange Juice With Pulp 52 oz
Pillsbury Premade Refrigerated Pie Crusts, 2 Count
Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count
Great Value 2% Reduced Fat Milk, Half Gallon, 64 fl oz
Great Value White Sparkling Sugar, 3.5 oz.
Great Value Heavy Whipping Cream, 16 Oz
ingredients.description: Vanilla Ice Cream or whipped cream (optional)

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, mix together the berries, sugar, cornstarch, and orange juice. Cover and set aside for 10-15 minutes to let the moisture come out of the berries. This will ensure some of the juices from the berries come out so they won’t leak into your pie dough.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Line a large rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Take the pie crust and dust with a little bit of flour. Using a rolling pin, roll out the dough into a 12x12 inch circle and place on parchment paper.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Using a slotted spoon, transfer berries to the center of the pie crust. The slotted spoon will help to leave the excess liquid behind. Make sure to leave room around the edges about a 2-3 inch border so you can fold later.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: You can then gently fold the 2-3 inch border over the fruit. Overlap the border to make a pleated look. If there are any cracks, gently push them together.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: In a small bowl add 1 egg and 1 tablespoon of milk or water and whisk until combined. Brush the mixture on the top of the borders or the pastry. Then sprinkle it with coarse sugar.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Bake the galette until browned, about 25-30 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Remove from the oven and cool on the baking sheet for 5-10 minutes to ensure the juices solidify a little. If you cut into it right away the juices will run out before slicing and serving. Optionally serve with vanilla ice cream or whipped cream.

ccbb9c96d8aabe4ede33888c30fe5769.title: Easy chocolate mousse
ccbb9c96d8aabe4ede33888c30fe5769.description: This easy chocolate mousse is ready in 25 minutes and made without eggs. It's lighter but still has all the intense chocolatey flavor of a traditional mousse. Chocolate mousse is perfect for a dinner party served in individual dessert bowls with a dollop of whipped cream and some fresh berries.

ingredients.name: Great Value Dark Chocolate Baking Chips, 10 oz
Great Value Heavy Whipping Cream, 16 Oz
ingredients.description: 1 cup Heavy Cream, plus more whipped for garnish

ingredients.name: Great Value Confectioners Powdered Sugar, 32 oz
Great Value Iodized Salt, 26 oz
Great Value Dark Chocolate Bar, 3.52 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a heatproof bowl, heat the chocolate chips in the microwave in 30 seconds intervals, stirring well with a spatula between each, until the chocolate is fully melted.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add powdered sugar and salt into the chocolate and stir to combine.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Whip the cream to medium peak, fold a quarter of the whipped cream into the melted chocolate mixture to loosen up. Then carefully fold in the rest in 2 batches, try not to deflate the mixture too much.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Transfer the mixture into dessert cups and chill for 2 hours or until set.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Top with more whipped cream and shaved chocolate (optional) before serving.

ingredients.name: Great Value Homestyle Vanilla Flavored Ice Cream, 48 fl oz
Great Value Classic Chocolate Chip Cookies, Family Size, 18.2 oz
Great Value Rainbow Sprinkles, 9 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Using a serrated knife, cut the pint of ice cream crosswise into 3 equal discs.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Lay out 3 chocolate cookies and place a pint slice on top of each. Place another chocolate cookie on top of each sandwich. Remove the ice cream packaging.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Freeze for 30 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Pour the sprinkles into a shallow dish.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Remove the ice cream sandwiches from the freezer and roll the sides in the sprinkles, completely covering the ice cream.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Freeze for 30 minutes more before serving.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

0b91a96eaed1dfa420783b270b28a2ec.title: Strawberry cheesecake poke cake
0b91a96eaed1dfa420783b270b28a2ec.description: If you’re stuck in a dessert rut, poke cake is just the recipe you need to try. It’s low-maintenance to bake, and it’s always a crowd pleaser. Poke holes using the back of a wooden spoon into a simple vanilla cake base, then cover the cake with a mixture of strawberries, cream cheese, and condensed milk. Once the cake is done chilling, it’ll be filled with pockets of sweet berry deliciousness.

ingredients.name: Great Value Canola Oil Non-Stick Cooking Spray, 8 oz
Great Value Honey Graham Crackers, 14.4 oz
Duncan Hines Signature Perfectly Moist French Vanilla Cake Mix, 15.25 Oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 box vanilla cake mix,prepared according to package

ingredients.name: Fresh Strawberries, 8.8 oz
ingredients.description: 1 lb strawberry, with tops removed,strawberry, for garnish

ingredients.name: Great Value Cream Cheese, 8 oz
Great Value Sweetened Condensed Milk 14 oz.
Great Value 2% Reduced Fat Milk, Half Gallon, 64 fl oz
Great Value Heavy Whipping Cream, 16 Oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Spray a 9x9-inch (23x23 cm) baking pan with cooking spray.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Take 5 of the graham crackers and arrange them in the pan, breaking some of them to fill in the gaps.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Crush the remaining graham cracker and set aside.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Pour the vanilla cake batter on the graham cracker base.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Bake for 25-30 minutes until an inserted toothpick comes out clean.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Using the back of a wooden spoon, poke 4 rows of 4 holes in the cake, making 16 holes total.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, mash strawberries with a whisk until very fine.

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Add cream cheese and condensed milk, whisking until there are no large lumps.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Add the milk, stirring until smooth.

tasks.title: Step 11
tasks.instruction: Pour the mixture over the cake and set until the cake has absorbed as much of the mixture as it can. Some of the mixture will still stay on top, which is okay.

tasks.title: Step 12
tasks.instruction: Spread the whipped topping evenly on top.

tasks.title: Step 13
tasks.instruction: Chill the cake anywhere from 3 hours to overnight.

tasks.title: Step 14
tasks.instruction: Slice, and serve with strawberries and the reserved graham cracker crumbs.

tasks.title: Step 15
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

ingredients.name: Great Value Twist & Shout Chocolate Sandwich Cookies, 14.3 oz
Great Value Cream Cheese, 8 oz
Great Value White Chocolate Baking Bar, 4oz Box

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a food processor, finely crush the cookies, reserving about 2 tablespoons of the mixture for sprinkling on top of the truffles.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, combine the cookie crumbs and cream cheese, stirring until evenly mixed. Chill the mixture for about an hour or until it can be rolled into a ball and hold its shape.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Divide and roll the mixture into golf ball-sized balls. Dip the truffles in the melted white chocolate and place on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Sprinkle the reserved cookie crumbs on top of the truffles before the chocolate hardens.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

528cf7f6c3447baca896eabd622bf0e8.title: Mexican chocolate icebox cake
528cf7f6c3447baca896eabd622bf0e8.description: Icebox cakes are as foolproof as they are impressive — they take virtually zero skill (no, seriously) and the end result is fluffy, layered and truly magical. This version uses graham crackers for the structural layers, which soften with time and become spongy and cake-like. Mexican chocolate is known for its cinnamon-forward flavor.

ingredients.name: Great Value Heavy Whipping Cream, 16 Oz
Great Value Whipped Cream Cheese Spread, 12 oz
Great Value Baking Unsweetened Cocoa Powder, 8 oz
C&H Premium Pure Cane Granulated Sugar, 1 lb Box
Great Value Pure Vanilla Extract, 1 fl oz
Great Value Kosher Ground Cinnamon, 2.5 Oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon, plus more for garnish

ingredients.name: Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
Lawry's Casero Cayenne Pepper, 1.62 oz
Great Value Cinnamon Graham Crackers, 14.4 oz
Great Value Semi-Sweet Chocolate Baking Chips, 12 oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a large bowl, combine heavy cream, cream cheese, cocoa powder, sugar, vanilla, cinnamon, salt and, if using, cayenne pepper. Using an electric hand mixer, whisk on medium-low speed just until soft peaks form, 2 to 3 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Arrange an even layer of graham crackers on the bottom of a 2-quart square baking dish. Break them to fit as needed. Spread one-third of the chocolate whipped cream on top, smoothing with an offset spatula. Scatter 1/3 cup chocolate chips on top. Repeat two more times with another layer of cream, followed by chocolate chips , using all of the whipped cream and chocolate chips; there will likely be extra graham crackers.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Cover the dish tightly with plastic wrap and refrigerate overnight.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: When ready to serve, dust the top of the cake with cinnamon. Slice and serve cold.

c3dc423d4b343edc46488cde42292970.title: No-bake lemon icebox pie
c3dc423d4b343edc46488cde42292970.description: This lemon icebox pie is a winner not only because she is delicious to eat and gorgeous to behold, but also because she is an easy no-bake dessert. The pie can be served frozen or just chilled from the refrigerator, but it will slice best if frozen. The soft and billowy whipped cream atop the pie is a wonderful textural contrast to the firm, tart filling, but you can also serve this pie naked, with just a dollop of cream on each slice, if you so desire.

ingredients.name: Keebler Sandies Classic Shortbread Cookies, 11.2 oz
ingredients.description: 2 cups (9 ounces) finely ground shortbread cookies, such as Lorna Doones, for shortbread crust

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 6 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted, for shortbread crust

ingredients.name: Great Value Organic Granulated Cane Sugar, 2 Lb
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup granulated sugar, for shortbread crust,1/4 cup confectioners’ sugar, for whipped cream topping

ingredients.name: Great Value Cream Cheese, 8 oz
ingredients.description: 1 (8-ounce) block full-fat cream cheese, room temperature, for lemon filling

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweetened Condensed Milk 14 oz.
ingredients.description: 1 (14-ounce) can sweetened condensed milk, for lemon filling

ingredients.name: Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
ingredients.description: 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt, for lemon filling

ingredients.name: Concord Foods Lemon Juice, 4.5 oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup freshly squeezed lemon juice, for lemon filling

ingredients.name: Watkins Pure Lemon Extract, 2 oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 teaspoon lemon extract, optional, for lemon filling

ingredients.name: Wilton Lemon Yellow Gel Food Coloring, 1 oz.
ingredients.description: a few drops of yellow food coloring, optional, for lemon filling

ingredients.name: Great Value Heavy Whipping Cream, 16 Oz
ingredients.description: 2 cups heavy cream, for whipped cream topping

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: 1.Grease a 9-inch pie plate with cooking spray.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: 2.In a large mixing bowl, combine the finely ground cookies, melted butter and sugar with a flexible spatula or your hands. Transfer the mixture to the prepared pie plate and press it onto the bottom and up the sides of the plate using a 1-cup measuring cup or your fingers. Place in the freezer while you assemble the filling.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: 3.In a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment, beat the cream cheese on medium speed until smooth, about a minute. Do not overmix. Add the sweetened condensed milk, salt, lemon juice, lemon extract and food coloring, if using, and beat just until combined.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: 4.Pour the filling into the chilled crust and smooth the top with an offset spatula or butter knife. Place in the freezer for 4 to 6 hours or overnight. The longer the pie chills, the firmer the slices will be when you go to cut them.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: 5.When ready to serve the pie, remove the pie from the freezer and let sit on the counter for about 10 or 15 minutes. Whip the cream and confectioners’ sugar together in a stand mixer fitted with the whisk attachment on medium to medium-high speed until soft to medium peaks form.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: 6.Spread the whipped cream decoratively over the pudding. Wet a dish towel under hot water and ring out. Rub the dish towel over the bottom and sides of the outside of the pie plate before slicing and serving.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: 7.The pie is best eaten the day it is made, but will keep for two days in the refrigerator if lightly wrapped in plastic wrap.

ingredients.name: Great Value Canola Oil Non-Stick Cooking Spray, 8 oz
Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
Great Value Mini Marshmallows, 10 oz
Great Value Honey Graham Crackers, 14.4 oz
ingredients.description: 4 cups graham cracker cereal, such as Golden Grahams

ingredients.name: Great Value Marshmallows, 10 oz
Wilton No-Taste Red Gel Food Coloring, 1 oz.
Wilton Sky Blue Gel Food Coloring, 1 oz.
Great Value Milk Chocolate Baking Chips, 11.5 oz
Great Value Patriotic Sprinkles Mix, 2.46 oz
ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon red, white, and blue mixed sprinkles, preferably star-shaped

ingredients.name: Great Value Celebration Multi-Color Special Occasion Spiral Birthday Candles, (4.44") 24 Pieces
ingredients.description: red, white, and blue sparkler birthday candle, optional

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Spray a 12-cup muffin tin with nonstick spray.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a large pot, melt the butter over medium heat.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add the marshmallows, and stir with a silicone spoon until completely melted.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Add the graham cereal, and stir until evenly coated.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Decrease the heat to low and leave the pot on the burner to keep the mixture warm.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Using a 2-ounce ice cream scoop, transfer one scoop of the cereal mixture to a muffin cup. Let stand for 20 seconds to cool enough to handle, then use your fingers to press the ball into the bottom and up the side to mold it to the shape of the cup.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Repeat with the remaining cereal mixture, working with one scoop at a time, then let all the cereal cups cool to room temperature. You will have about 2 scoops-worth of cereal mixture leftover. Discard or save for another use.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Divide the marshmallow fluff evenly among 3 small bowls. Stir 1 teaspoon of water into each bowl of fluff. Stir the red food coloring into one bowl, and stir the blue food coloring into a second bowl. The third bowl will be plain white

tasks.title: Step 9
tasks.instruction: Transfer each bowl of fluff to a small piping bag or plastic zip-top bag.

tasks.title: Step 10
tasks.instruction: Cut the bottoms or corners off each bag and fill 4 cereal cups with each color.

tasks.title: Step 11
tasks.instruction: Place the chocolate chips in a heatproof bowl and microwave until melted. Transfer the melted chocolate to a small piping bag or plastic zip-top bag.

tasks.title: Step 12
tasks.instruction: Cut the bottom or corner off the bag and drizzle the chocolate in a zigzag pattern over the top of each cup.

tasks.title: Step 13
tasks.instruction: Scatter the sprinkles evenly over each cup then refrigerate the cups to set the fluff filling, at least 30 minutes or up to 1 day.

tasks.title: Step 14
tasks.instruction: Stand a sparkler candle in the center of each cup, if you like, and light on fire just before serving.

tasks.title: Step 15
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

04fec3ef81e9115593cc8c193e83076b.title: Double chocolate cherry brownies
04fec3ef81e9115593cc8c193e83076b.description: This easy four-ingredient double chocolate cherry brownie recipe will take your brownies up a notch. With just 5 minutes of prep time, you will have the most delicious brownies that will satisfy your sweet tooth and leave you wanting more!

ingredients.name: Great Value Semi-Sweet Chocolate Baking Chips, 12 oz
Duncan Hines Chewy Chocolate Fudge Brownie Mix, 18.3 oz
Great Value Cherry Pie Filling or Topping, 21 oz
Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C) and grease a 9-inch square baking dish with baking spray.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a large mixing bowl, combine the Chocolate Fudge Brownie Mix (1 box) , Cherry Pie Filling (1 can) , Large Eggs (2) , and Semi-Sweet Chocolate Chips (1/2 cup) and stir until well combined.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Pour the batter into the prepared baking dish and sprinkle with the remaining Semi-Sweet Chocolate Chips (1/2 cup) .

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Bake the brownies in the preheated oven for 40-50 minutes until a toothpick comes out clean.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Allow the brownies to cool for at least 30 minutes before slicing and serving.

bf6067a52f24f14d2ee6025f7271261d.title: Carrot cake cheesecake bars
bf6067a52f24f14d2ee6025f7271261d.description: Why choose just one dessert when you can have two? That’s the idea behind these easy carrot cake cheesecake bars. To start, make the carrot-packed spice cake, which is made with butter instead of oil. The butter pumps up the flavor of the cake and gives it a slightly firmer texture that pairs nicely with the cheesecake layer.

ingredients.name: GV All Purpose Flour 2LB Bag
ingredients.description: 1 cup all-purpose flour, for carrot cake

ingredients.name: Great Value Double Acting Baking Powder, 8.1 oz
ingredients.description: 1 teaspoon baking powder, for carrot cake

ingredients.name: Great Value Kosher Ground Cinnamon, 2.5 Oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon, for carrot cake

ingredients.name: Fresh Ginger Root, Each
ingredients.description: 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger, for carrot cake

ingredients.name: Great Value Ground Nutmeg, 1.5 oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground nutmeg, for carrot cake

ingredients.name: Great Value Organic Ground Cardamom, 1.8 oz
ingredients.description: 1/4 teaspoon ground cardamom (optional), for carrot cake

ingredients.name: Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
ingredients.description: 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt, for carrot cake

ingredients.name: Fresh Whole Carrots, 1 lb Bag
ingredients.description: 3/4 cup grated peeled carrots, for carrot cake

ingredients.name: NUT-rition Heart Healthy Mix with Peanuts, Almonds, Pistachios, Pecans, Walnuts & Sea Salt, 7 ct Packs
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup chopped toasted pecans or walnuts (optional), for carrot cake

ingredients.name: Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter, 16 oz
ingredients.description: 1 stick unsalted butter, room temperature, for carrot cake

ingredients.name: C&H Premium Pure Cane Dark Brown Sugar, 2 lb
ingredients.description: 1 cup (packed) dark brown sugar, for carrot cake

ingredients.name: Great Value Cage Free Large AA White Eggs, 12 Count
ingredients.description: 2 large eggs, room temperature, for carrot cake,1 large egg, room temperature, for cheesecake

ingredients.name: Great Value Cream Cheese, 8 oz
ingredients.description: 1 (8-ounce) block cream cheese, room temperature, for cheesecake

ingredients.name: Great Value All Natural Sour Cream, 8 oz Tub
ingredients.description: 1/4 cup sour cream, room temperature, for cheesecake

ingredients.name: C&H Premium Pure Cane Granulated Sugar, 1 lb Box
Great Value Pure Vanilla Extract, 1 fl oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 teaspoon pure vanilla extract, for cheesecake

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 F. Line an 8-by-8-inch baking pan with parchment paper.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: In a medium bowl, whisk the flour, baking powder, spices and salt to combine. Add the carrots and nuts, if using; toss gently to coat in the flour mixture. (This will help prevent the carrots and nuts from sinking to the bottom of the cake.) Set aside.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment, beat the butter and brown sugar on medium speed until light and fluffy, scraping down the sides of the bowl as needed, about 5 minutes. Add the eggs one at a time, blending well after each addition and scraping down the sides of the bowl as needed. Measure out 1/2 cup of cake batter; set aside. Transfer the rest of the batter to the prepared pan, smoothing it evenly.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Rinse and dry the mixing bowl. Add the cream cheese, sour cream, sugar, egg and vanilla. Using a whisk attachment, beat the mixture on medium speed, scraping down the sides of the bowl as needed, until smooth and creamy, about 3 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Spoon the cream cheese mixture on top of the cake batter; smooth into an even layer. Using a tablespoon, drop 9 dollops (about a scant tablespoon each) of the reserved cake batter on top of the cream cheese mixture, spacing evenly apart.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Bake just until the dollops of cake batter soften, about 10 minutes. Using a skewer or the tip of a small sharp knife, swirl the cake batter into the cream cheese mixture. Continue baking until the cheesecake layer is just set and a tester inserted into the center comes out mostly clean (a few moist crumbs is ok), 20 to 25 minutes more.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Transfer the pan to a wire rack and cool completely, at least 30 minutes. Using the parchment paper as an aid, carefully lift the cheesecake bars from the pan. Slice into 16 squares.

42132d9610eacc992fbc828f416496a3.title: No-churn peach ice cream
42132d9610eacc992fbc828f416496a3.description: Nothing says summer quite like a batch of homemade peach ice cream made with peak-season peaches, and this no-churn version comes together in no time and doesn’t require any special equipment. You’ll start by dicing nearly two pounds of peaches (any variety works well here) — half are puréed until smooth, while the other half is reserved for later. Next, you’ll whip up a quick batch of vanilla whipped cream, which mimics the texture of a high-quality ice cream. Aerating the cream provides that light-yet-rich texture you normally achieve  from churning it in an ice cream machine.

ingredients.name: Great Value Sliced Peaches, 15.25 oz Can
ingredients.description: 1 1/2 pounds fresh peaches, such as freestone

ingredients.name: Great Value Heavy Whipping Cream, 16 Oz
Great Value Pure Vanilla Extract, 1 fl oz
Morton Kosher Salt, Coarse, 16 Ounce
Great Value Sweetened Condensed Milk 14 oz.

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: 1.Cut the peaches in half and remove the pits. Cut into ¼-inch cubes. Measure out 1 cup of the diced peaches and set aside. Place the rest of the diced peaches in a high-powered blender and purée until completely smooth. Pour the peach purée into a large mixing bowl and set aside.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: 2.In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the whisk attachment, combine the heavy cream, vanilla extract and salt. Start the mixer on low, then gradually increase the speed to high and whip until stiff peaks form, 2 to 3 minutes. (Alternatively, you can use a large mixing bowl and electric hand mixer to whip the cream.)

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: 3.Add the sweetened condensed milk to the bowl of peach purée and stir to combine. Add half of the whipped cream and gently fold it into the peach mixture until combined. Add the remaining whipped cream and gently fold everything together until evenly incorporated. Add the reserved chopped peaches and stir just until evenly distributed.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: 4.Transfer the mixture into a 9-by-5-inch or 8½-inch-by-4½-inch standard loaf pan and spread into an even layer. Freeze for at least 8 eight hours until the ice cream is firm. When ready to serve, let sit at room temperature for 5 minutes before scooping.

a03cf846c7ff05dc8af89604d30b78b2.title: Pumpkin spice coffee
a03cf846c7ff05dc8af89604d30b78b2.description: Embrace the cozy vibes of fall with this Pumpkin Spice Coffee that'll warm your soul. This delightful concoction combines the rich flavors of coffee and pumpkin spice, making it the perfect morning pick-me-up or afternoon treat.

ingredients.name: Great Value French Vanilla Cold Brew Coffee Concentrate, 32 fl oz
Great Value Original Unsweetened Almond Milk, Half Gallon, 64 fl oz
Great Value 100% Pure Pumpkin, 15 oz
Maple Grove Farms Organic Pure Maple Syrup, 8.5 fl oz
ingredients.description: 2 tablespoons maple syrup, or sweetener of choice

ingredients.name: Great Value Pure Vanilla Extract, 1 fl oz
Great Value Pumpkin Pie Spice, 2 oz
ingredients.description: 1/2 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice (or 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon plus 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg)

ingredients.name: Great Value Heavy Whipping Cream, 16 Oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Combine all ingredients in a medium sauce pot and heat through, making sure not to boil, stirring occasionally.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Serve hot, or over ice!

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Top with whipped cream (optional).

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

1b9658395ee59ad38082e4239eefd4eb.title: Taiwanese bubble tea
1b9658395ee59ad38082e4239eefd4eb.description: Craving bubble tea but don’t want to keep spending so much money on it? Making your own is really easy — and much more customizable. You can buy tapioca pearls or boba from Walmart then make the tea with a blend of your favorite black tea, sweetener, and half and half or non-dairy substitute. Just add ice and a wide straw, and you can have your favorite treat anytime!

ingredients.name: Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon
ingredients.description: 2 cups water, for black tea,1 cup hot water, for tapioca pearls and brown sugar syrup

ingredients.name: Great Value Black Tea Bags, 8 oz, 100 count
ingredients.description: 6 black tea bags, for black tea

ingredients.name: WuFuYuan Black Boba Tapioca Pearls for Bubble Milk Tea; Black Sugar Flavor; Ready in 5 Minutes; 5 Packs x 250g
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup medium black tapioca pearls, for tapioca pearls and brown sugar syrup

ingredients.name: Great Value Light Brown Sugar, 32 oz
ingredients.description: 2 cups brown sugar, for tapioca pearls and brown sugar syrup

ingredients.name: Minute Tapioca, 8 oz Box
ingredients.description: 1/2 cup tapioca pearls, cooked, for assembly

ingredients.name: Great Value Vanilla Flavored Ice Cream Sandwiches, 42 fl oz, 12 Count
Brown Sugar Syrup, Brown Sugar Boba Syrup, Black Sugar Syrup, Brown Sugar Coffee Syrup, Boba Tea Syrup, Bubble Tea Syrup by Locca 12 Oz (Pack of 1)
ingredients.description: brown sugar syrup, to taste, for assembly

ingredients.name: Great Value Black Tea Bags, 8 oz, 100 count
ingredients.description: 1 cup black tea, chilled, for assembly

ingredients.name: Great Value Half & Half, 16 fl oz
Great Value Disposable Plastic Flexible Straws, 100 Count

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: In a medium pot over high heat, combine the water and tea bags. Bring to a boil, then remove the pan from the heat and let the tea cool to room temperature.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Bring a medium pot of water to boil over high heat. Once the water is boiling, add the tapioca pearls and boil until softened, about 20 minutes.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Drain the pearls through a strainer.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Set the strainer with the pearls over a medium bowl. Add the brown sugar to the strainer and pour the hot water over.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Stir to dissolve the brown sugar. Soak the pearls in brown sugar syrup for 30 minutes, then store the bubbles and syrup separately until ready to serve.

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Assemble the tea: Divide the pearls and ice between 2 glasses, then add the brown sugar syrup, tea, and half and half.

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Stir with a wide-opening straw, then serve.

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

19758c94851d7500801bc1d2ed8a79f2.title: Ginger peached mango iced tea
19758c94851d7500801bc1d2ed8a79f2.description: This sweet and tangy iced tea is the ultimate thirst-quencher, made with juicy peaches, tropical mango, and a spicy kick of ginger - a perfect summer drink.

ingredients.name: Great Value Sliced Peaches, 15.25 oz Can
Fresh Ginger Root, Each
Minute Maid Premium Mango Punch Fruit Juice, 59 fl oz Carton
Great Value Black Tea Bags, 8 oz, 100 count

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Add ¼ peaches to an iced tea glass

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Mash the peaches and add 1 tablespoon ginger to it

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add two tablespoons of mango juice and add 1-2 black tea bags to the mixture

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Pour water in it and strain the iced tea.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Add frozen peaches to the iced tea and serve it chilled

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

508859f55376a0d70051fd429fdba44d.title: Cinnamon chai sleepy time milk
508859f55376a0d70051fd429fdba44d.description: Cozy up with this comforting Cinnamon Chai Sleepy Time Milk, perfect for winding down after a long day. With a blend of warm spices and soothing almond milk, this delightful concoction will have you drifting off to dreamland in no time.

ingredients.name: BD Cinnamon Sticks
Great Value Organic Ground Cardamom, 1.8 oz
Great Value Whole Cloves, 1.3 oz
Great Value Organic Fennel Seed, 1.6 oz
Fresh Ginger Root, Each
Great Value Whole Vitamin D Milk, Half Gallon, 64 fl oz
Great Value Organic Strained Raw Honey, 12 oz Inverted Plastic Bottle
Great Value Decaffeinated Black Tea Bags, 3.1 oz, 48 Count
Great Value Kosher Ground Cinnamon, 2.5 Oz

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Add 2 Cinnamon sticks, 1 tsp Cardamom Pods, ½ tsp whole Cloves, ½ Fennel Seeds, 1 inch sliced fresh Ginger in a cloth bag. Tie the cloth bag properly.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add 2 cups of whole milk and 1-2 tbsp honey to a saucepan

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Whisk it well for 10 sec

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Steep 2 bags of decaf black tea bags and cloth bag mixture in the warm milk for 10 minutes

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Take out the tea bags and froth the milk by whisking for 2-3 minutes

tasks.title: Step 6
tasks.instruction: Pour into a mug and add a pinch of Cinnamon powder

tasks.title: Step 7
tasks.instruction: Serve immediately

tasks.title: Step 8
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

4f01847edbb6f1cbddcb90f86e5005a2.title: Vietnamese coffee
4f01847edbb6f1cbddcb90f86e5005a2.description: This sweet and creamy coffee is made with strong Vietnamese coffee, sweetened condensed milk, and a touch of vanilla for a decadent treat. Served over ice, it's the perfect pick-me-up on a hot day.

ingredients.name: CDM Coffee & Chicory Regular Grind Ground Coffee, 13 Oz.
Great Value 2% Reduced Fat Milk, Half Gallon, 64 fl oz
Great Value Spring Water, 1 Gallon

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Pour the ground coffee into a Vietnamese phin filter base. Place the phin filter strainer on top of the coffee.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Pour the sweetened condensed milk into a glass.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Place the phin assembly on top of the glass. Pour hot water into the phin filter. Place the phin filter lid on top and let the coffee drip through the filter into the glass.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Stir well before serving.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Enjoy!

c9780c448dc29f9a1224f4366c022404.title: Pumpkin queso dip
c9780c448dc29f9a1224f4366c022404.description: Don’t let the line of trick-or-treaters or the candy corn overload scare you out of the kitchen this Halloween. Frankie’s got tricks up his sleeve to make simple yet wicked good treats for everyone at the party to enjoy. All while saving some dough.

ingredients.name: Crisco Pure Vegetable Oil, 16 fl oz
Great Value Sweet Cream Salted Butter, 16 oz
Yellow Onions, Each
Garlic Bulb, Each
El Mexicano Pork Chorizo, 9 Oz.
El Guapo Whole Cumin (Comino Entero), 0.75 oz
Great Value Crushed Red Pepper, 1.75 oz
GV All Purpose Flour 2LB Bag
Great Value 2% Reduced Fat Milk, Half Gallon, 64 fl oz
Great Value Canned Medium Diced Green Chiles, 4 Oz
Libby's 100% Pure Canned Pumpkin all natural no preservatives, 15 oz
Great Value Finely Shredded Sharp Cheddar Cheese, 16 oz
Fresh Cilantro, Bunch
Fresh Baby-Cut Carrots, 2lb Bag
ingredients.description: 6 purple and orange carrots, cut into sticks

ingredients.name: Fresh Celery Sticks, 20 oz Bag
Doritos Cool Ranch Tortilla Snack Chips, Gluten-Free, Party Size, 14.05 oz Bag

tasks.title: Step 1
tasks.instruction: Mince the onion. Heat a 10-inch cast iron skillet over medium heat and add the butter and oil.

tasks.title: Step 2
tasks.instruction: Add the onion and garlic and sauté for 3-5 minutes. Stir in the chorizo and cook for 5 minutes until browned.

tasks.title: Step 3
tasks.instruction: Add the cumin, red pepper flakes and sprinkle with flour. Stir to coat.

tasks.title: Step 4
tasks.instruction: Whisk in the milk, green chilis and pumpkin and simmer for 3-5 minutes, until thick. Turn off the heat and stir in the cheese until just melted. Add a few more tablespoons of milk to thin out the sauce.

tasks.title: Step 5
tasks.instruction: Garnish with cilantro and serve with vegetables and chips.
